loans.name: Kareema

texts.en: Kareema is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Kareema's husband has been running his own shoe workshop for 14 years now. His job is their only source of income. He needs to expand it by buying a larger quantity of the required materials to make shoes, in order to raise his productivity and profit to cover their children needs as well as to provide them with the best education. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, Kareema decided to help him by applying for this loan.

loans.use: to buy required materials for making more shoes

loans.name: Berta Isabel

texts.es:
Berta, con 56 años de edad, ha pasado por una situación económica difícil tras la separación de su esposo hace varios años; debido a esto tuvo que buscar opciones para generar ingresos para su sustento, por lo que hace 5 años comenzó a vender mercancía que su única hija le enviaba desde el extranjero; pero luego decidió montar su negocio en un local arrendado abierto al público e incursionó con la venta de productos de belleza, como cosméticos, tratamientos capilares, shampoo, acondicionador, esmaltes para uñas, entre otros; trabaja diariamente con el apoyo de una empleada directa y, así ha logrado generar los ingresos para su sustento durante los meses que lleva funcionando el negocio.
Actualmente desea ampliar su portafolio ofreciendo dentro del mismo local los servicios de peluquería, corte, cepillado y barbería, por ello se anima a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará  los activos fijos (lavacabezas, sillas de peluquería, plancha y secador para el cabello), esto le permitirá atraer nuevos clientes y así aumentar las ventas y mejorar los ingresos.
Berta manifiesta que su proyecto a mediano plazo es adquirir un local propio para seguir fortaleciendo su negocio y mejorar la rentabilidad del mismo para luego tener la oportunidad de disfrutar una vejez tranquila y con mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Berta is 56 years old. She has gone through a difficult economic situation after separating from her husband several years ago. Because of this she had to find other options to generate income to sustain herself.  Five years ago, she started to sell merchandise that her only daughter sent her from abroad. Later she decided to set up her business in a rental location open to the public and branched out into selling beauty products, such as cosmetics, hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, and nail polish, among others. She works every day with the help of a direct employee. In this way she has been able to generate the income to sustain herself during the months she has been in business.

Currently, she wants to increase her portfolio, offering hair dressing, cutting, brushing, and barber’s services in her shop. This is why she applied for the loan, which she will use to buy the fixed assets (shampoo bowls, styling chairs, curling irons, and blow dryers). This will enable her to attract new clients and increase her sales, improving her income. 

Berta says her medium term goal is to acquire her own location to continue strengthening her business and improving its profitability to later have the opportunity to enjoy a relaxing old age and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the fixed assets (shampoo bowls, styling chairs, curling irons, and blow dryers).

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, es jefa de su hogar, es madre soltera de una hija, desde hace cuatro años inicio por su cuenta la venta de ropa, en sus inicios no tenía mucha mercadería pero poco a poco ha ido surtiendo su inventario hoy en día ofrece una amplia gama de ropa y otros artículos de uso personal.
Comprará blusas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas, faldas y ropa interior ambos sexos, con lo que espera sacar el mayor provecho en esta temporada de fin de año y atraer nuevos clientes, para que de esa forma sus ingresos aumenten y poder cumplir con sus compromisos.
Sueña con mejorar el local donde tiene su negocio y en un futuro construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
María is the head of her household. She is a single mother with one daughter. Four years ago, she started her own business selling clothing. In the beginning, she did not have a lot of merchandise but, little by little, she increased her inventory. Today, she offers a wide variety of clothing and other personal use items. 

She will purchase blouses, pants, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, and underwear for men and women. She hopes to increase her profits at the end of the year and attract new customers so that her income increases and she can fulfill her promises.

She dreams of improving the location of her store and, in the future, building her own home.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, pants, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, and underwear for men and women.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Alegres es un grupo relativamente nuevo, donde todas están empezando a trabajar juntas y también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan por sus familias y para poder mantener sus hogares.
Una de las integrantes es la Honorina, quien además de ser la presidenta de este grupo, también está dedicándose a la venta de frutas varias, y es en esta época que más ventas tiene, es por eso que solicita de este préstamo, para comprar más tipo de frutas, para poder surtirse y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes, a la vez que tiene los ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Mujeres Alegres is a relatively new group, where all the women are starting to work together and are completing the poverty survey. The women are the heads of their families. They fight for their families and to be able to maintain their homes.

One of the group's members is Honorina. Besides being the president of this group, she also sells various fruit. At this time she has the most sales, and that is why she is applying for this loan. She wants to buy more kinds of fruit, to be able to stock her business, and meet her customer's demands. This will allow her to have the income to be able to help her family.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits to sell.

loans.name: William Alexander

texts.es:
William, solicita un nuevo crédito para equipar su negocio comprara repuestos para computadoras y accesorios, para dar mejor un mejor servicio  a sus clientes y continuar saliendo a adelante con su familia.
Con el crédito anterior su negocio se fortaleció y le permitió tener mayores ganancias con las que cancelo las cuotas de la deuda adquirida. Su familia ha aumentado pues ha nacido su hijo, y manifiesta que gracias a las nuevas condiciones económicas que hoy tiene puede dar un estilo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
William is requesting a new loan to equip his business. He will buy replacement parts and accessories for computers to give his customers better service and to continue providing for his family.

The previous loan strengthened his business and allowed him to have better earnings, which he used to pay off the debt he had acquired. His family has grown with the birth of his son, and he expresses his thanks for the new economic conditions that he now has; he can give a better standard of living to his family.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and accessories for computers.

loans.name: Nery De Jesús

texts.es:
Nery, es una mujer de 44 años de edad, madre de dos hijos y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental.
Durante su vida productiva trabajó por 10 años en diferentes tiendas y cafeterías de la ciudad, donde obtuvo experiencia y conocimiento en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; esto la impulsó a tomar la decisión de independizarse y montar su propia tienda de abarrotes, la cual se encuentra ubicada en la casa donde reside; allí trabaja sola todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana y ya lleva 6 meses generando ingresos para su hogar. De manera alterna trabaja en el campo de la construcción por contratos, para complementar los ingresos con los que logra solventar las necesidades básicas de la familia.
Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará un refrigerador, con el ánimo de diversificar la oferta de productos, introduciendo lácteos, helados y cárnicos, esto le ayudará a incrementar las ventas y por ende los ingresos.
Nery manifiesta que su propósito a mediano plazo es poder fortalecer su negocio y convertirlo en un minimercado que sea reconocido en el sector, generando así una mayor rentabilidad y mejorar poco a poco la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Nery is a 44 year old woman. She is the mother of two children. She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. During her productive life, she has worked in different stores and cafes in the city for ten years. She obtained experience and knowledge in managing these types of businesses. This is what prompted her to become independent and to start her own grocery store. The store is located in her house. She works there alone every day from the early hours of the morning. She now has worked six months generating income for her household. She alternates with working in the field of construction through contracts in order to complement the income to meet the basic needs of the family. 
Now she is requesting a the support of a loan in order to buy a refrigerator.  The aim is to diversify the selection of products by introducing dairy products, ice creams and meats. This will help to increase sales and profits. 
Nery said that her goal in the medium term is to strengthen her business and convert it into a mini-market which is recognized in the area. This will generate greater profitability and and improve her family's quality of life, little by little.

loans.use: buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
Emiliana es una mujer muy trabajadora vive en casa de sus señores padres en la zona de Villa Nuevo Potosi ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.  Se dedica principalmente a la elaboracion de calzados de cuero para damas principalmente repartiendo al por mayor a los puestos ubicados en la zona  buenos aires de la ciudad de La Paz; trabaja muy responsablemente en conjunto con padres. Ella comienza su actividad en la zona de Villa Nuevo Potosi de la ciudad desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, Emiliana necesita el credito para hacer realizar la compra de mas material (cuero,hebillas,goma para los tacos, etc.) y asi incrementar sus ingresos y ventas aprovechando de esta manera las fiestas de fin de año ya que se incrementa la demanda de calzados para su venta.

El sueño de Emiliana es poder tener mayores ingresos en base al sacrificio que hace junto a su familia, y poder tener una vejez tranquila, espera  contar con un salario de vejez que le permita vivir mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Emiliana is a very hard working woman who lives with her parents in the zone of Villa Nuevo Potosi, a neighborhood in the city of La Paz. She makes women's leather shoes, which she sells in bulk to shops located in the Buenos Aires neighborhood of La Paz. She is a very responsible worker along with her parents. She begins working in her neighborhood at 6:00 a.m. and works until 10 at night. 

Emiliana needs this loan to purchase more material (leather, buckles, rubber for the heels, etc.) and thereby increase her earnings and sales. She will take advantage of the new year parties, when demand for shoes increases. 

Her dream is to increase her earnings through the sacrifices she and her family make, and to live peacefully when she gets old. She hopes to have a retirement salary that will permit her to live with a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy material like leather, buckles, and rubber for heels, etc. to continue in her business of making women's shoes.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Mujeres unidas se llama este grupo que actualmente está en su segundo ciclo del programa de comités, además forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para ir creciendo y mejorando.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Maria, quien se dedica al humilde trabajo de venta de remedios naturales, con lo cual día a día lucha para poder ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy sacrificada, que da todo por salir adelante y el día de mañana ser una buena microempresaria.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de remedios naturales para poder venderlos y de esa forma seguir con sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group is known as Mujeres Unidas, or Women United, and they are currently in their second cycle of the committee program, as well as being a part of a program for the elimination of poverty in which everyone is participating in order to eliminate poverty and to continue growing and improving. 

One person worthy of highlighting is Mrs. Maria, who is dedicated to the humble work of selling natural medicines, a job she works every day in order to help her family. She is a self sacrificing person who gives her all in her efforts to get ahead and in the near future she will be a good small business owner. She is asking for this loan in order to invest in purchasing natural medicines to re-sell and to continue her business and to improve her earnings.

loans.use: Purchase natural medicine to sell.

loans.name: María Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora. María es una socia fundadora del grupo de crédito Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, vive por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones. Le gusta mucho formar parte de este hermoso grupo por la solidaridad y compañerismo que existe entre todas las socias.
Doña María tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y ha concebido 7 hijos, 5 de ellos ya son casados y viven independientes, sus dos hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su esposo es albañil, la casa en la que viven es propia.
La Señora María se dedica a la agricultura, vende parte  de sus cosechas y el resto es para el consumo de su casa, también cría ganado, cerdos, cuyes y pollos. Tiene una tienda la cual  comenzó con su primer crédito que recibió.
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en víveres para su tienda. Su meta es agrandar su galpón de pollos para comercializar y ampliar este negocio.
texts.en:
María is a founding member of the 'Mujeres de Chilcatotoras' loan group. She lives by the parish of Tarqui in Cuenca, which, due to its hilly geography, has various places to enjoy nature. Its people are friendly and well mannered and they still maintain their culture and traditions. She really likes being part of this lovely group because of the solidarity and companionship that exists among all of the members. 

María is 58 years old, is married and has conceived seven children, five of whom are already married and live independently. Her two unmarried children help her financially. Her husband is a stonemason and they own the house they live in.

María makes a living from agriculture. She sells part of her crops and the rest is for home consumption. She also raises cattle, pigs, guinea pigs and chickens. She has a store that she started with the first loan she received. She is going to invest the money from the loan in buying chickens and foodstuffs for her store. Her goal is to enlarge her shed of chickens to sell and to expand this business.

loans.use: to buy chickens and foodstuffs

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel, es un señor que disfruta dedicarse a la ganadería y a cultivar granos básicos, son oficios que aprendió de su padre desde que era un niño, actualmente vive con su esposa y tres de sus hijos, hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en realizar esta actividad.
Con el capital comprara ganado para fortalecer su negocio, con lo que la productividad de productos lácteos aumentara y así tendrá más ganancias con las que pagara sus deudas y contribuirá con los gastos de su hogar.
Aspira contar con los ingresos que le den la facilidad de darle a su familia mejor salud, alimentación, educación y vestuario.
texts.en:
Isabel is a gentleman who enjoys raising livestock and farming staple crops, trades that he learned from his father from the time he was a child. Currently, he lives with his wife and three of their children. So far, he has not had any trouble carrying out this work.

With this capital, he will buy cattle to strengthen his business. His production of dairy product will increase and he will have more earnings with which to pay off his debts and to contribute to household expenses. He aspires to have an income that will enable him to give his family better health, food, education, and clothing.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.es:
Abelardo vive en casa propia de sus padres en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la zona de Llojeta  de la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de albañil. Abelardo necesita el crédito para la compra de material de construccion y asi mejorar su calidad de vida, comprara estuco, cemento, ladrillos y otros, para refacción de un par de habitaciones y dar mejor comodidad a sus dos hijos..

El sueño de Abelardo es poder terminar la construccion de la vivienda donde actualmente habita. esta es la tercera vez que su crédito será canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Abelardo lives in his parent's home that is made of brick and the floor is cement. It is located in the zone of Llojeta in the city of La Paz. He works as a bricklayer by profession. Abelardo needs a loan in order to purchase construction material and to improve his quality of life. He will purchase stucco, cement, bricks and other materials in order to repair a pair of bedrooms and to make his children more comfortable. 

His dream is to be able to finish construction on his home. This is the third loan that he will apply for via Kiva.

loans.use: purchase stucco, cement, bricks and more in order to repair a few bedrooms in his home.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simon se dedica a la producción de leche junto a su esposa; tiene cuatro hijos  los cuales se encuentran en edad escolar, la producción de leche la vende a una de las Plantas industrializadoras de leche del departamento de La Paz.

Actualmente vive en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Umajalsu  del municipio de Achacachi a dos   horas y media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con  algunas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche, con cuya venta sostiene la economía de su familia.
.
El crédito  requiere para comprar  alimento y forrajes para su ganado vacuno.

El sueño de Simon es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado mejorando su alimentación.
.
Es la tercer vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Simon works in dairy production alongside his wife, they have four children who are all school age. The milk they produce is sold to one of the industrial plants in the department of La Paz. 

He currently lives in his own home located in the community of Umajalsu in the municipality of Achacachi that is about two hours from La Paz. He has a few heads of cattle who produce milk, the sale of which supports his family. 

The loan is needed to purchase feed and fodder for his cattle. 

Simon's dream is to increase his numbers of cows and to improve their nutrition. 

This is the third loan that he is applying for through IMPRO and his first with Kiva.

loans.use: purchase feed and fodder for his milk cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase chickens.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Enrique, a sus 51 años de edad, se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre trabajador y dedicado a su familia, conformada por su esposa y 2 hijos.
Durante su vida productiva se ha desempeñado como comerciante independiente; comenzó hace 17 años comprando y revendiendo helados y cremas; luego se tuvo que trasladar de ciudad y donde se radicó surgió la oportunidad de vender los mismos productos, pero con la ventaja de que ahora él mismo los fabricaba, pues tomó cursos de capacitación y compró las máquinas para elaborarlos; en esta labor contaba con el apoyo de su familia y durante varios años tuvo muy buenos resultados; todo terminó cuando tuvo que regresarse para su ciudad natal debido a la violencia que se presentaba en el sector y que ponía en riesgo la vida de su familia y la propia; razón por la que perdió todo. Sin embargo, con empuje, empeño y mucha perseverancia decidió comenzar desde cero y nuevamente creó su microempresa; que ahora se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos.
El crédito que solicita es para realizar mantenimiento a las máquinas y comprar insumos al por mayor (frutas, azúcar, empaques, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y podrá mejorar el funcionamiento de sus activos y aumentar la producción; lo que le dará la oportunidad de vender más cantidad de productos.
Enrique sueña con hacer crecer su negocio, para generar empleos y en un futuro poder registrar su marca propia y posicionarla en el mercado; para generar mejor rentabilidad y brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Enrique is 51 years old and has been characterized as a hardworking man who is dedicated to his family, which includes his wife and 2 children.

During his productive life, he has developed as an independent merchant. Seventeen years ago he started buying and selling ice creams and creams. Later he had to move to the city, where he established himself when the opportunity emerged to sell the same products, but this time with the advantage that he made them himself. He took training courses and bought the machines to make the products. He had the support of his family, and for several years he had good results. It all ended when he had to move back to his hometown because of violence in the area that threatened his own life and the lives of his family. That was the reason he lost it all. Nevertheless, with drive, effort, and a lot of perseverance, he decided to start from nothing and recreate his micro business, which has now become his source of income. 

The loan he is requesting is to perform maintenance on the machines and to buy supplies wholesale (fruits, sugar, and packaging, among others). This will allow him to continue his work and to be able to improve the functioning of his assets and increase production. This will give him the opportunity to sell greater quantities of his products.

Enrique dreams of growing his business to generate work and in the future to register his own brand and position it in the market to generate greater profitability and to offer his family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his machines and buy supplies wholesale (fruit, sugar, and packaging, among others).

loans.name: Elsi Haidee

texts.es:
Elsi, es una madre soltera que busca la manera de sacar a delante a su hija de 4 años, vive junto a su madre y su hija, es una persona muy reconocida en su localidad por el negocio que posee desde 3 años, el cual consiste en una ferretería, en la que q ofrece diversidad de productos necesarios para la construcción, lo heredo de sus padres, atiende en un horario de 7:00 a.m. has las 5:00 p.m.
Con el capital comprara hierro, clavos, tubos, alambre, algunas herramientas, entre otros productos que necesita para surtir el negocio y dar la mejor atención posible a sus clientes. Espera aumentar sus ingresos y cancelar sus deudas.
Su sueño es tener un negocio competitivo que tenga la rentabilidad necesaria para darle un mejor futuro a su hija.
texts.en:
Elsi is a single mother and is looking for a way to give a better life to her four year old daughter. She lives with her mother and daughter. She is a well known member of the community because she has ran her business for three years. She runs a hardware supply store where she offers a diversity of products needed for construction. It is a business she inherited from her parents, where she works from 7am to 5pm. 
With the loan she will purchase iron, nails, tubes, wires, some tools and other items she needs to supply her store and to give a better service to her clients. She hopes to increase her earnings and pay back all her debt. 
Her dream is to have a competitive business that is profitable and will enable her to give a better future to her daughter.

loans.use: purchase iron, nails, wire and some tools.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Gracias  por apoyar a Julio, quien con su credikiva compró repuestos y bebidas frías que vendió rápidamente. Con este crédito se benefició porque tuvo un mayor surtido, ganó liquidez, incrementó sus ventas y sus utilidades. .Desde que  recibió este financiamiento, ha mejorado sus ingresos de negocio y de su familia, porque ha fortalecido su capital d e trabajo. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, mediante el cual comprará al por mayor y de contado cervezas, pues aprovechará la navidad y el año nuevo, época de mayor consumo para invertir bien. Así mismo comprará accesorios y repuestos, además de planes para tener más minutos a celulares y hacer de su inversión todo un éxito. Julio dice a sus financiadores: “Muchas gracias por el apoyo económico, he progresado paulatinamente, con Kiva y con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. “
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Julio, who quickly sold the replacement parts and cold drinks that he bought with his previous loan. With that loan, he benefitted because he had a greater selection, he earned ready cash, and he increased his sales and profits. Since receiving that financing, he improved his income for his business and for his family because he built up his working capital. 

Currently, he is applying for another Kiva loan, which he will use to buy beer in cash at a wholesaler. He will invest well by taking advantage of the greater consumption that occurs during the Christmas and New Year holidays. He will also buy accessories and replacement parts as well as prepaid minutes for mobile phones to make his investment a complete success. 

To his lenders, Julio says, "Thank you very much for the economic support. Little by little, I have progressed with Kiva and Fundación Mario Santo Domingo."

loans.use: to purchase beer in cash from a wholesaler. He will also buy accessories and replacement parts as well as pre-paid mobile phone minutes.

loans.name: Maria Martir

texts.es:
María, solicita capital para invertir en la compra de hilo, para la confección de hamacas, pues necesita cumplir con la demanda que tiene de sus clientes, para continuar fomentando su fidelidad hacia sus productos.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció el negocio lo que le ayudo a atraer nuevos clientes, mejorar su producción generar los ingresos que necesita para mejorar el estilo de vida de su grupo familiar, logro hacer mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is requesting capital to invest in the purchase of thread for weaving hammocks. She needs to cover the demand from her customers so as to continue fomenting loyalty toward her products.

With her previous loan she strengthened her business, which helped her attract new customers, improve her production, generate the income she needs to improve her family's lifestyle and improve her home.

loans.use: to buy thread

loans.name: Elser Moises

texts.es:
Elser Moises tiene 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Sallique, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, como principal cultivo la lima, también se dedican al comercio y ganadería, dicho distrito pertenece a la provincia de Jaén, ubicado en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con fincas fruteras de lima aproximadamente de 01 ha, dedicándose a este cultivo desde hace 15 años, también se dedica al cultivo de café y pan llevar en poca escala, la producción de lima lo vende en su caserío a los comerciantes de frutas quienes la llevan a comercializar a la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para invertir en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos, comprando abonos y de esta manera tener un buena producción y cosecha oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Elser Moises is 47 years old and lives with his wife in the Sallique district, a mainly agricultural community with lemon as its main crop, with other sources of income such as commerce and animal husbandry. This district is in the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.

He makes a living from agriculture, owning approximately 1 hectare of lemon orchards, and has been doing this for 15 years. He also grows coffee and sells bread to go in a small scale. The lemons he produces are sold from his home to fruit merchants who then take these to be sold in the city of Chiclayo.

He is requesting a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to invest in the maintenance of his crops, to buy fertiliser and therefore have a good production and opportune harvest for his customers, in this way generating more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser to maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Pablo Emilio

texts.es:
Pablo, un campesino de 33 años de edad, es casado y padre de un hijo de 7 años; desde muy joven aprendió a realizar las labores del campo que aprendió de su padre. Actualmente tiene 100 palos de aguacate cultivados, 100 gallinas ponedoras y 30 pollos de engorde cuyas producciones son comercializadas en la plaza de mercado del municipio donde reside, adicionalmente y de manera alterna es propietario de una pequeña fábrica de vidrios, ambas actividades hacen parte de su fuente de ingresos con los que sostiene a su familia.
El crédito que solicita lo desea invertir en el fortalecimiento de su negocio agrícola, por ello comprará 150 gallinas ponedoras, 150 pollos de engorde, concentrado para alimentar los animales e insumos agrícolas (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes, fungicidas) para su cultivo de aguacates; esto le permitirá aumentar su capacidad de producción para incrementar sus ventas y mejorar los ingresos, además podrá enfrentar los diversos desafíos que se le presentan por los altos costos de los insumos agrícolas, que en algunas ocasiones no logran ser recuperados con la venta de la producción.
Pablo manifiesta que su proyecto es continuar fortaleciendo sus dos actividades para generar una mayor rentabilidad que le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable y así poder brindar a su hijo una educación de calidad y una mejor calidad de vida para la familia.
texts.en:
Pablo, a 33 year old farmer, is married and the father of a 7 year old son. From a young age, he learned to perform farm work from his father. He currently has 100 avocado plants, 100 laying hens, and 30 fattened chickens. His products are sold in the market for laying hens in the town where he lives. He also owns a small glass factory. Both activities make up Pablo's source of income to support his family.

Pablo hopes to invest the loan he is applying for to strengthen his agricultural business. He will buy 150 laying hens, 150 fattened chickens, extract to feed the animals, and agricultural supplies (manures, pesticides, fertilizers, fungicides) to grow his avocados. This will allow him to increase his production ability and sales and to improve his income. He will also be able to face the diverse challenges he is faced with, such as the high costs of agricultural supplies which he sometimes does not make back with the sale of his products.

Pablo says that his project is to continue strengthening his two activities to generate a greater profitability that will guarantee a favorable stable economy  and in that way be able to offer his son a quality education and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy 150 laying hens, 150 fattened chickens, extract to feed the animals, and agricultural supplies (manures, pesticides, fertilizers, fungicides) to grow his avocados.

loans.name: Elidio

texts.es:
El  Sr. Elidio tiene 35 años, está casado con la Sra. Dina de 32 años, ambos tienen dos hijos, por quienes están luchando y trabajando para poder darles todo lo que no pudieron tener, y que el día de mañana sean personas de bien.
Elidio tiene una Herrería en su casa,  y comenta que gracias a su buen trabajo se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, y gracias a eso está ayudando a su familia. Es conocido por ser una persona amable y servicial.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de hierros, que usará en su herrería, y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Elidio is 35 years old and is married to 32-year-old Dina. They both have two children for whom they are striving and working to be able to give them everything they weren't able to have, and so that they will be people of means in the future.

Elidio has a blacksmith's workshop in his home, and says that thanks to his good work he has assembled a very good customer base, and thanks to this he is helping his family. He is known for being a friendly and helpful person.

He is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of iron, which he will use in his blacksmith's workshop and thus be able to keep working and  fulfilling his customer's requests.

loans.use: to buy iron to use in his blacksmith's workshop

loans.name: Villa Bonita 2 Group

texts.es:
El comité Villa Bonita 2 se formó luego de varias reuniones con las integrantes, y decidieron formar este grupo, son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan por sus seres queridos. Una persona muy trabajadora es Aurelia, quien hace productos de limpieza y también vende ropas, ella es muy trabajadora, y lucha por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Aurelia día a día empieza su trabajo desde muy tempranas horas, y así es que está teniendo los ingresos para poder salir adelante. Su meta es poder tener su propio local y así tener una mayor clientela.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para la venta, para poder seguir con sus ventas y así tratar de seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The Villa Bonita 2 communal bank was formed after the members held several meetings and decided to form the group. These women are the heads of their households and are determined to take care of their loved ones. 

One very hardworking person is Aurelia, who makes cleaning products and also sells clothing. She is very hardworking and strives to improve her living conditions.

Day after day, Aurelia begins her work at a very early hour, and that is how she has the income to support herself. Her goal is to be able to have her own shop in order to have a larger clientele

She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of a variety of garments to sell so she can continue with her sales to try to keep helping her family.

loans.use: To buy a variety of garments to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, es una madre dedicada al bienestar de su familia, vive junto a sus dos hijos, para generar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su familia se dedica a vender una variedad de frutas sus labores inician a las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 2:00 p.m.
Ella invertirá en compra de manzanas, papaya, jocotes, peras, melones, etc., para dar mejores opciones de compras a sus clientes, espera aumentar sus ganancias así como atraer  a nuevos clientes.
María aspira fortalecer su negocio para seguir dando un mejor estilo de vida a su familia
texts.en:
María is a mother who is dedicated to her family's well being. She lives with her two children to generate the income necessary to cover her family's expenses. She makes a living by selling a variety of fruits. Her work begins at 6:00 am and she works until 2:00 pm.

She will invest in the purchase of apples, papaya, jocotes, pears, melons, etc., to give her customers better options for purchase. She hopes to increase her earnings as well as attract new customers.

María aspires to strengthen her business in order to keep giving her family a better style of life.

loans.use: to buy apples, papaya, jocotes, pears, melon, etc.

loans.name: Ivan Jose

texts.es:
Iván, es casado, disfruta de una familia compuesta por su esposa y su hija de 6 años, su padre le enseño a dar mantenimiento y reparar motos, hoy lo hace de manera independiente, su horario de atención es de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m.
Necita comprar juego de llavee, bujías, llantas, entre otros artículos necesarios para seguir trabajando, espera contar con la fidelidad de sus clientes, aumentar sus ingresos, los cuales utilizara para cancelar sus cuotas y llevar el sustento diaria su familia.
Sueña con mejorar su economía y ampliar el local de su negocio.
texts.en:
Iván is married and enjoys having a family formed by his wife and their 6-year-old daughter. His father taught him how to do maintenance on and repair motorcycles. He currently does this independently. His operating hours are from 7:00 am until 4:00 pm.

He needs to buy sets of keys, spark plugs and tires, among other items that are necessary to keep working. He hopes to count on his customers' loyalty and to increase his earnings, which he will use to make his payments and to support his family on a daily basis.

He dreams about improving his income and expanding his place of business.

loans.use: to buy sets of keys, spark plugs and tires, among other items

loans.name: Maria Placida

texts.es:
María Placida tiene 26 años de edad, vive junto a su a esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se caracteriza por ser hospitalaria, también se puede encontrar exquisitos platos preparados en los restaurants de la zona, su población se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una bodega, que con la ayuda de su esposo ofrecen abarrotes como leche, aceite, huevos, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, entre otros desde hace más de 6 años, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio y ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para capital de trabajo, compra de abarrotes para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Placida is 26 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the Oyotún district. It is a community known for being hospitable. You can also find exquisite dishes prepared in the restaurants in the area. The people work in business, agriculture and farming. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Perú.

She has a store. With the help of her husband, she has sold groceries like milk, oil, eggs, rice, sugar, soft drinks and other items for more than six months. Her business is located at her home. She requested a loan of 500 nuevos soles for working capital for purchasing groceries for her customers and generating more income for her family.

loans.use: buy groceries to stock her store.

loans.name: Teresa Marisol

texts.es:
Teresa, se dedica a vender tamales y antojitos, como forma de generar ingresos para apoyar a su compañero de vida en los gastos de su hogar, no tiene hijos, vive con su compañero de vida, lo hace de 8:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m., por el momento no representa ningún problema.
Invertirá en la compra de maíz, pollo, frijol, aceite, leña. Contando con la materia prima necesaria c0ontinuara trabajando para hacer crecer el negocio, espera aumentar sus ventas y cancelar sus deudas.
Sueña con mejorar sus productos y atraer más clientes.
texts.en:
Teresa works selling tamales and popular snacks as a way of generating income to help her life partner with the household expenses. She doesn't have children and lives with her spouse. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. For now, this does not present a problem. 

Teresa will invest in the purchase of corn, chicken, beans, oil, and firewood. By having the raw materials necessary to continue working and growing her business, she hopes to increase her sales and pay off her debts. She dreams of improving her products and attracting more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, beans, oil, and firewood.

loans.name: Dúo Nueva Jeneración Group

texts.es:
DUO NUEVA GENERACION
La señora María de 38 años de edad, casada,  desde hace 5 años posee una Tienda ubicada en la calle principal de la Colonia San Rafael Chimaltenango, que a base de esfuerzos logro establecer y mejorar su vivienda, a través de su negocio ella  ha mantenido y  a sacado adelante a su familia.
El sueño de señora María Chicol es poder mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia a través del microcrédito que está solicitando a FAPE para superarse más en su negocio; con el préstamo quiere comprar más productos de consumo diario  para seguir creciendo con su tienda.
texts.en:
NUEVA GENERACION DUO
Maria is 38 years old and is married.  For 5 years she has had a store located on the main street of the San Rafael community in Chimaltenango, which she was able to establish with effort and by making improvements to her home.  With her business she has supported and raised her family.  Maria's dream is to improve the quality of life for herself and her family through the microcredit loan that she is requesting from FAPE, in order to get ahead with her business.  With the loan she will buy more commonly-used food products in order to continue growing her store.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Dúo Gardenias De Peronia Group

texts.es:
DUO GARDENIAS DE PERONIA
La  señora shery  julissa quien es propietaria de una farmacia la cual acaba de hacerse acreedora  hace algunos meses y quien también es madre de una niña  es una persona la cual esta my deseosa de convertirse en una mujer microempresaria dentro de su comunidad ella es una mujer la cual lucha día con día para poder ayudar y brindar un buen estilo de vida a su familia menciona que hace algunos meses se le dio a oportunidad de poder  poner un local en el cual su variedad de medicina ayudaría a las personas que están dentro de su comunidad actualmente trata la manera de mantener lo  básico que se necesita en una farmacia pero ella espera con  la ayuda de DIOS poder surtirla aun mas y es por eso que en esta ocasión la señora shery toca las puertas de la fundación para poder solicitar de ustedes un crédito en el cual ella desea poder surtir en su variedad toda clase  de medicina y con ello poder contribuir con el desarrollo de su familia y ser un apoyo importante y económico de su familia.
texts.en: Shery Julissa became the owner on credit of a pharmacy several months ago.  She is also the mother of a daughter, and a person who wants very much to become an entrepreneurial woman in her community.  She is a woman who strives every day to help and to provide a good standard of living for her family.  A few months ago she was given the opportunity to provide a business to her community that will help people by offering them a variety of medicines.  She is trying to maintain the basic stock necessary for a pharmacy, but is hoping that with God's help she will be able to supply her business even better.  For this reason she is knocking on the foundation's door to request a loan from you, which she hopes to use to stock her business with all kinds of medicines.  In this way she will be able to contribute to the development of her family and to be an important economic support for her family.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical medicines to sell.

loans.name: Santos Yllermo

texts.es:
Santos Yllermo tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y res menores hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una ciudad de clima caluroso, su población se dedican a la agricultura de frutas, café, arroz entre otros y comercio de los mismos, también se dedican a la ganadería, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, ubicado a en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura cultivando piña, maíz y cafeto especialmente, con una experiencia en el rubro de 8 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fitosanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha y de esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en: Santos Yllermo is 39 years old and lives with his wife and three minor children in the Pucara district, two hours from the city of Jaen, which is located in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.  It is a city with a warm climate where the population works growing fruit, coffee, rice and other things and selling them.  They also raise livestock.  Santos works in agriculture, growing pineapple, corn and coffee especially, and has been doing this for 8 years.  He is requesting a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to apply pesticides and fertilizers and to pay laborers to harvest his crop.  This will help him to ensure a good, healthy crop, and thus have better production and a better quality product, and to avoid having problems selling his product.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to maintain his crop.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: En un lugar ubicado a orillas del mar habita Marlene, mujer de 54 años, casada y madre de un joven de 24 años de edad. Ella es comerciante de ropa, calzado, accesorios y en general la mercancía que su clientela demande y solicite, para ella responder con un inventario diverso, dándole la opción al cliente, de escoger lo que le gusta y a la medida. Cuando inició este negocio, hace 8 años, su esposo le dio el primer capital semilla para invertir y distribuir entre una clientela doméstica, a familiares, vecinos y amigos, clientela que ha ido creciendo, debido a su buen trato y porque es muy referida por sus actuales compradores; sus principales líneas de productos, son los pantalones para damas caballeros y niños, camisas, suéteres, calzado, perfumería etc. Los cuales  vende a crédito y de contado, trabajando durante 12 horas diarias sin cesar. Sus preferencias de compra, son en los almacenes mayoristas ubicados en la zona comercial de la ciudad. Marlene tiene como metas principales, remodelar su negocio, abrir un local al público, fidelizar completamente a su clientela y ahorrar, para disfrutar sus utilidades. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante la cual comprará pantalones, jeans, camisas, perfumes, pues requiere aprovechar la temporada mas comercial del año, para ganar un poco mas trabajando fuertemente y finalmente cumplir sus sueños de prosperidad.  .
texts.en: Marlene lives by the ocean.  She is 54 years old, married, and the mother of a 24-year-old son.  She sells clothing, shoes, accessories and in general whatever merchandise her customers ask for.  She tries to provide a varied inventory, so that her customers can choose what they like.  When she started this business 8 years ago her husband provided the seed capital to invest in products to distribute amongst a customer base of family, neighbors and friends.  This customer base has grown, due to her good treatment and because of references from existing buyers.  Her main product lines are pants for women, men and children, shirts, sweaters, shoes, perfume, etc.  She sells on credit and for cash, and works 12 hours a day without a break. She prefers to buy from wholesale warehouses in the commercial zone of the city.  Marlene's principal goals are to restructure her business, to open a store, to ensure the loyalty of her customers, and to save money, so as to enjoy the fruits of her labors.  She is applying for her first Kiva loan now through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy pants, jeans, shirts and perfumes.  She needs to take advantage of the biggest commercial season of the year, in order to earn a bit more by working hard and to finally achieve her dreams of prosperity.

loans.use: to buy pants, jeans, shorts and perfume.

loans.name: Manos Unidas Group

texts.es: Sra. soledad de 30 años soltera y con  2 hijos, la Sra. soledad  se dedica ya hace 2 años a la venta de ropa  para damas como para caballeros en un pequeño local  todos los días con el merito de salir adelante y así poder ayudar a su familia y poder pagar los colegios de sus hijos con el esfuerzo que tiene de salir adelante ,  la Sra. Soledad   ha logrado mejorar su economía  y mejorar su calidad de vida , y  así Seguir mejorando su negocio , su mayor sueño en la vida es que sus hijos sean profesionales , Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más ropas para seguir progresando y así poder tener más ingresos. Ah la Sra. Soledad es la  segunda de la mano izquierda se le distingue por su casaca de color blanco con mangas de color negro A la vez se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en: Soledad is 30 years old, single and has two children.  Soledad has been selling women’s and men’s clothing from a small shop every day for two years so she can get ahead and help her family and pay for her children’s schooling.  Soledad has improved her finances and quality of life.  Her greatest dream is for her children to become professionals.  She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing so she can continue making progress and increase her income.  Soledad is the second from the left, dressed in white with black sleeves.  She sends a hug to Kiva and Edaprospo and is grateful for the loan because it makes her progress possible.

loans.use: to buy clothing,

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María de 53 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. María se gana la vida mediante la elaboración de variedad de platillos los cuales vende en el mercado de su localidad. Muchas personas prefieren su comida ya que ofrece excelente calidad y buenos precios. Desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de cubrir una mayor demanda ya que muchas veces se ha quedado desbastecida y en vista de esto ha pensado en aprovechar dicha oportunidad. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de la materia prima como: carnes, pollo, verduras, frijoles, arroz, aceite, etc. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Maria is 53 years old and has been living in a home of her own with her family for a long time.  Maria earns a living making a variety of dishes, which she sells in the local market.  Many people prefer to buy from her because she offers excellent quality and good prices.  She wants to invest into her business and cover an increased demand that at times leaves her sold out and she has thought about taking advantage of this opportunity.  She is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy meats, chicken, vegetables, rice, cooking oil, etc.  She says that she has the means to pay off the loan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es: El grupo “Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros” conformada por 07 mujeres emprendedoras que buscan mejorar cada día. Este es el caso de Blanca la cual cuenta con una librería hace más de 05 años, negocio que le ha permitido mejorar su vivienda. Con el fin de seguir mejorando solicitó el crédito, pues comprará útiles escolares como cuadernos, lapiceros, fólderes y borradores. El deseo de Blanca es de seguir implementando su negocio. Blanca de 30 años es  casada con 01 hijo aún dependiente. El grupo “Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Blanca se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho viste polo celeste la podemos apreciar con  su hija.
texts.en: The “Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros” group is made up of seven enterprising women who are looking to improve daily.  Blanca tells us that she has had a bookstore for more than five years and it has allowed her to improve her home.  She is asking for a loan so she can buy school supplies, such as notebooks, pencils, folders, and erasures.  Blanca wants to continue implementing her business.  She has been married for 30 years and has a daughter.  The “Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros” group is grateful for those who made this loan possible.  Blanca is seated on the right, wearing a polo shirt and has her daughter with her.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mujeres Para Un Futuro Mejor Group

texts.es: Maribel de 32 años  es soltera con 01 hijo dependiente, actualmente es socia del grupo “Mujeres Para Un Futuro Mejor” constituida por 06 socios trabajadores que pasan a su 2do ciclo. Maribel cuenta con un puesto la cual ofrece  postres como mazamorra morada, arroz con leche, mazamorra de calabaza, entre otras delicias. Gracia a su esfuerzo Maribel puede seguir apoyando a su menor hijo. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de insumos como leche, azúcar, arroz, calabaza  y canelas.  Poner otro puesto de postres es su mayor anhelo. El grupo “Mujeres Para Un Futuro Mejor” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Maribel se encuentra sentada es la segunda del lado derecho y vistes blusa plomo con rayas blancas.
texts.en: Maribel is 32 years old, single and has a son.  She is a member of the “Mujeres Para Un Futuro Mejor” group, made up of six hardworking members in their second cycle.  Maribel has a shop where she offers desserts such as porridge, rice pudding, pumpkin porridge, and other delicacies.  Thanks to her efforts, Maribel can continue supporting her young son.  She will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients such as milk, sugar, rice, pumpkins, and cinnamon.  Setting up another point of sale is her greatest desire.  The “Mujeres Para Un Futuro Mejor” is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the assistance.  Maribel is seated and the second from the right wearing a grey blouse with white stripes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Dúo Tu En Mi Group

texts.es:
Dúo Tú En Mí
Este Dúo está conformado por Natalia es originaria del municipio de San Martin Jilotepeque, se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral como lo son: gallinas, pollos, vacas,  marranos, y bordados y tejidos típicos,es una mujer luchadora que se esfuerza pos darle lo mejor a sus hijos y el sueño de ella es poder tener ingresos para seguir dando estudio a sus hijos. es responsable en sus pagos y solicita el crédito para comprar animales, concentrado y telas para bordar y tejer.
texts.en:
Dúo Tú En Mí

Natalia is part of this duo.  She is from the town of San Martin Jilotepeque and raises corral animals such as chickens, cows, pigs, and also does typical knitting and weavings.  She is a hardworking woman who works to provide her children with what they need and her dream is to be able to have income to continue providing for her children’s education.  She is responsible with her payments and is asking for a loan to buy animals, concentrated feed, and fabric to embroider and knit.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
Augusto tiene 50 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío de Pandachin, una zona rural del distrito Cañaris, su población se dedica a la agricultura principalmente el cultivo de café, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Ferreñafe, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado vacuno, cuenta con invernas propias donde cría su ganado vacuno, también se dedica a la agricultura de de café y cultivos de pan llevar , es un padre emprendedor anteriormente ya había solicitado un préstamo con Edpyme Alternativa que le ayudo en su negocio, ahora el ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de ganado vacuno y posteriormente engordarlo y ofrecerlo en el Puerto de Chiple que es el lugar donde se comercializa este tipo de ganado y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Augusto is 50 years old, and lives with his wife and children in Caserio de Pandachin, a rural area of the Canaris district.  This district is located in the province of Ferrenafe, which is part of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  People in this region work primarily in agriculture, commerce and livestock.  Augusto works raising and selling cattle.  He has his own pastures where he raises his cattle.  He also grows coffee and staple food crops.  He is an enterprising father who has previously requested a loan through Edpyme Alternativa which helped him in his business.  He is now requesting a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to invest in  buying cattle and then fattening them and selling them in the port of Chiple, which is the principal marketplace for cattle.  In this way he hopes to earn more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to sell them later at a higher price.

loans.name: Maria Minia

texts.es: María de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su querido esposo desde hace mucho tiempo. María es una mujer emprendedora, responsable y trabajadora. Tiene 13 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de antojitos típicos como: pupusas, enchiladas, tamales, pasteles de carne y yuca frita. Tiene muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más ya que ofrece productos de buena calidad y a muy buenos precios. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios ( yuca, maíz, frijoles, quesos, verduras, aceite, etc.) para cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado y así poder aumentar  las ventas y por consecuencia sus ganancias.
texts.en: Maria is 54 years old and lives in a home of her own with her long time loving husband.  Maria is an enterprising, responsible, and hardworking woman who has been making typical food, such as pupusas, enchiladas, tamales, meat pies, and fried yucca for 13 years.  She has many customers who prefer to buy from her each day because of her good quality and good prices.  She is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy ingredients such as yucca, corn, beans, cheeses, vegetables, cooking oil, etc.) so she can cover her increased market demand, and be able to increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: Hector está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que ele han brindado el podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, como arroz al por mayor, azúcar, fideos, entre otros productos con lo cual podrá abastecer su negocio, sobre todo porque es temporada navideña y de esta manera atenderá mejor a sus clientes y mejorar sus ventas, lo cual le permitirá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una distribuidora de alimentos”.
texts.en: Hector is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to their help he has been able to buy merchandise, such as sugar, noodles, and other products in quantity for his small grocery and beverage business, with which he can stock his store because it’s the Christmas season and he will be better able to serve his customers and improve his sales.  He will be able to continue working toward reaching his great dream, “To have a food distributorship.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Manuel Gabriel

texts.es: Manuel está agradecido por el apoyo y la oportunidad que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar enseres para su hogar, ya que actualmente no se encuentran en buenas condiciones, de esta manera el podrá salir a trabajar más tranquilo, sobre todo porque tiene un pequeño hijo el cual necesita vivir en mejores condiciones, de esta manera el seguirá trabajando y luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una buena  educación a su pequeño hijo”.
texts.en: Manuel is grateful for the support and opportunity he is getting from the Kiva lenders because now he can buy fixtures for his house since they are currently in bad shape.  Now he can be more relaxed when he goes out to work.  Above all, he has a small child who needs to live under better conditions.  In this way he can continue working and striving to make his dream a reality, “To provide a good education for his son.”

loans.use: to buy household fixtures.

loans.name: Dúo Vista Hermosa De Patzun Group

texts.es:
Dúo vista hermosa de patzun
la señora Delfina  de 34 años de edad vive en patzun Chimaltenango,se ha dedicado  al negocio le gusta trabajar luchar por su familia, por tres años  ha solicitado crédito a Fape/KIVA  y eso le ha ayudado  mucho ya que  cada vez  que se le otorga su crédito  ella invierte en su negocio que es tienda de trajes típicos,
su  sueños es darle lo mejor a sus hijos que ellos crezcan darle estudio  para que cuando sean grandes  tengan oportunidades de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Dúo Vista Hermosa de Patzun

Delfina is 34 years old and lives in Patzun Chimaltenango, has a business and strives for her family.  She has been asking for loans through Fape/Kiva for three years and they have helped her very much because she invests in her business, typical outfits of clothing, each time she gets a loan.  Her dream is to provide the best for her children so that they will grow up and be educated so they will have better opportunities to get ahead when they grow up.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Dúo Villa Lobos Group

texts.es: Dúo Villa Lobos, el señor Mynor de 27 años de edad,se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, se ha dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la venta, esperando que le puedan ayudar ya que en este tiempo de fin de año sus ventas aumentan y es muy buen tiempo para crecer un poco mas en sus ventas.
texts.en:
Villa Lobos Duo
Mynor is 27 years old and has worked for several years selling food products.  He is requesting a loan to buy food products to sell.  He hopes that you can help him, because during this season at the end of the year his sales increase, and it is a good time to grow his business a bit more.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: El Sol De Cupiche Group

texts.es: “EL SOL DE CUPICHE”  es uno de los grupos puntuales en sus cuotas. Los socios del mencionado grupo se dedicada al comercio minorista y a prestar servicios en diversas aéreas. Aydee  tiene 29 años es conviviente con un hijo dependiente. Ella se dedica al a venta de ropa para niños solo a pedido de sus clientes fidelizados y algunos clientes externos. Años atrás vendía ropa para adultos ella cambio el giro de su negocio ya que la venta de ropa de adultos no le generaba mucha ganancia que a diferencia que con la de venta de ropa para niños obtiene mejores ganancias. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de polos short gorras. Ella implementara su negocio con la venta de zapatos y zapatillas para niños En el grupo cumple la función de presidenta. En el  grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Aydee es la tercera del lado derecho viste casaca fucsia.
texts.en: “EL SOL DE CUPICHE” is one of the groups on time with their payments.  The members are small business people and provide services in various areas.  Aydee is 29 years old and lives with her dependent son.  She sells children’s clothing, but only to order to her loyal customers and a few others.  Years ago she sold adults’ clothing, but she changed her business because adult clothing didn’t generate as much profit as children’s.  She will use the money from this loan to buy polo shirts, shorts, and hats.  She will add children’s shoe and slipper sales to her business.  She is the group’s president and is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their loan.  Aydee is the third from the right, wearing a fuchsia top.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 68 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrtio de Zaña, que se encuentra cerca al valle del Río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse en la agricultura, su población también se dedica al comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores borregos, patos, pavos, conejos, cuyes desde hace más de 10 años, Luzmila se dedica a esta labor para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares, es una madre emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de animales patos, pavos y alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor producción de animales para generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Luzmila is 68 years old and lives with her husband in the Zana district, which is located near the Rio Jequetepeque valley, in the province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  People in this area work in agriculture and livestock.  Luzmila has worked for more than 10 years raising and selling small animals such as lambs, ducks, turkeys, rabbits and guinea pigs.  She does this work to support her husband with the household expenses, and is an enterprising mother.  She is requesting a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles through Edpyme Alternativa to buy animals such as ducks and turkeys, and balanced feed to fatten them, and thus to offer her customers a better product and to earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy small animals and balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Eduardo Antonio

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Eduardo, quien con su credikiva anterior logró comprar materias primas como pollo, carne, cerdo, jamón, chorizo, salsas y aderezos, con los que preparó los más deliciosos perros calientes, hamburguesas, entre otros productos y deleito a su clientela, que muy pronto acabaron con sus inventarios. En la actualidad está muy entusiasmado, porque  su negocio mejoró, se incrementaron sus ventas y sus utilidades, por eso ha vuelto a solicitar un financiamiento, porque aprovechará la gran demanda de la temporada, mediante la cual aspira a hacer sus mejores ventas de fin de año. Esta es la razón por la cual su inversión, la presume como muy exitosa, pues con ella comprará salsas, aderezos, carne vacuna y porcina, en mayor volumen para ganar descuentos y salir adelante rápidamente.
texts.en: Thank you for supporting Eduardo, who used his last Kiva loan to buy basic ingredients such as chicken, beef, pork, sausage, sauces and dressings with which to make the most delicious hot dogs, hamburgers and other products to delight his customers so that he soon ran short of inventory.  He is now very enthusiastic because his business has improved, and his sales and profits have increased.  For this reason he has now returned to request a loan, in order to take advantage of the great seasonal demand, with which he hopes to makes his best sales at the end of the year.  This is the reason for his investment, which he assumes will be very successful, as he will use it to buy sauces, dressings, beef and pork in larger quantities in order to obtain a discount and to quickly get ahead.

loans.use: to buy sauces, dressings, beef and pork in larger quantities.

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
EDITH ESTHER, tiene 38 años de edad, tiene dos hijos menores. Ella forma parte del grupo "Las Mercedes", formado por seis socias. Es un grupo recién formado unidas por la necesidad de generar ingresos extras, apoyar a sus parejas con los gastos de la casa y salir adelante mediante un trabajo honrado.
Desde hace aproximadamente tres años Edith Esther se dedica a la venta de fruta en un mercado de su zona, inició éste negocio con lo idea de solo trabajar un tiempo, pero ya que le fue bien decidió seguir.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de javas de fruta para ofrecer variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
EDITH ESTHER is 38 years old and has two young children.  She is a member of the “Las Mercedes” group, made up of six members.  It’s a newly formed group and united out of a need to generate extra income to support their husbands with the household expenses and get ahead through honest work.

Edith Esther has been selling fruit in the area market for about three years.  She began this business with the idea of only working a short time, but things went well so she decided to continue.  She will use the money from this loan to buy fruit so she can offer a variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
Kuña Katupyry  se formó con la unión de amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, donde todas ponen su mayor predisposición para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras. Forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde todas ponen su mayor esfuerzo por mejorar y crecer.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Venancia, quien es la presidenta de este grupo, ella comenta que siempre ayuda a sus compañeras y también las insta a seguir trabajando y luchando como lo vienen haciendo. Ella por su parte vende prendas variadas, y con ese trabajo ayuda a su familia y trata de darles todo para que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades.
Pide este préstamo como un medio de invertir en su emprendimiento, ya que quiere comprar prendas de verano, ya que se acerca el calor y quiere tener una buena variedad que ofrecer a  sus clientes.
texts.en: Kuna Katupyry is made up of a group of friends and neighbors in the city of Villa Elisa, where they make their best efforts to help each other.  They are part of the poverty-elimination program, in which they all try their hardest to improve and grow.  One of the members is Venancia, who is the president.  She says that she always helps her colleagues and urges them to keep on working and struggling as they have been doing.  She sells a variety of clothing, and with this work she helps her family and tries to give them everything, so that they will lack nothing.  She is requesting this loan to invest in her inventory, because the hot season is coming and she would like to have a good variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ceferino

texts.es:
Ceferino tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío de Pandachi una zona rural del distrito de Cañaris, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Ferreñafe, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura cultiva maíz, yuca y principalmente cafe, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos, con la compra de abono y pago de mano de obra y de esta manera tener una mejor producción en cuanto a calidad para ofrecer a buen precio a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Ceferino is 41 years old, and lives with his wife and children in Caserio be Pandachu, a rural zone in the Canaris disctrict, which is located in the province of Ferrenafe.  This province belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern cost of Peru.  People in this rural zone work at agriculture, commerce, and livestock.  Ceferino works in agriculture, growing corn, yucca and primarily coffee, and has about 10 years experience in this field.  He is requesting a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to maintain his crops, by buying manure and paying laborers.  In this way he hopes to increase the quality of his product, which he will sell at a good price to his customers and earn more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy manure to maintain his crop and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Sahei Lom Group

texts.en:
“God is the provider and it is amazing how the provider provides for the needy”, was the word from Hatnem. She is the sole breadwinner in the family and a staunch believer in the divine. She is one of the members of the Sahei Lom Group and the featured borrower. She is pictured with her hand raised. Her husband manages the house and takes care of the family affairs.
 
Vegetable selling is her main business to generate income. She gets the vegetables from cultivators at cheaper rates and sells them in the nearby town market shed and once in a while, she also sells them in the capital market in Imphal. Her business requires frequent traveling since the suppliers stay in the village and she has to go there to get the vegetables. She sells vegetables according to the season, which helps to continue her rolling income. At the beginning, she used to share the profits because the capital money was equally distributed among the business partners. After she joined this group, she managed to start her own business, which enables her to earn more income.

With the Kiva loan, she will purchase a variety of seeds to supply to as many cultivators as possible. She says cultivators favor those who can provide them seeds and saplings in bounty when they really need them because it is difficult for them to buy seeds and saplings due to a shortage of money. When the vegetables are ready to be sold, the cultivators give them priority in respect to distribution of the vegetables. They get more supplies than those random vegetable vendors who do not supply seeds at the beginning.

She is glad that she can fulfil her next business cycle without asking for money from the money lenders at a high interest. She will try her best to repay the loan as she always did with her previous loans. She says, “Thank you so much Kiva”. She wishes to continue the relationship with Kiva and WSDS,  she says with full enthusiasm.
 
The rest of the group members are engaged in garment selling, operating a tea hotel,  supplying water, operating a paan shop, selling vegetables, and operating a piggery.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of seeds

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is 27 years old, married, and lives in Gaza with her husband. She started her beauty salon business in 2009, and she has had a good experience in this field. Sahar asked Ryada for this loan to buy a hair dryer, makeup tools, and electronics for her salon. This will help her to improve her business, which will enable her to improve her financial situation.

She dreams of expanding her business, and would like to use part of the profits on her children’s education in the future. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer, makeup tools, and electronics for her salon.

loans.name: Emad

texts.en:
Emad is 28 years old. He lives with his wife and two children in Nablus. One of his children attends primary school. Nablus is a city in the northern West Bank, approximately 49 kilometers north of Jerusalem, with a population of 126,132. 

Emad does not have enough money to do some work in his house so he applied for a loan to improve the house and make it better. He wants to extend the plumbing and install doors, which will help to warm the house, especially now that it is winter.

Emad said that this loan will help him a lot and he is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to extend the plumbing and install doors in his house

loans.name: El Taller Del Maestro Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres socias trabajadoras una de ellas es Blanca tiene la edad de 21 años, casada, con un hijo, su negocio es un taller de zapatería que tiene desde hace 10 años, comercializa sus sandalias en Rivas. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de materiales como pega amarilla, pega blanca, charol, suelas, forro, royal, fibra, flores. Saida tiene la edad de 49 años su negocio es la venta de dulce, Regina de 22 años su negocio  es la venta de verduras.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard-working members, one of which is Blanca. She is 21 years old, married and has one son. She has been running a shoe workshop for the past 10 years and sells her sandals in the city of Rivas. She has been a client of the institution for one year, and is requesting the loan in order to buy materials such as yellow and white glues, patent leather, soles, lining, linen, fibre, and flowers.

Saida is 49 years old and runs a business selling sweets. Regina is 22 years old and runs a business selling vegetables.

loans.use: to buy materials such as yellow and white glues, patent leather, soles, lining, linen, fibre, and flowers.

loans.name: Gisagara Group

texts.fr:
J. Claude fait partie du groupe Gisagara et habite à  Rumonge. Il  a 36 ans et est marié à  Acqueline, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants,  âgés de  1  à 13 ans, dont 3 étudient.  

Il fait le commerce de  boutique (haricot, riz, maїs,..) depuis 3  ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  100kg de haricot, 100kg de riz, et 100kg de maїs à revendre pour gagner plus.

Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait  acheter  un champ de palmiers à huile et voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
J. Claude is a member of the Gisagara group and lives in Rumonge. He is 36 years old and married to Acqueline, a trader. Together they have six children, aged between 1 and thirteen years old. Three of the children are in school.  

J. Claude has been running a shop (selling beans, rice, maize, etc.) for three years. 

This is his first loan from Turame. This KIVA loan will increase his capital and help him buy 100kg of beans, 100kg of rice and 100kg of maize, which he will resell in order to make more money.

In the years to come, J. Claude would like to buy a palm grove and see his children study.

loans.use: increase his capital and buy 100kg of beans, 100kg of rice and 100kg of maize to resell in order to make more money

loans.name: Dúo Enrriqueta Group

texts.es: Dúo Enrriqueta, la señora Karla de 42 años de edad, es una persona muy luchadora ella se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, se ha dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para surtir mas su negocio, esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: The Dúo Enrriqueta Group includes Karla, 42, who is a hard-working person who runs a grocery store.  She has been in business for several years and is requesting a loan to buy goods to stock her store.  She hopes you will be able to help her with the loan.

loans.use: To buy groceries to sell.

loans.name: Luchando Por Un Sueño Group

texts.es: Angélica tiene 63 años es casada. Ser socia del grupo “LUCHANDO POR UN SUEÑO” le ha permitido mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Hace 40 años se dedica a la venta de materiales para renovar calzados. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de suelas tintes pegamentos hebillas tacones. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Angélica es la tercera del lado izquierdo viste casaca azul y polo verde.
texts.en:
Angélica, 63, is married and belongs to the "LUCHANDO POR UN SUEÑO" communal bank group which has helped her to improve her income.  For 40 years she has been selling materials for shoe repair.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy soles, dye, heels, buckles and glues.  

The group is grateful to KIVA lenders for the loan.  Angélica is the third woman from the left in a blue jacket and green shirt.

loans.use: To buy soles, heels, buckles and glue.

loans.name: Cora Maurelina

texts.es:
