She has been an Edaprospo client for one year, and she is engaged in selling breakfast.  She began through friends that guided her to this business and opened her own business independently. She has about 150 customers daily and the number is growing steadily.  She also provides meals in the evenings.  Through her work, Dora has managed to provide her family with a better quality of life since she is the sole provider for her children.  She pays for the costs of meals, education, clothing, and household bills.  In the future, she plans to continue growing and expanding her business.  She will use the loan to purchase merchandise.  Dora belongs to the “Cristo El Salvador” [Christ the Savior] communal bank, which is comprised of six members and she is president.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Gilma

texts.es: María de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida quien es albañil y le colabora con los gastos del hogar. María se dedica a la comercialización de tienda desde hace dos años. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante. Hace algunos meses comenzó a construir su vivienda pero por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar,  razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera para dar fin a su vivienda.
texts.en:
María, age 49, lives in her own house with her life partner.  He is a bricklayer, and he contributes to the household expenses.  María has been selling from her store for two years.  This is the way she earns a living.  She and her life partner are getting ahead together.

Some months ago she started to build her house.  However, due to the lack of financial resources, she has not managed to finish it.  That is the reason she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy galvanized metal sheeting, nails, and wood to finish her house.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, nails, and wood to finish her house.

loans.name: Jessica Paola

texts.es:
Jessica es una señora de 34 años, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en su casa propia en Santo Domingo de los Colorados, ciudad con un clima agradable, conocida también por ser una zona muy comercial y productiva.
Jessica trabaja junto con su esposo todas las tardes, ellos elaboran muebles y artesanías de bambú, hacen entregas dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Este arte la aprendió de su suegro quien anteriormente tenía este taller, pero falleció y les dejó esta herencia. Ellos dedican 5 horas todos los días a esta labor que la hacen con todo el amor del mundo.
Jessica acudió a Fundación Alternativa por buenas referencias, visitó la agencia para recibir información y le gustó mucho el servicio brindando. Se siente muy agradecida con la institución y con Kiva ya que gracias a este crédito podrá comprar más bambú que está de oportunidad y así poder realizar más artículos y venderlos para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Jessica, age 34, lives with her husband and their four children in her own house in Santo Domingo de los Colorados.  It is a city with a pleasant climate, and it is known for being a very commercial and productive area.

Jessica works with her husband every afternoon.  They make furniture and handicrafts from bamboo.  They make deliveries within and outside of the city.  She learned this art from her father-in-law, who previously had a workshop.  However, he passed away, and he left them this legacy.  They spend five hours every day on this work.  They work with all of the love in the world.

Jessica came to the Fundación Alternative because of its good reputation.  She visited the agency in order to get information, and she really liked the  service provided.  She is very grateful to the institution and to Kiva.  Thanks to this loan she will be able to buy more bamboo that is on sale.  This way she will make more items and sell them in order to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy bamboo to make more items.

loans.name: Santos Ceferino

texts.es: Santos de 27 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad. Santos se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan francés en su casa de habitación. Santos es muy conocido en la zona como un hombre responsable quien hace toso lo que este a su alcance para ganarse la vida y dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones. Santos desea invertir en su panadería por lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración del pan, tales como: harina y un cilindro para hacer el pan francés.
texts.en:
27-year old Santos lives in his own house together with his wife and two children aged 5 and 2. He earns his living making and selling French bread in his house. He is well known throughout the area as a responsible man who does everything he can to earn money and provide his children a better standard of living.

Santos wishes to invest in his bakery so he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy the ingredients necessary for making bread such as flour and a cylindrical-shaped mould for the French bread.

loans.use: buy flour and a cylindrical-shaped mould for French bread.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 33 years old and married, with four children. 

She has a small garden where she grows vegetables that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. 

Rosalina needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a rake, vegetable seeds, a garden hose, gloves, and a shovel. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Rosalina will use the profits from her sales to improve her house and save some in her saving account for her family's future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a rake, vegetable seeds, a garden hose, gloves, and a shovel

loans.name: Aifaanuu

texts.en:
Aifaanuu is 49 years old amd married, with seven children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Aifaanuu has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, and a pickaxe. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Aifaanuu hopes to save more in her saving account to improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, and a pickaxe

loans.name: Jardín Esperanza Group

texts.es: Felipe, quien aparece a la derecha de la fotografía de lentes y polera rayada azul con verde, pertenece al Banco Comunal  Jardín Esperanza de Lota. En este Banco Comunal los socios tienen diversos rubros tales como la venta de ropa, negocios de abarrotes, librerías, panadería y tarjeterías. Felipe vende sushi, comenzó hace un año con amigos haciendo sushi para ellos hasta que se les ocurrió poder vender para tener más dinero, fue así como empezaron a vender, es por esto además que uno de sus próximos desafíos es poder tener su negocio establecido. El dinero que está solicitando es para comprar más insumos y una maquina conservadora de alimentos. Durante este último tiempo le ha ido muy bien con las ventas es por esto que requiere lo antes posible el dinero ya que así podrá seguir vendiendo sus ricos sushis. Felipe cuenta que lo que más le gusta de trabajar junto a Fondo Esperanza es poder acceder de manera fácil al crédito.
texts.en: In the photo, Felipe appears on the right, wearing glasses and a blue and green striped shirt.  He belongs to the “Jardín Esperanza de Lota” communal bank where members have diverse businesses such as clothing sales, grocery stores, bookstores, bakeries, and card stores.  Felipe sells sushi.  A year ago, he began making sushi for his friends until it occurred to them that they could sell their product to make extra money. This was how they began to sell, and one of his next challenges is being able to set up his business.   He will use the funds he is requesting to purchase more supplies and a freezer.  Sales have been going very well lately, and for this reason, he needs the funds as soon as possible so that he can continue selling his delicious sushi.  Felipe says that what he likes the most about working with “Fondo Esperanza”, is being able to easily access credit.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and a freezer.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de cafetín, el cual ha logrado un negocio estable y rentable. Se siente agradecida con Kiva y MiCredito ya que pudo invertir y empezar con este tipo de negocio, para obtener otra entrada de ingresos. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar: caramelos, azúcar, vasos, servilletas entre otros, con el fin de ofrecer productos que solicita su clientela. Estima que el crédito será beneficioso ya que podrá obtener ganancias para seguir invirtiendo en otro negocio y tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Flor is originally from the city of Granada. She is engaged in the cafe business and has a stable and profitable business. 

She is grateful to Kiva and MiCredito as she could invest and open this type of business in order to have another path to income.

She is asking for a new loan in order to buy: candies, sugar, glasses, napkins and more, in order to be able to provide the products that her customers request. She thinks that the loan will be beneficial as she will be able to obtain earnings in order to continue investing in another business and have more income.

loans.use: to buy candy, bread, sugar, glasses, napkins, and other items.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella posee una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como aceite, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, etc. desde hace varios años, posee clientela que la buscan y la prefieren por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, doña Carmen está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercadería por mayor y así poder surtir mas la tienda  para atender mejor a sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su compañero de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen is 62 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner. 

She has owned a little store for several years where she sells basic necessities such as oil, rice, beans, sugar, etc. She has customers that look for her and prefer her because of the good prices and the friendly customer service. With the money she gets from the sales she is able to cover some of the household expenses. 

Carmen is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies in bulk and thus be able to supply her store and be able to better assist her customers and obtain better profits in order to have a better quality of life with her life partner.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar, etc. at wholesale prices

loans.name: Faasu

texts.en: Faasu is 44 years old and married with six children. She would like to start a small business sewing clothes in her community. In order to do this, Faasu needs a loan to buy a sewing machine, needles, threads, materials, and oil. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her children's school fees. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, needles, threads, materials, and oil.

loans.name: Ausiva

texts.en: Ausiva is 35 years old and single with no children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for many years. Ausiva has requested a loan to buy a canoe, fishing net, fishing gear, and spear. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Ausiva will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a canoe, fishing net, fishing gear, and spear.

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en: Temukisa is 22 years old and is married with three children. She runs a small business selling meat buns in her community and has been doing this for two years. Temukisa has requested a loan to buy flour, cooking oil, salts, onions, a large cooking pot, and a new oven. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Temukisa will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, salts, onions, a large cooking pot, and a new oven.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Doña Ana Julia, con 40 años de edad, se dedica al comercio. Es casada, tiene 3 hijos  para los cuales trabaja diariamente, para darles sustento y  educación. Doña Ana Julia se dedica a la venta de ropa y artículos varios, vende en su casa y también tiene un tramo en el mercado oriental, el que ha ido agrandando y variando su oferta a través de créditos. Motivo por el cual ahora también está solicitando crédito, para seguir invirtiendo y tenerlo surtido en éstas épocas navideñas.
texts.en: Ana Julia is 40 years old, and engaged in business.  She is married with three children and she works daily for them, providing them with support and education.  She is engaged in selling clothing and various articles.  She sells from home, and also has a stand in the western market.  She has been enlarging and varying her supplies through loans.  The reason she is requesting credit now is to continue investing and have stock during the holiday season.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of men's and ladies' footwear.

loans.name: Maria Rosana

texts.es: Maria es una mujer trabajadora, ha sacado adelante a sus hijos, apoyándoles en todo lo que ella puede. Algunos de ellos ya son independientes y le apoyan económicamente. Maria con el crédito anterior construyó un muro en su vivienda. Ahora como parte de su sueño de ver su casa terminada, solicita el crédito para construir una habitación en su vivienda, por lo que comprará materiales de construcción. Maria se dedica a la venta de ropa y nacatamales y es de esta manera como genera ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a hardworking woman who has helped her children get on in life in every way she can. Some of them have already left home and help her financially.

With her previous loan Maria built a wall in her home. Now part of her dream is to see her house completed so she is seeking a loan to build a room inside the house. She wishes to buy construction materials.

Maria earns her living by selling clothing and nacatamales (a type of tamale made with maize, rice etc.). In this way she earns money for her family.

loans.use: build a room inside her house

loans.name: Baldomero

texts.es:
Baldomero, a sus 56 años de edad, se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre amable y servicial; se ha dedicado durante varios años a trabajar como comerciante independiente, vendiendo frutas, mecato, dulces, productos de aseo personal y también ofrece pescado congelado; el negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia en el que trabaja solo todos los días de 8 am a 8 pm; además cuenta con la ventaja de no poseer competencia directa en el sector, lo que le ha permitido lograr ser reconocido en el vecindario.
El crédito que solicita como apoyo, es para invertirlo en la compra de surtido al por mayor (frutas en cosecha, pescado, dulces, mecato, entre otros); esto le permitirá tener disponibilidad suficiente para solventar la demanda de sus productos y así mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
Baldomero sueña con seguir trabajando en la acreditación y fortalecimiento de su negocio, para que le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable que le permita disfrutar de una vejez más tranquila y con mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
56-year old Baldomero is known as a friendly and obliging man. For several years he has worked as an independent businessman selling fruit, cakes, candy, personal hygiene products, as well as frozen fish. His business is located in his house; he works alone from 8 am to 8 pm every day. He has the advantage of having no direct competition nearby, and has become well-known in his neighbourhood.

The loan Baldomero is seeking will be used to buy more stock at wholesale prices, such as seasonal fruit, fish, candy, cakes etc. As a result he will be able to satisfy his customers’ requests and increase sales and income.

His dream is to continue working and growing his business so that he will be guaranteed a stable income allowing him to enjoy a quieter old age and a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy stock such as seasonal fruit, fish, candy, cakes etc.

loans.name: Heliodora

texts.es: Heliodora de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto, ella se dedica  a la venta de refrescos como: jugos, agua, gaseosas, etc. desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela pues son productos muy vendibles y los da a buenos precios, Heliodora esta solicitando un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar mas refrescos por mayor y asi poder aumentar sus ganancias y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Heliodora is 62 years old. She lives in her own home with her daughter and grandson. 

She makes a living by selling beverages like juice, water, soft drinks, etc. For many years, her business has been located in her home. She has many customers because her products are very well-sold and she offers them at good prices.

Heliodora is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase more beverages in bulk so that she can increase her earnings and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase juice, water, soft drinks, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Ilcia Noemy

texts.es: Ilicia de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra, dicho negocio es muy importante ya que con los ingresos que percibe su esposo no logran cubrir los gastos del hogar. por lo anterior solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una galera para ordenar los materiales y así sea más fácil el proceso para la venta. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Ilicia, who is 33 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and their 4 children, who are in school. She makes a living by purchasing and selling scraps. Her business is very important because her husband's income does not cover their household expenses.

She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a shed to organize her materials so it will be easier to process and sell them. With the loan, she will purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to build a shed.

loans.name: Jorge Ernesto

texts.es: Jorge de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija de 3 años de edad, el posee un pequeña librería en su lugar de habitación desde hace 2 años, posee mucha clientela, que lo prefieren por la calidad de los productos, los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, obtiene buenas ganancias especialmente en los meses de diciembre y julio que es cuando empiezan las clases, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Jorge está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor como: cuadernos de diferentes números, lapiceros, lápices, colores, crayolas, plumones, papelería de diferentes color, etc. y poder surtir aun mas su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poder le dar su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge is 32 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and 3-year-old daughter. He had a small bookstore in his home for 2 years. He has many customers and they prefer his store for the quality of the products, the good prices, and his friendly service.

He earns good money, especially in July and December, which is when classes start. With his earnings, he has been able to pay for household expenses.

Jorge is requesting a loan to purchase more merchandise like notebooks, pens, pencils, colored pencils, crayons, felt-tip pens, different colors of paper, etc. so that he will be able to stock his business, which his his only source of income, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, pens, pencils, colored pencils, crayons, felt-tip pens, different colors of paper, etc.

loans.name: Juana Cecilia

texts.es: Juana de 40 años de edad se dedica desde hace 6 años a la comercialización de ropa para damas y caballeros lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con esposo, Juana está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor y poder surtir aun mas su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de  trabajo y así ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juana is 40 years old. For the past 6 years, she has been selling women's and men's clothing by walking to different areas near her home. She has many customers due to the quality of her products and the good prices. With the money that she earns, she is able to pay for household expenses.

She lives in her own home with her husband. Juana is requesting a loan to purchase clothing in bulk so that she will be able to stock her business more, since it is her only source of income. This way, her and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en: Faaifo is a 38 year old woman with 6 children. She has a small plantation and grows varieties of vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Faaifo has requested a loan to buy fertilizer, wheel barrow, shovels, gloves and mist blower. She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Faaifo hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, wheel barrow, shovels, gloves and mist blower.

loans.name: Atoa

texts.en: Atoa is 62 years old with two children. She runs a small business selling drinks in her community and has been doing this for two years. Atoa has requested a loan to buy flavor mixtures, sugar, empty bottles and a new freezer. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Atoa will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy flavor mixes, sugar, empty bottles and a new freezer.

loans.name: Alonso Danilo

texts.es: Alonso de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 7 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Él se dedica a la críanza y venta de ganado. Es un hombre muy trabajador que con mucho esfuerzo va sacando a su hijo adelante. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio de ganado para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar un ternero para criarlo y luego venderlo. Espera poder tener resultados positivos con la inversión para así poder ir mejorando su negocio como sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Alonso is 32 years old and lives in his own home with his 7-year-old son, who is studying at the local school. 

He makes a living by raising and selling cattle. He is a hardworking man who, with much effort, is moving his son forward. With the goal of improving his income, he has made the decision ton invest in his cattle business, so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase a calf, which he will raise and later sell.

He hopes to have positive results from the loan so that he can continue to improve his business and his income.

loans.use: to purchase a calf.

loans.name: Chickey

texts.en:
Chickey is a 21-year-old single woman who has had a small lawn mowing business for many years.

Chickey needs a loan to buy a new lawn mower, petrol, oil and safety gears. She will use her profits to provide for her family's everyday needs and assist with her business. 

She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new lawn mower, petrol, oil and safety gears.

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es:
Doña María tiene 36 años de edad, es casada y madre de un hijo quien es menor de edad y aun no estudia. Ella es agricultora y comerciante ya que en su casa de habitación tiene una pequeña pulperia y un molino para quebrar maíz con lo que genera ingresos para apoyar la economía en su hogar. Su grado de estudio es de primaria completa la cual pudo terminar gracias al apoyo moral y financiero por parte de sus padres. En el trabajo de campo únicamente su esposo se involucra ya que ella tiene que atender la pulperia y el molino y solo para la temporada de corte de café ella se involucra. Su negocio de pulperia tiene 3 años de trabajarlo siendo sus clientes los mismos habitantes de la comunidad entre otros que llegan a la zona como los intermediarios para la compra de café.
Ella ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de fertilizantes, abono, foliares, entre otros insumos ya que los pocos ingresos que ella genera por parte del negocio del molino y la pulperia no son los suficientes para la compra de estos insumos.
Sus metas y sueños dar a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida, oportunidad de estudiar y que se convierta en un profesional con mejores oportunidades en la vida y en el entorno social. Sus metas reparar su casa de habitación la cual necesita mejoras como repello, un piso digno, entre otros que ayudaran a que su familia se sienta mejor y más cómoda.
texts.en:
Doña María is 36, married, and the mother of a young son who has not yet started school. She completed primary school thanks to the moral and financial support of her parents. Doña María is a farmer and shopkeeper who runs a small grocery store in her home as well as a mill for grinding corn. These two businesses provide income that helps meet the family's expenses. Doña María has run the shop for three years. Her customers are residents of her community as well as people who visit the area, such as wholesale coffee buyers. Doña María's husband takes care of the farm by himself as she has to run the shop and the mill. She only works on the farm during the coffee harvest. 

Doña María has applied for a loan from the COMIXMUL Cooperative for the purchase of fertilizers (some of them foliar, or absorbed through leaves), manure, and other supplies. The income from the shop and the mill aren't enough to purchase these supplies. 

Doña María's goals and dreams include providing a better life for her son. She wants the boy to have the opportunity to study and become a professional with better chances in life and in society. Doña María also wants to make some repairs to her home, which needs plaster, a decent floor, and some other improvements to provide her family greater comfort and security.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for the care of her coffee crop.

loans.name: Nely Suyapa

texts.es:
Doña Nely de 39 años de edad es casada y madre de 5 hijos quienes viven con ella y su esposo y aun dependen de ella ya que 4 de ellos estudian y al salir de sus actividades estudiantiles ayudan a su padre en las diferentes actividades del campo. Doña Nely tiene un grado de estudio primario completo que pudo cursar gracias al apoyo de sus padres. Fueron ellos los que le enseñaron a cultivar café. Actualmente ella se dedica al cultivo de café y hace unos meses ella aprendió a elaborar pan de casa para la venta gracias a su madre quien es comerciante y agricultora. Su esposo a parte de la agricultura también tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería siendo sus clientes vecinos, familiares  y amigos. El terreno donde está sembrado el café esta atrás de su casa de habitación por lo que esto le permite estar más al pendiente de su plantación y de su asistencia.   
Actualmente ella ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL pata la compra de abono, formula cafetalera, fertilizantes, foliares entre otros para poder asistir un cultivo de hortaliza que sembrara permitiendo abonar la tierra, limpiarla y dar la preparación necesaria para obtener una buena cosecha.
Sus planes son mejorar y abonar la tierra que ellos cultivan para que sus cultivos de café y hortalizas manteniendo el grano sano ya que de esta forma ellos podrán contar con una cosecha segura y poder cumplir con su compromiso de pago. Su sueño es como el de toda madre apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios y lograr enviarlos a la universidad para que pueda graduarse y ser unos profesionales con excelencia y preparación con mejores oportunidades en la vida y en donde quiera que vayan.
texts.en:
Nely is 39 years old, married and the mother of five children who live with her and her husband and still depend on her. Four of them go to school, and after school help their father in the various farm activities.

Nely has completed one grade of primary school, which she was able to take, thanks to the support of her parents. It was they who taught her to grow coffee. 

Currently she grows coffee, and a few months ago learned to make homemade bread to sell, thanks to her mother who is a vendor and farmer. Her husband, besides farming, also has a small carpentry workshop. His customers are his neighbors, family members and friends. 

The parcel planted with coffee is behind their home, so this allows her to keep an eye on her plantation and its maintenance. Currently she has requested a loan from the Comixmul cooperative to buy manure, coffee formula fertilizer, other fertilizers, herbicides, foliar sprays and other supplies. This is so she can maintain a vegetable crop that she will plant, allowing her to fertilize the land, clear it, and do the necessary preparation to obtain a good harvest. 

Her plans are to improve and fertilize the land they cultivate, so that their coffee and vegetable crop stay healthy. This way they will be able to have a secure harvest and be able to meet their payment commitment. 

Like any mother, her dream is to help her children with their education, and manage to send them to university so that they can graduate and be excellent, trained professionals, with better opportunities in life and wherever they go.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies to prepare the land for her vegetable and coffee crops.

loans.name: Anapela

texts.en:
Anapela is a 33-year-old single woman. She makes and sells ice cakes in her community to earn a living. She has three years of experience with this business. 

Anapela needs a loan to buy mixture flavor, sugar, foam cups and a new freezer. She plans to use her profits to support her family. 

Anapela has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy mixture flavor, sugar, foam cups and a new freezer.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 25 años de edad es una joven muy trabajadora, honrada y honesta, desde hace un año se dedica a la agricultura su principal cultivo es el maíz y frijol, adicional a eso posee una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida quien le ayuda en la siembra y sus dos hijos, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, controles  de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su siembra y así obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
This 25-year-old client is a very hardworking, honest, and trustworthy young woman. She has been a farmer for a year, growing mainly corn and beans. She sells her crops at various markets in the area where she lives, and also runs a small shop in her home. 

The income from the farm and the shop allow the client to meet her household expenses. She lives in her own home with her partner, who helps her plant crops and care for their two children. The client is applying for a loan to purchase fertilizers, manure, seeds, pest-control supplies, and other farming inputs. These purchases will allow her to continue her planting, boost her income, and provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, seeds,  pest-control supplies, and other farming inputs.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael de 33 años de edad se dedica desde hace 8 años a la venta de ropa para damas lo hace de forma ambulante por la diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar  vive en casa propia con sus esposa y sus dos hijos de 10 y 4 años de edad, Rafael está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor y surtía mas su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Rafael is 33 years old and for seven years has been selling women's clothing. He does this door to door as a street vendor around the various neighborhoods located near his home. With what he obtains in earnings, he manages to cover some of his household expenses. He lives in his own home with his wife and their two children, ages 10 and 4. 

Rafael is requesting a loan to purchase more clothing at wholesale and stock his business more, as that is his only source of income. This way he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life, without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy more clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es: Ana de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 11 años quien estudia en la escuela pública de su localidad. Ana se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón y de maní el cual comercializa de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. De esta forma junto a su esposo llevan la economía de su hogar y tratan de dar a su hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Desea mejorar las ventas de su negocio por lo que se acercó a las instalaciones de FUSAI para solicitar un crédito para invertir en la compra mayor cantidad de maní y semilla de maraño para la venta y así poder cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado.
texts.en:
Ana is 49 and lives in her own home with her husband and their 11-year-old son, who attends the public school in their town. Ana goes around the main sections of her town selling peanuts and cashews. This business allows Ana and her husband to meet their household expenses. The couple is striving to provide a better life for their son. 

Ana aspires to boost sales, so she went to the offices of FUSAI [Salvadoran Foundation for Comprehensive Development] to apply for a loan to invest in the purchase of more peanuts and cashews to sell. This additional inventory will allow Ana to meet the growing demand in her market.

loans.use: to purchase additional peanuts and cashews.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: René de 55 años de edad se dedica desde hace 15 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, adicional a eso también siembra jocote cuando es la temporada, comercializa sus productos en las agencias de compra venta de granos básicos, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, René está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, controles de plagas, etc. para poder seguir con su siembra y obtener mejores ganancias para darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
René is 55 years old, and he has been engaged in agriculture for 15 years, planting corn and beans. On top of this he also plants jocote* when the season is right. He sells his products to brokers who buy and sell basic grains, and thanks to the money he earns from his sales he succeeds in paying for some of hi household’s expenses. René is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, manure, seeds and blight control products in order to keep on planting his crops, thus earning a better income to improve his standard of living.

<cite>*A species of flowering plant in the cashew family, Anacardiaceae, native to tropical regions of the Americas. It is most commonly known as Jocote, which derives from the Nahuatl word “xocotl”, meaning "fruit."</cite>

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, manure, seeds and blight control products.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra, a sus 27 años de edad vive con su pareja y actualmente está esperando su primer hijo, que está próximo a nacer.
Hace varios meses comenzó a trabajar de manera indepediente, impulsada por la necesidad de generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar; por ello montó una venta de shots y cócteles en un carrito ambulante que ubica en una esquina del barrio donde reside; trabaja con el apoyo de una empleada todos los días de 6 pm a 1 am y así ha generado los recursos suficientes para solventar algunas de las necesidades básicas en su hogar.
El crédito que solicita desea invertirlo en la compra de otro carrito e insumos (licores y mezcladores), esto le permitirá poner otra sucursal de su negocio en un barrio aledaño y así mejorar las ventas, especialmente en esta temporada decembrina; lo que le permitirá generar mejores ingresos para poder solventar los gastos del nacimiento de su hijo. Actualmente manifiesta que enfrenta un desafío con su negocio, ya que pronto tendrá que dejarlo en manos de la empleada porque tendrá que retirarse para el nacimiento de su bebé; sin embargo tiene la ventaja de que su colaboradora es una persona de total confianza.
Sandra sueña con tener su negocio en un local comercial abierto al público, en el que pueda atender más cómodamente a sus clientes y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio y poco a poco mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra, at 27 years old, lives with her husband and is expecting her first child, who will be born soon.

Several months ago she began working independently, motivated by the need to generate income to help her husband with the financial responsibilities of their home. For this purpose, she opened a shots and cocktails stand in a little wagon that she has located on a corner in her neighborhood.  She works every day from 6 p.m. to 1 a.m. with the support of a female employee, and this way she has generated enough income to afford some of the basic necessities for her home. 

She wants to invest the loan that she is seeking in the purchase of another wagon and supplies (liquor and mixes), which will allow her to open another branch of her business in an adjoining neighborhood and improve sales, especially during this holiday season.  This will allow her to generate more income so that she can afford the costs of her son’s birth.  

She says that currently she faces a challenge with her business because soon she will have to leave it in the hands of her employee, as she must retire for the birth of her baby. However, she has the advantage of having an assistant who is completely trustworthy. 

Sandra dreams of having her business in a commercial location that is open to the public, where she can serve her customers more comfortably and improve the profitability of her business, so that little by little, her family's quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to purchase another wagon and supplies (liquor and mixes).

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 31 años de edad posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia desde hace 5 años, posee mucha clientela pues tiene mucha variedad de productos, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo que trabaja de albañil logran salir adelante en su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, Sandra desea mejorar su vivienda colocando piso cerámico ya que solamente tiene pavimentado, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir dicho gastos por esa razón solicita un crédito y poder comprar cemento, arena, cerámica y pago de mano de obra para poder tener mejor su vivienda y su familia puedan vivir más cómodo y en lo aseado.
texts.en:
Sandra is 31 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She has had a store in her home for the past five years. She has many clients as she has a good variety of products. With the profits she makes and with what her husband contributes from his work as a bricklayer they manage to pay the household expenses.

Sandra wants to improve their home, putting in ceramic tile flooring as it is now just concrete. But with what she earns she can't pay for it .So she has requested a loan to buy cement, sand and tiles and to pay for labor to improve her house. Her family will be able to live more comfortably in their newly finished home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, tiles and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es:
Octavio tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Cayaltí, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, es una comunidad con un clima semitropical, ubicado sobre el valle de Zaña, que le ha permitido regar los cultivos de caña de azúcar y algodón, que pertenece a la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, desde hace tres años transportando a sus pasajeros por los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para invertirlo en mantenimiento de su vehículo y de esta manera seguir brindando el servicio de una manera segura y generando ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Octavio is 57 years old. He lives together with his wife in the district of Cayaltí, which belongs to the city of Chiclayo on the North Coast of Peru. The people here work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock. It is located in the Zaña valley which enjoys a semi-tropical climate which allows the growth of sugar cane and cotton.

Octavio offers transportation services with his own motorcycle taxi. For the past three years he has been transporting people to the villages around his area. He is requesting a loan of 2,500 PEN to invest in the maintenance of his vehicle. In this way he can continue to offer his services in a safe way and generate money for his family.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle buying replacement parts.

loans.name: Mujeres Independientes Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de Mujeres Emprendedoras que lleva por nombre Mujeres Independientes  se encuentra en el 2do. Ciclo del programa comités, tiene 22 integrantes actualmente, es un grupo que se caracteriza por ser solidario y muy activo, realizan actividades grupales para compartir, la mayor parte de sus integrantes cuentan con actividades comerciales .
Una de las historias dignas de destacar es el de la señora  Gladys de 36 años, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de productos varios  desde hace varios años, la venta de sus productos lo realiza por toda la zona de Yaguarón, esta actividad es realizada  por todos los integrantes de la familia, ella agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar comestibles, jabones, aceites y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
This group of enterprising women, whose group bears the name "Mujeres Independientes," is in its second loan cycle of the communal bank program and currently has 22 members. It is a group noted for being supportive and very energetic, and they undertake shared group activities. The greater part of its members have businesses that involve sales. 

One of the stories worth highlighting is that of Gladys, 36. She has been buying and selling various products for several years. She sells her products throughout the Yaguarón area. This activity is carried on by all members of the family. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to grow. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy foodstuffs, soap, cooking oil, and other items. This way she can continue selling.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs, soap, cooking oil and other items.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan de 21 años de edad habita  en casa muy humilde junto a su grupo familiar. Juan se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Ha tomado la decisión de comenzar a criar ganado para luego ponerlo a la venta. De esta forma espera obtener nuevos ingresos que le permitan dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una ternera para críarla y luego ponerla a la venta, expresa tener el terreno adecuado donde tendrá a la ternera. Espera poder tener acceso a este financiamiento para comenzar su negocio lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Juan, 21, lives in a very humble house with his family.  He earns a living by providing security services in a company located near his town.  He has decided to start raising cattle to later put up for sale.  In this way, he hopes to obtain new income that will allow him give his family better living conditions.
To carry out this project, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in a calf to raise and later sell.  He says that he has land that is suitable for the calf.  He hopes to have access to this loan to start his business as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 26 años de edad desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de ropa su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y también vende de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para surtir mas su negocio y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old, and has been selling clothing for 2 years. 

She has her business in her place of residence, and she also sells on foot in the different markets that are near her home.  In this way she obtains her earnings, and with the help of her husband, she manages to pay for some of their household expenses. She lives in the house of a relative with her husband and her child. 

The client is seeking a loan to purchase clothing wholesale in order to supply her business more.  This way, she will be able to earn more and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Deysi Carolina

texts.es: Deysi de 33 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de comida típica como: pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, papas fritas, empanadas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Deysi está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para seguir con su negocio como: plátanos, maíz, verduras, yuca, papas, carne, etc. ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así podrá seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Deysi, age 33, lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children.  She sells typical food like meat filled pastries, fried yucca, French fries, and ‘empanadas’ [stuffed pastries], etc.  Her business is located at her home.  She manages to pay some of the household expenses with what she gets from her sales.

Deysi is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients she needs to continue with her business.  She will buy things like bananas, corn, vegetables, yucca, potatoes, and meat, etc.  This is her only source of work.  This way she will be able to continue giving her family what it needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy bananas, corn, vegetables, yucca, potatoes, and meat, etc.

loans.name: El Durazno Group

texts.es:
La señora Felicia es de estado civil casada. De edad 40 años. No tuvo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela. Tiene 7 hijos y de ellos 3 estan estudiando. Se dedica a la crianza de pollos. Inició este negocio ayudando a su madre y a la fecha lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para comprar pollos de engorde y concentrado para los mismos. En el futuro desea contar con una granja de gallinas ponedoras y distribuir huevos por mayor.

Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y actividades pecuarias.
texts.en:
Felicia is 40 years old and she is married. She did not have the chance to attend school. She has 7 children and 3 of them are attending school. She engages in breeding chickens, an activity she started while helping her mother, and today she can count on a 10-years’ experience.

She is the founder of a group and she is requesting a loan that she will use to buy chickens to fatten and animals feed for them. In the future she wants to own a laying hens farm and to sell eggs at a wholesale price.

The other members of the group engage in retail and in livestock breeding.

loans.use: To buy chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Rosario De Los Angeles

texts.es: Rosario de 42 años de edad desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de joyería de enchape, comercializa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee clientela por los buenos precios y la calidad de sus productos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa de un familiar con su esposos y sus dos hijos, Rosario esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de joyería por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosario is 42 years old and has been selling plated jewelry for 10 years. She sells as a street vendor in the various markets located near her home. She has a clientele because of the good prices and the quality of her products. 

With what she gets from her sales, she manages to pay some household expenses. She lives in the home of a family member, with her husband and their two children. 

Rosario is requesting a loan so that she can buy jewelry at wholesale and continue with her work. This is her only source of income, and it enables her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy plated jewelry at wholesale.

loans.name: Santos Heriberto

texts.es: Santos de 47 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas donde elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, hasta ahora el negocio le ha dado muy buenos resultados ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; Santos es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan superarse y llegar al éxito; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para compra de material por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. Santos  tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Santos, age 47, lives with his life partner and their two children.  He has a metallic structure workshop where he makes doors, railings, and grilles, among others.  He has been in this business for several years.  He has a lot of experience that helps him improve his work each day.  

So far the business has given him very good results because he has gotten a lot of customers who seek him out for the quality of his work, the accessible prices, and, above all, because he always does the work to his customers’ liking.  Santos is a very hard-working, honest, and, above all, humble man.  He is always eager for new opportunities that will allow him to improve himself and be successful.

He wants to make the business grow, but he needs capital to buy material.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow him to buy iron, metal, and tools, etc.  Santos has good credit references.  He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, and tools, etc.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
A loan of 600 USD is offered to Teresa to improve her business. She is married and she has tree children and she has a kiosk where many people come to shop every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as fish, oils, coffee, sugar, salt, noodles, water, and rice. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2012. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Teresa independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fish, oils, coffee, sugar, salt, noodles, water, and rice.

loans.name: 3.05.95.07.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Tư is 47 years old and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents, because her child is grown up.

Tư has a manufacturing business making iron furniture. Tư has been involved in this business for more than ten  years.The main hardship that Tư faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

Tư is the group leader of the 3.05.95.07.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of three members.  In 2012, Tư joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tư has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Tư hopes for her business to do well and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Virginia to improve her business.  She is married and she opened her second-hand business in 2009 with her own working capital.  She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like shirts (short and long-sleeve), trousers and shorts. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: To buy shirts (short and long-sleeve), trousers and shorts.

loans.name: 3.05.97.03.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thủy has a retail business selling plastic goods. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

Thủy is 40-years-old and she is married with two children.  Thủy is the group leader of the 3.05.97.03.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in the Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in the Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

In 2013, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thủy has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Thủy has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main hardship that Thủy faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thủy hopes that her business will do well to make enough money to provide for her kids and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

loans.name: 3.14.98.02.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà works in agriculture farming food. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

Hà is 37-years-old and she is married with two children.  Hà is the group leader of the 3.05.98.02.Thiệu Khánh solidarity group, which consists of three members.  She lives and works in the Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in the Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

In 2011, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hà has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Hà has been involved in this business for more than ten years.  The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her business to do well to make enough money to provide for her kids and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

loans.name: 3.14.99.06.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Nga is 49 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent; another child is grown up.

Nga has a retail business selling animal feed. She has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer to resell.

In 2011, Nga joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 3.14.99.06.Thiệu Khánh solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to resell.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia is applying for a loan of $1,000 from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married and has two children; she is 34 years old. She is running a mini shop  in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as shirts, trousers, shorts, short sleeves, long sleeves, pants for school children, and clothes for church. She is making good money from selling clothing and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. 
Herminia is living in a town near the school; her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to shop, including students.

loans.use: To buy shirts, trousers, shorts, short sleeves, long sleeves, pants for school children, and clothes for church

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is a 52-year-old farmer and a loving father of five children, three of whom have been settled for marriage. Hong cultivates rice on his own land, which is located in Prey Veng province. He was taught the trade by his parents ever since he was a little boy. He works alongside his wife every day and also has some support from his children. Farming is the important source of his family’s income.

Hong is currently requesting a loan to buy construction supplies in order to build a safe latrine, and to pay for laborers to perform construction. In this way, he can promote the family's health and improve their general living conditions. The water loan program, offered by HKL with a special rate, has helped to encourage Hong to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of his family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies in order to build a safe latrine, and to pay for laborers to perform construction.

loans.name: Pyapy Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Pyapy Mbarete está en su ciclo número doce del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para conocer la situación en la que se encuentran y así superar su pobreza.
Una integrante es la Sra. Vanesa, quien es empleada doméstica, y además se dedica a hacer bordados variados, y por medio de estos trabajos ayuda a su familia. Comenta que es muy sacrificado trabajar de empleada doméstica y a la vez hacer sus bordados, pero el esfuerzo vale la pena, ya que ayuda a su familia.
Quiere seguir haciendo sus bordados, es por eso que está pidiendo de este préstamo, para poder comprar hilos variados, como telas.
texts.en:
Pyapy Mbarete is in its 12th loan cycle with the women’s communal bank program, where each  is completing the elimination of poverty survey in order to understand the situation in which they find themselves, and in this way, overcome their poverty.

One member is Señora Vanesa, who is a housekeeper. She also does various kinds of embroidery, and through this work she helps her family.  She says that it is very demanding to work as a housekeeper and at the same time, work doing her embroidery, but it is worth the effort because it helps her family. 

She wants to continue doing her embroidery, which is why she is requesting this loan: so that she will be able to buy various threads and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy thread and fabric for embroidery.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en:
Madalena seeks a $1,000 loan to improve her business. She is married and she has a mini-shop, where many people come to buy products every day. She will buy some additional supplies, such as sports pants, shirts (long and short sleeved), and mattresses.She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Madalena independent because she can be responsible for herself and can also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy sports pants, shirts (long and short sleeved) and mattresses

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Elisa to improve her business. She is married and has two children. She opened her kiosk in 2009 with her own working capital. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like candles, oils, fish, sugar, coffee, salt, noodles, cigarettes, eggs and water. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy candles, oils, fish, sugar, coffee, salt, noodles, cigarettes, eggs and water.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos de 22 años, 11 años y 10 años de edad. Marta se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos. De esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con los gastos del hogar. Desea mejorar las paredes de su vivienda las cuales están hechas de bahareque y necesitan que se cambien lo antes posible ya que se encuentran deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, vara de castilla y madera. Espera poder tener accesos al financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en:
Marta, 46, lives in her own house along with her life partner and her children of 22, 11 and 10 years. Marta makes her living by offering domestic services. In this manner, she earns her living and helps with the expenses of the home. She wishes to improve the walls of her home, which are made of sugar cane and mud and need to be changed as soon as possible since they are deteriorated.

For the above, she is applying for this FUSAI loan to invest in the purchase of metal siding, reeds and wood. She hopes to be able to have access to financing given that she does not have the capital to make the expense.

loans.use: to buy: metal siding, reeds and wood.

loans.name: Hon

texts.en:
Hon is a 61-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She currently lives with her family and three unmarried children in a remote area of Baray district in Kampong Thom province. Hon has been engaged in a rice-farming business and raising birds at home. Through her hardships and perseverance, she is able to earn a suitable income of KHR 40,000 per day, which she normally uses for food and other costs of living. 

Hon is currently requesting a loan to buy a piece of land for farming so that she can increase production and the income for her family. Her business plan is to continue developing her business and to make a stable income to meet her children’s needs. She is very thankful to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land for farming.

loans.name: Leona

texts.es: La señora Leona actualmente vive en Entre Ríos, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos dependientes. Se dedica a la agricultura, su principal fuente de ingreso proviene de la producción de yuca la cual es estacionaria, para la misma es necesario utilizar la mayor mano de obra posible para obtener un mayor rendimiento pero esto aumena los costos de producción, por ello la señora decidió ampliar su cultivo y realizar un mantenimiento de malezas durante la etapa de producción, por lo mismo solicita un crédito para  el mantenimiento de yuca, de esta forma incrementara el rendimiento de su producción como también sus ingresos y su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Leona lives in Entre Ríos. She is a single mother with three dependent children. She works in agriculture. Her main source of income is growing yucca. 

For these crops, it is necessary to hire as many workers as possible to obtain a better yield, but this raises the cost of production. Leona has decided to expand her crops and weed during the harvest season. Therefore, she is applying for a loan to maintain her yucca crops. In this way, she will increase the yield of her harvest as well as her income and quality of life.

loans.use: to maintain her yucca crops.

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Aty está en el 1er ciclo, es un grupo nuevo, que tiene muchas esperanzas de poder trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Victoria es una de las que forma este grupo, es una mujer muy entusiasta, y que quiere crecer, es por ello que decidió unirse a este grupo. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y de verduras, y ya que sus productos son siempre de primera, pudo hacerse de muy buena clientela. Este préstamo lo pide para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas de estación y también para verduras frescas.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Aty is in its first cycle. It is a new group that has many hopes of being able to work together and by way of this work help each other.

Victoria is one of those who forms this group. She is a very enthusiastic woman, and she wants to grow; it's for this that she decided to join this group. She works selling fruits and vegetables, and since her products are always first-class, she could make a good clientele for herself. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of seasonal fruits and also for fresh vegetables.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and fresh vegetables.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
La Victoria es un grupo que se formó con la unión de amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, donde están en su ciclo número diez del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales se encuentran mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las miembros es Miryan, quien hace comidas rápidas para la venta, ella misma se encarga de hacerlas y venderlas, y es asi que se gana la vida de una manera honesta y humilde. Su suelo es poder tener un local donde poder vender las comidas que hace. Esta agradecida por la ayuda que todas ellas hacen.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere comprar insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas y demás.
texts.en:
La Victoria is a group made up of friends and neighbors from the city of San Lorenzo. They are in their tenth cycle of the women's committee program. They are participating in the poverty elimination survey. Through their effort and constant work, as well as applying their vital behavior, they are improving their situation of poverty.

One of the members of this group is Miryan, who makes fast food to sell. She makes and sells the food herself, earning a living in an honest and humble way. Her dream is to have a property where she can sell the food she makes. She is grateful for the help of the others.

She is applying for this loan to buy ingredients to continue making her meals, such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and more.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making food such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and other products.

loans.name: Sara Yaneth

texts.es: Sara de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende productos perecederos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, aceite y otras serie de artículos comestibles y no comestibles; a través de  este comercio ha sacado adelante a su familia. Ella busca mejorar su calidad  de  vida,  por lo que solicita un crédito para incrementar la variedad de sus  artículos en su tienda y así le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de  su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Sara, 43, lives in her own house with her husband and son. She has a small store where she sells perishable goods such as rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, and other edible and non-edible products. Through this business, she has provided for her family.

She wishes to improve her quality of life, so she is applying for a loan to increase the variety of products in her store. This will allow her to increase her business earnings and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo RENACER  está en el segundo ciclo, son un grupo muy emprendedor y que fueron creciendo de a poco, así son todas las señoras muy emprendedoras y quieren avanzar más, por eso que siempre asisten a las capacitaciones.
Nancy, una integrante, tiene un depósito de maderas, donde a sus clientes ofrece variedades de maderas, para todo tipo de uso, gracias a que ella es una persona muy amable y con una actitud muy jovial fue creciendo poco a poco. Hoy su sueño es poder agrandar más su depósito, con lo cual podrá también dar trabajo a otras personas.
Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de maderas varias para que de esa forma pueda surtirse y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en: The group Renacer [New Beginning] is in it's second cycle. It is a very hard-working group and has grown little by little. All of the women are very hard-working and want to make progress. For this reason, they always attend training. Nancy, a member, has a lumber yard where she offers an assortment of wood for all sorts of uses to her customers. Thanks to her being a very friendly person and having a cheerful attitude, she has been growing steadily. Today her dream is to be able to expand her lumber yard, which would also give work to other people. She requests this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of various woods. In this way, she may stock up and fulfill her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy wood for resale.

loans.name: Sat

texts.en:
Sat is 39-years-old, and lives with her spouse and children in Trapeang Chhuk village, a rural area of Baray district, Kampong Thom province. Local people in this region work primarily in agriculture, commerce and livestock. As with other farmers, Sat seasonally grows rice and beans, which she sells in the markets after collecting the harvest. Sat has been in this occupation for more than 20 years and earns approximately KHR 30,000 per day.

She is now requesting a loan in order to to invest in buying seeds and renting the land for growing beans in this coming season. In this way she hopes to increase production and earn more income for her family. Through her hard work, perseverance and patience, she will be a successful entrepreneur in the future.

loans.use: to invest in buying seeds and renting the land for growing beans for this coming season.

loans.name: Oscar Mario

texts.es:
Oscar se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre trabajador, amable y un padre y esposo ejemplar. Se desempeña como cerrajero, con una experiencia de más de 37 años en la labor; inició realizando cursos de capacitación como soldador y comenzó trabajando como empleado en diferentes talleres durante 5 años; luego decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio en el que ha trabajado solo todos los días, durante los 32 años que lleva funcionando el establecimiento; entre sus clientes se  encuentras diferentes estaciones de gasolina a las que les presta el servicio de mantenimientos estructurales; así ha generado los recursos necesarios para dar alimento y educación a sus dos hijos.
Actualmente solicita el crédito con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio; con el dinero comprará un soldador de punto pequeño; un taladro y materiales para elaborar sus productos; esto le permitirá cumplir con los contratos que tiene pendientes y además podrá mejorar las ventas para generar un mayor nivel de ingresos.
Oscar manifiesta que su propósito para mediano plazo es tener su negocio bien acreditado y fortalecido, que le permita tener una estabilidad económica para solventar los gastos familiares y para tener la posibilidad de mejorar las condiciones en las que vive con su familia; abriéndose paso para disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar has been characterized as being a hardworking, friendly man and an exemplary father and husband. He works as a metalworker, with more than 37 years' labor experience. He started doing training courses as a solderer and he began working as an employee in different workshops for 5 years. Later, he decided to make himself independent and start his own business where he has worked alone every day. The establishment has been working for 32 years.

Amongst his clients you will find different gas stations, where he offers the service of structural maintenance. In this way, he has generated the necessary resources to give food and an education to his two children.

Currently, he is applying for a loan with the aim to strengthen his business. With the money, he will buy a small-point soldering gun, a drill and materials to make his products. This will permit him to fulfill the contracts that he has pending and, in addition, he will be able to improve sales to generate a better level of income.

Oscar says that his medium term goal is to have has business well credited and strengthened, which will permit him to have an economic stability to cover family expenses and to have the possibility of improving the conditions in which he lives with his family, opening the door to be able to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a small point soldering gun, a drill and materials to make his products.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: El señor Marcelino tiene 30 años de edad vive con su familia y tiene 2 dependientes. Sus principales actividades son la producción y venta de maíz que la realiza una vez al año, siembra en sus propios terrenos y a la vez se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno y ovino. Trabaja arduamente para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos y otros en los que incurre su familia. Actualmente requiere un crédito para preparación de terreno agrícola, así podrá producir más cantidad de maíz y de esta manera lograra tener mayores ingresos con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Marcelino, 30, lives with his family and has two dependents. His main activities are producing and selling corn once per year. He plants the crops on his own land and also raises cows and sheep at the same time. He works hard to cover the expenses of food, clothing, basic services, and his family's other costs. He needs this loan to prepare his farmland. He will then be able to produce more corn and earn a higher income, with the goal of improving his entire family's living conditions.

loans.use: to prepare his farmland.

loans.name: Felismina

texts.en:
Felismina is applying for a loan of $ 800.00 from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married and she is 31 years old. She is running a kiosk in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy inventory to keep in her store, including a refrigerator, noodles, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water and body loosen. 

Felismina is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. Felismina lives in a town near the school. Her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy items, including students.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator, noodles, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water and body loosen.

loans.name: Juvelina

texts.en:
Juvelina is taking a loan of $ 1000.00 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy inventory to keep in her store such as hard drink (beer) soft drinks (fanta, coca cola, sprite, sagiko) noodles, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, eggs and water.

She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $ 200.00. She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy hard drink (beer), soft drinks (fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko ) noodles, cigarettes coffee, sugar, salt. eggs and water.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andres de 57 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y trabajan. Andres trabaja como albañil desde hace 30 años, de esta forma ha llevado y sigue llevando el sustento a su hogar. Andres solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila para reguardar el agua ya que no cuenta con una. Además, desea pintar las paredes de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, grava, hierro y pintura.
texts.en:
Andres, 57, lives in his own house with his wife and two children, who are older and working. Andres has been working as a construction worker for 30 years, which is how he has sustained his household until the present day. 

He has applied for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a sink to hold water, since he does not currently have one. He would also like to paint the walls of his home. With the requested amount, he will buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and paint.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron, and paint to build a sink and paint the walls of his home.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es: María de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 12 años y 2 años de edad. María trabaja como empleada doméstica en casa particular por lo que cada mes recibe un salario. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir  en la construcción de un cuarto ya que su casa es muy pequeña. Con el crédito comprará: lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: María, 37, lives in her own house with her life partner and three children, ages 2, 12, and 17. She works as a domestic employee in a private house, for which she receives a monthly salary. She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a room, because her house is very small. With this loan, she will buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to build a room.
