loans.name: Krull Zolin

texts.es: Krull está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar madera y herramientas que le faltan para realizar su trabajo como operario de construcción, así el seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Krull is very grateful for the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help, he will be able to buy wood and tools which he needs to work as a construction worker. In this way, he will keep working and fighting to make his greatest dream come true: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy wood and tools.

loans.name: Santa Marianita  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Santa Marianita está formado por 5 mujeres y 1 hombre quienes viven por la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar de paisajes hermosos que desde su centro parroquial se admira la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente aún mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Las socias son personas amables, gentiles que siempre a pesar de sus problemas tienen una sonrisa en sus labios, son mujeres luchadoras que siempre están en la búsqueda de mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar y brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Juana, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 11 y 8 años de edad, su primera hija se encuentra en el colegio y sus dos hijos últimos hijos en la escuela, su esposo ha migrado para brindarle a su familia un mejor futuro, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de su mamá.
Doña Juana labora en la limpieza de casas y en su casa se dedica a la cría de cerdos, cuyes y gallinas, también se dedica a la agricultura. Estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de aportar a la economía de su hogar. 
El dinero de su crédito es para hacer un corral para pollos y comprar alimento para sus animales. Su meta es crecer en el negocio de pollos.
texts.en:
The Santa Marianita group is made up of five women and one man, who live in the city of Santa Ana in Cuenca, an area with beautiful scenery. One can admire the city of Cuenca from the center of their parish. The people still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages. The members are friendly, kind people who always have a smile on their face despite their problems. They are fighters who are always looking to improve the stability of their households and to give their children a better future.

One of the members of this group is Juana, 35. She is married with three children, ages 8, 11, and 13. Her oldest daughter is in high school and her two youngest are in elementary school. Her husband has emigrated to give the family a better future. They do not have their own home, so they live with her mother.

Juana cleans houses and raises pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens. She also works in agriculture. These activities give her the opportunity to contribute to her household finances.

She will use this loan to make a corral for chickens and to buy feed for her animals. Her goal is to grow her chicken business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and make a corral for chickens.

loans.name: Carlos Darwin

texts.es: Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y sobre todo seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en: Carlos is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the support that they have provided he will be able to buy materials to make improvements to his home.  In this way he can improve his quality of life, and keep striving to make his great dream a reality:  to complete a university education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica is applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business.  She runs a business in her house by selling body lotion, Fanta, eggs, soap and shampoo.  She makes a good income from her selling business and she wants to buy more stock with the loan.  She lives in a town near the main road, so many people come to buy and she sells every day. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600.

loans.use: To buy body lotion, Fanta, eggs, soap and shampoo.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Del Algodonal Group

texts.es: El grupo “LOS GIRASOLES DEL ALGODONAL” está conformado  por 10  socios. Una de ellas es Vilma de 45 años casada con 5 hijos .Vilma vende toda clase de artículos de vestir  como ropa y calzado, empezó este negocio gracias a su hermana que se dedica a lo mismo. Durante los 15 años que se dedica a este trabajo ha podido ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios. Vilma desea seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para eso ha solicitado este préstamo ya que desea comprar ropa y zapatos que sus clientas le han solicitado por la temporada festiva hay mucha demanda de los artículos que vende, mas adelante desea abrir una tienda para poner su negocio ya que en la actualidad solo hace entregas a domicilio. Vilma junto a su grupo agradecen a los inversionistas por brindarles este crédito.en la foto es la única parada en la parte de atrás, viste polo floreado
texts.en:
The group "Los Girasoles del Algodonal" consists of 10 members. One of them is Vilma. She is 45 years old, married, and has five children. Vilma sells all types of clothing and shoes. She started her business thanks to her sister who is also in the same line of work. During the 15 years of working, Vilma has been able to help her children with their studies.

Vilma wants to continue investing in her business, so she is requesting a loan. She wants to buy clothing and shoes that her customers have requested during the festival season when there is more demand for the products she sells. Going forward she wants to open a shop where she can manage her business. At the moment, she only makes deliveries from her home.

Vilma and her group thank the Kiva lenders for providing this loan. In the photo, Vilma is sitting in the back and wearing a floral shirt.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Madres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Madres Emprendedoras” está conformada por 06 socios trabajadores. Graciela de 35 años es una de sus socias y la tesorera del grupo. Graciela es soltera es el único sustento de su hogar y su madre  que esta delicada de salud. Ella tiene una bodega donde vende diversos productos, también se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, empezó este negocio hace 20 años, entre sus clientas están sus amistades, familiares y personas de su zona. Gracias a los ingresos que percibe por su trabajo tanto ella y su madre pueden vivir dignamente. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá adquirir productos navideños para su bodega de esa manera espera tener buenas ventas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas por el crédito brindado en la foto Graciela viste casaca deportiva negra con rayas blancas.
texts.en: The "Madres Emprendedoras" communal bank is made up of 6 hard-working members.  Graciela is 35 years old and is the treasurer for the group.  Graciela is single and is the sole provide for her household, which includes her mother who is in poor health.  She has a small store where she sells a variety of products, and also sells beauty products.  She has been doing this for 20 years.  Her customers include her friends, family and people in her neighborhood.  Thanks to the income from her work she and her mother are able to live with dignity.  With the loan requested she will be able to buy Christmas products for her store, and expects to have good sales.  The group is grateful to lenders for the loan provided.  In the photo Graciela is wearing a black sports jacket with white stripes.

loans.use: to buy Christmas products.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Mirian tiene 36 años, es  madre soltera y vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Esta señora empezó desde muy joven a trabajar como empleada doméstica y de a poco iba ahorrando su dinero para poder fabricar ella misma las tradicionales hamacas y sobrecamas que se venden en la zona ya que su madre se dedicaba a eso y así dejar de ser empleada ajena.
 Hoy día ya tiene clientela formada en la zona y así aumenta su pedido de productos, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ya pudo construirse una pequeña casita. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilo, color y otros que son empleados en la elaboración de los productos artesanales y que en esta temporada le solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mirian is 36 years old, a single mother, and lives in the city of Carapeguá. She started working from a young age as a domestic worker. She was gradually saving money in order to be able to make traditional hammocks and bedspreads that she sold in the locally as her mother worked in this field, and so she finished working in her original job.
Today she already has a client base in the area, helping to increase her product orders. Thanks to her effort and dedication she has been able to build a small house.
She is requesting a loan to buy yarn, dye and other items which are involved in the manufacture of craft products, since this season her customers' demands are greater.

loans.use: to buy yarn, dye and other items.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto está estudiando una carrera que implica mucho sacrificio y responsabilidad, la cual es Derecho. El vive en el campo con una familia muy humilde.
Su meta es terminar la carrera de derecho y ejercer la profesión para poder tener una vida más digna y ayudar a su familia.
Actualmente está trabajando como docente, en una escuela en donde la gran mayoría de los alumnos son de escasos recursos.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas y gastos de transporte, para poder cubrir esos gastos que son fijos y poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Alberto is studying a career in law which requires much sacrifice and responsibility. He lives in the countryside with his very humble family. His goal is to complete his studies in law and exercise his profession in order to have a more dignified life and help his family.
Today he is working as a teacher in a school where the majority of students are poor.
He is requesting this loan to invest to pay for fees and transportation costs to be able to cover those expenses that are fixed so he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es: Ramón de 49 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos, el es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y frijol también cultiva caña de azúcar,  Ramón  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ramón is a 49-year-old man who is very responsible with his household obligations. He is always known for providing the best for his family. Ramón currently lives with his wife and two children. He is very a hard worker who is always cheerful and enthusiastic. Ramón is a farmer who every year always grows basic staples of the area, such as corn and beans. He also cultivates sugar cane.

Ramón wants to increase his sales, so he visited the offices of Apoyo Integral in order to request a loan for buying seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. He would like to have the help he requested since he has no other sources of income. This will enable him to provide for his household needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Madres Ladereñas Group

texts.es: El Grupo “MADRES LADEREÑAS” está conformado por 07 socios todos dedicados a diferentes a diversas actividades comerciales. Eliza es una de las socias ella tiene 64 años es viuda y vive con sus 4 hijos todos independientes. Eliza tiene su negocio especerías en su casa allí vende toda clase de condimentos y aderezos  sus clientas son sus vecinas y moradores del lugar, por  las tardes se dedica a la venta de comidas ofreciendo diferentes potajes diariamente vende aproximadamente 30 porciones. El.iza es una mujer muy trabajadora y le hace feliz poder generar sus propios ingresos y ayudar a su familia. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá arreglar parte de su cocina y otra parte para invertir en su negocio de especerías, el sueño de Eliza es abrir un restaurante agradece a Edaprospo y a Kiva por esta gran ayuda para ella y su grupo comunal.en la foto es la primera de la izquierda viste blusa floreada, la foto adjunta pertenece al Sr. Humberto.
texts.en: The "MADRES LADERENAS" group is made up of 7 members who all work at different businesses.  Eliza is one of the members.  She is 64 years old, is a widow, and lives with her four children, all of whom are independent.  Eliza has a spice business in her house, and sells all kinds of condiments and dressings.  Her customers are her neighbors and local residents.  In the evenings she sells meals, offering different dishes every day and selling about 30 servings.  Eliza is a very hard-working woman, and it makes her happy to be able to earn her own income and help her family.   With the loan requested she will be able to fix up part of her kitchen, and also to invest in her spice business.  Her dream is to open a restaurant.  She is grateful to Edaprospo and to Kiva for this great help for her and her group.  In the photo she is the first on the left wearing a floral blouse.  The person in the adjoining photo is Humberto.

loans.use: to invest in her spice business.

loans.name: Villa Universitaria Group

texts.es: La alcancía “VILLA UNIVERSITARIA” está conformada por 06 socios. Alexandra  una de sus  integrantes tiene 53 años es casada con 3 hijos mayores de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza; trabajar en su  negocio le permite  tener ingresos para solventar gastos familiares. Alexandra quiere seguir en este negocio y le gustaría tener un lugar estable para exhibir sus productos. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de perfumes, cremas y maquillaje. Con esta compra espera cumplir con sus clientas  que siempre le solicitan productos. Alexandra esta agradecida por este préstamo para su grupo, especialmente a los inversionistas de todo el mundo, en la foto es la quinta de la izquierda viste polo negro y pantalon plomo.
texts.en: The communal bank “Villa Universitaria” is made up of 6 members. Alexandra is one of the members. She’s 53 years old, married, and has three grown children. She sells beauty products. This work allows her income to meet household expenses. Alexandra would like to continue with this business, and she’d like a more stable location from which to display her products. The loan she’s asking for is to buy perfumes, lotions, and makeup. With this purchase she hopes to satisfy her customers who always order from her. Alexandra is thankful for the loan from the group and especially from all the lenders around the world. In the photo she’s 5th from the left in the black shirt and the gray pants.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: De La Mano Con Jesus Group

texts.es: Juan de 55 años es casado  y tiene  hijos mayores de edad, el es integrante del grupo “DE LA MANO CON JESUS” conformada por 06 socios trabajadores. Juan se dedica al comercio tiene una fuente de soda donde vende jugos, pasteles y sándwiches. El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mobiliario para su local donde le hacen falta más mesas y sillas.. El mayor deseo de Juan es seguir creciendo para obtener mejores ganancias. El grupo está  agradecido a los inversionistas por el crédito brindado.
texts.en: Juan, aged 55, is married with grown children. He is a member of the "De la Mano con Jesus" (Hand in Hand with Jesus) group, made up of 6 working members. Juan works selling juices, pastries and sandwiches. The requested loan will be invested in buying furniture for his business which needs more tables and chairs. Juan's greatest desire is to keep growing his business in order to increase profits. The group is grateful to the lenders for the loan given.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 32-years-old and lives in the village of Baray, which is in the Kampong Thom province. She is married and has two school-going children. She and her husband have been engaged in agriculture, farming rice and raising pigs.  In the same manner, Chan has taught her children to work in farming besides their class, as she learned from her parents when she was a young girl.

Chan has requested her first loan to buy 5 bags of feed for fattening 10 head of pigs, which she will sell to local butchers and markets when they mature. With the loan support, she hopes to earn a good profit so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of feed for fattening 10 head of pigs.

loans.name: 3.09.808.14 Thiệu Dương Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiểu works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase cattle feed to resell.

Hiểu is 51-years-old and she is married with one child.  Hiểu is the group leader of the 3.09.808.14 Thiệu Dương solidarity group, which consists of five members.  She lives and works in the Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in the Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2010, Hiểu joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hiểu has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Hiểu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main harship that Hiểu faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiểu hopes for her business to do well and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed to resell.

loans.name: 04.01.03 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bảy has a retail business selling general things. She is requesting a loan to purchase general things such as milk, candy, and dry food to resell.

Bảy is 44 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 04.10.03 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents

In 2012, Bảy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Bảy has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. The main harship that Bảy faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Bảy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase generals things such as milk, candy, and dry food to resell.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es: Saturnino de 59 años de edad, vive con sus dos hijos de 19 y 15 años de edad en casa propia, Don Saturnino es un hombre  trabajador, responsable y muy emprendedor desde hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto, adicional a eso también se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en: Saturnino is 59 years old. He lives in his own house with his two children, ages 15 and 19. Don Saturnino is hardworking, responsible and entrepreneurial. For 4 years he has made a living through raising livestock for grazing. In addition to this he also produces and sells dairy products in the zone where he lives. He has a very good customer base since he has known to earn the trust of his customers. He offers quality and good prices in his products. He has decided to invest in the care of his livestock considering that his business depends on them. Therefore, he has requested a loan so that he may buy vitamins for the livestock and settle the purchase of a dairy cow that allows him to grow in his business. With this he hopes to get favorable results and continue to give the economic assistance to his household that needs it so much.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Oñondivepa está en su ciclo número cuatro del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer en qué situación está cada una.
Delfina comenta que por medio de la venta de joyas está saliendo adelante, al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero después, poco a poco fue ganando experiencia y ya se hizo de muy buena clientela. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas varias para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en: The Onondivepa group is in its fourth loan cycle with the women's committee program.  All of them work and help each other to get ahead.  They are conducting a survey to eliminate poverty, in order to know what situation everyone is in.  Delfina says that she is getting ahead through her jewelry sales; at first it was a bit difficult, but later she gained experience bit by bit and she has now developed a good clientele.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying a variety of jewelry, in order to continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy a variety of jewelry to sell

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is a 51-year-old widowed mother from a rural area of Baray district, where rice farming is a common business for local people. Pheap, being a responsible mother, has tried to raise her family of seven children alone by growing rice and other seasonal crops. The current business earns her about KHR 20,000 per day. Her children help her with her every day farming work.

To help her further develop her farming business, Pheap is asking for a loan in the sum of KHR 1,000,000 to add to her own capital to buy a plot of land for farming.  This way, she can increase her rice production and earn more income to meet the needs of her living.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for farming.

loans.name: Tania Noemi

texts.es: Es una joven con iniciativa, amable, es casada, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Desde hace dos y medio estableció su pulpería, con un préstamo que obtuvo en una microfinanciera local, sin embargo, por los beneficios que brinda PANA PANA, solicita su tercer financiamiento para comprar mercadería para su negocio: Un quintal de frijoles, 5 quintales de arroz, 3 bidones de aceite, un quintal de azúcar, dos docenas de leche en polvo y de sopas instantáneas, dos bolsones de detergentes, 2 cajas de jabones de lavar ropa, 4 bolsones de pastes para lavar trastes, chiverías, 2 docenas de jabones de baño, y comprar nuevos productos para establecer en una vitrina productos de belleza y accesorios. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en: Tania is a young and friendly woman with initiative. She is married with two school-age children. Two and a half years ago she established her grocery store with a loan that she received from a local microfinance institution. However, through Pana Pana, she is requesting her third loan cycle in order to buy merchandise for her business: a quintal of beans, five quintals of rice, three drums of oil, a quintal of sugar, two dozen packs of powdered milk and instant soup, two packets of detergent, two boxes of laundry soap, four packets of dishwashing paste, dairy products, two dozen bath soaps, and to buy new products to establish a window display of beauty products and accessories. Her dream is to expand her business and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: 12-07-03 Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Ms.Thu operates a food stall/restaurant selling meat. She is requesting a loan to purchase pork to resell.

Thu is 51-years-old and she is single with two children.  Thu is the group leader of the 12-07-03 Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of three members.  Thu supports one dependent with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  The other child is grown up.

This is Thu's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Thu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase pork to resell.

loans.name: 02.07.07Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà has a retail business selling clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase clothes to resell.

Hà is 30-years-old and she is married with three children.  Hà is the group leader of the 02.07.07 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with three dependents.

This is Hà's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Hà has been involved in this business for five years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell

loans.name: 01.07.06 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khuê operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell.

Khuê is 37-years-old and she is married with two children.  Khuê is the group leader of the 02.07.06 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

This is Khuê's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Khuê has been involved in this business for five years.  The main hardship that Khuê faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khuê hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell

loans.name: 01.01.02 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Luyên has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine to repair clothes.

Luyên is 46-years-old and she is married with one child.  Luyên is the group leader of the 01.01.02 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of four members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

This is Luyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Luyên has been involved in this business for seven years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Luyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to repair clothes.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Lima Group

texts.es: Felicitas es integrante del grupo “Santa Rosa” sus  07 socios son trabajadores de diferentes comercios. Felicitas tiene 42 años, en la actualidad vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos quienes la motivan a seguir trabajando, hace 5 años empezó su negocio de venta de pollo trabajo que realiza diariamente, con mucho sacrificio ha podido comprarse un puesto de venta donde realiza sus ventas. El préstamo solicitado le servirá para la compra de pollos  al por mayor, más adelante le gustaría comprarse otro puesto y así agrandar su negocio. El grupo por medio de ella quiere agradecer a a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. En la foto es la 6ta de la izquierda viste blusa floreada.
texts.en: Felicitas is a member of the "Santa Rosa" group, whose 7 members work in different business.  Felicitas is 42 years old and lives with her partner and two children, who are motivating her to continue working. Five years ago she started a business selling chicken.  She works every day, and with great sacrifice has been able to buy a market stall where she sells her products.  The loan requested will be used to buy wholesale chickens.  Later she would like to buy another stall and thus expand her business.  On behalf of the group she would like to thank the people who made this loan possible.  In the photo she is the sixth person from the left, wearing a floral blouse.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Gracias Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de las Gracias con su trabajo y esfuerzo conjunto está mejorando cada vez más, es un grupo que se destaca por su unión, ya que todas son mujeres muy luchadoras y madres. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, con el cual quieren ir mejorando cada día.
Amelia es una persona que se destaca por el gran esfuerzo que está haciendo, siempre participa de manera activa en las capacitaciones. Se dedica a la peluquería, haciendo un excelente trabajo con el que sus clientes siempre están conformes. Su sueño es poder dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas que al igual que ella quieren ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, tijeras y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando y dando a sus clientes el buen servicio que siempre han recibido.
texts.en:
The group called "Virgen de las Gracias" (Our Lady of Grace) with its work and joint effort is improving more and more. It is a group that stands out as a result of its unity, as all of its female members are true fighters and mothers. They are in the programme that aims to eliminate poverty, through which they wish to improve themselves each day.
Amelia is a person who stands out as a result of her continuing great efforts, always actively involved in the training. She works as a hairdresser, doing an excellent job with which her clients are always happy. Her dream is to be able to give work to other people like her who want to be someone in life.
The loan has been requested in order to buy dyes, shampoo, rinses, scissors and other supplies in order to keep working and give their customers the good service that they have always received.

loans.use: to buy dyes, shampoo, rinses, scissors and other supplies

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
Fanny es estudiante de la carrera de Administración de empresas, está en el tercer Año, y cuenta que su objetivo y meta es culminar sus estudios y trabajar en una empresa donde pueda ejercer su carrera. 
Su aspiración es ser el sustento de su familia ganarse el pan de cada día con el fruto de su esfuerzo. Su familia es su principal apoyo, que siempre han estado al lado de ella, dándole su mano para lo que necesitase.
Fanny pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, como también para cubrir sus gastos de transporte, ya que son gastos que siempre tiene y quiere poder cubrirlos, además agradece por esta oportunidad de seguir estudiando que recibe a través del préstamo.
texts.en:
Fanny is a Business Administration student in her third year and her objective and goal is to finish her studies and work in a business where she can exercise all that she has learnt.
Her aspiration is to be the supporting breadwinner of her family with the fruit of her efforts. Her family is her main support, having always stood by her, giving her a hand whenever it was needed.
Fanny asks for this loan in order to pay for her fees, as well as covering her transportation costs, since there are always expenses that she needs to cover. As a result of this loan, she is grateful for the opportunity to keep studying.

loans.use: to pay for fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: La señora Nelly es una mujer emprendedora, madre y cariñosa abuelita, desde muy joven tuvo la inclinación por los peinados y cortes de cabello, por lo que quiso aprender el oficio, hoy después de más de 20 años en el rubro, es una excelente profesional. Actualmente tiene una peluquería pequeña en su domicilio. Sus hijos se independizaron y ahora ella es el principal sustento de su hogar,  por lo que solicita un crédito para  equipar su salón y comprar insumos y material para peluqueria con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio, además desea enseñar a otras personas, y así generar fuentes de trabajo.
texts.en: The lady Nelly is a hardworking woman. She is a mother and caring grandmother. Since she was very young, she had an aptitude for hairstyles and haircuts. Because of this she wanted to learn the trade. Today, after more than 20 years in the field, she is an excellent professional. Presently, she has a small hair salon in her home. Her children are independent and now she is the primary supporter of her household. Because of this she requests a loan in order to outfit her salon and buy supplies and equipment for hairstyling. Her aim is to offer better service. Furthermore, she wishes to teach other people and in this way create sources of work.

loans.use: to buy supplies and equipment for hairdressing.

loans.name: Thompson

texts.es: Es originario de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 58 años de edad, casado con 6 hijos, de los cuales 4 son mayores de edad y dos menores de 3 y 4 años respectivamente. Desde hace 10 años estableció una pulpería en su vivienda, con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos. Actualmente solicita financiamiento para comprar más mercadería para su negocio: 12 bolsones de chivería, un bolsón de papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, sopas instantáneas, granos básicos, café instantáneo, jabones de baño y de lavar ropa. Su sueño es ir creciendo y en fututo establecer una miscelánea.
texts.en: Native of Puerto Cabezas, Thompson is 58 years old and married with 6 children, of which four are adults and two are 3 and 4 years old, respectively. Ten years ago he established a convenience store in his home with the purpose of having his own source of income. Currently he is seeking a loan in order to buy merchandise for his business: 12 Chivería bags, a bag of toilet paper, sanitary napkins, instant soups, bulk grains, instant coffee and soaps for bathing and washing clothes. His dream is to start growing and in the future establish a corner shop.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business: 12 Chivería bags, a bag of toilet paper, sanitary napkins, instant soups, bulk grains, instant coffee and soaps for baths and washing clothes.

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria, una madre y abuela ejemplar, se ha dedicado por muchos años a buscar la manera de sustentar las necesidades básicas de su familia, pues su esposo la abandonó después de 30 años de matrimonio y la dejó con la carga económica del hogar, con los gastos de sus 4 hijos y 5 nietos; su principal fuente de ingresos es la producción y venta de tamales y morcilla que fabrica de manera artesanal y cocina en fogón de leña, estos productos los vende por encargos y cuenta con el apoyo de una hija; esto le ha permitido salir adelante con su familia.
Con el ánimo de mejorar las condiciones de trabajo, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar un quemador a gas, una batería de ollas grandes y utensilios de cocina; esto le permitirá trabajar con mayor comodidad y además optimizará el tiempo de producción, generando la oportunidad de adquirir contratos más grandes y así poder cumplir el sueño de consolidar su negocio.
Para lograr su propósito, Gloria es consciente que debe seguir luchando con mucha perseverancia, tenacidad y empeño, pues así tendrá la capacidad de brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Gloria is an exemplary mother and grandmother and has worked for many years to find ways of supporting the basic needs of her family, because her husband left her after 30 years of marriage and left her with the financial burden of the household, with the costs of her four children and five grandchildren. Her main source of income is the production and sale of tamales and sausage that she makes in a homemade style cooked on a wooden stove. These are sold to order and she counts on the help of a daughter. This has allowed her to cope with her family.
With the aim of improving her working conditions, she is requesting the support of a loan in order to buy a gas stove, a variety of large pots and cooking utensils. This will allow her to work more comfortably and also to optimize production time, creating the opportunity to receive larger orders so that she can fulfill the dream of consolidating her business. To achieve these aims, Gloria is aware that she must keep struggling with great perseverance, tenacity and commitment. And so, she will have the ability to offer her family a better quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove, a variety of large pots and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es:
Marco es un campesino arraigado a su cultura costeña, dedicado a su familia y apasionado por el trabajo, pues desde que era muy pequeño siempre tuvo que buscar la manera de generar ingresos para su familia que era muy humilde y no tenía la capacidad económica para enviarlo a estudiar. Por esta razón tiene amplia experiencia y conocimiento en el manejo de diversas actividades y, gracias a ello, hoy en día es un comerciante independiente; su oficio consiste en alquilar lavadoras por horas o por día, según el requerimiento de sus clientes; esto le ha generado los ingresos suficientes para sustentar las necesidades de su familia, conformada por su esposa y sus 4 hijos menores de edad.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar unas pimpinas y otras lavadoras, así aumentará su capacidad instalada y podrá generar mejores ingresos, pues solventará la demanda actual de su servicio; abriéndose paso para cumplir su mayor anhelo que es fortalecer y acreditar bien su negocio y adquirir más máquinas para aumentar el nivel de rentabilidad y, poder brindar a todos sus hijos la educación que él nunca tuvo, pues desea verlos progresar y que sean personas íntegras y con un futuro exitoso y próspero.
texts.en:
Marco is a farmer, rooted in his coastal culture, dedicated to his family and passionate about his work, because since he was very young, he always wanted to find ways to earn money for his humble family who never had the means to send him to school. For this reason he has ample experience and knowledge in handling various activities and, as a result, nowadays he is an independent trader. His job is in the rental of washing machines by the hour or day, depending on the requirements of his clients. This has provided him with sufficient income in order to sustain the needs of his family, which consists of his wife and four young children.
He is requesting the loan in order to buy some containers and other washing machines, thereby increasing his production capacity and generate better revenue, this will meet the current demands for his services - opening the way to fulfill his greatest desire which is to strengthen and firmly establish his business and acquire more machines in order to increase the level of profitability. As a result he will be able to give all his children the education that he never had, to see them progress and become people of integrity with a successful and prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy some containers and other washing machines

loans.name: Libia Amparo

texts.es:
Libia es una mujer luchadora y amable, madre soltera de un hijo al que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo y dedicación. Desde muy joven aprendió el arte de la confección de una manera empírica y desde hace muchos años montó su propio taller ubicado en un espacio de su casa; actualmente presta el servicio de confección a terceros y, de manera alterna también tiene una pequeña miscelánea, en la que vende todo tipo de mercancía; esto le genera un ingreso adicional para solventar los gastos familiares, especialmente con lo relacionado al delicado estado de salud que enfrenta su madre.
El crédito es solicitado como apoyo para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, encajes, entre otros), con los que podrá cumplir su sueño de confeccionar la línea propia y además podrá cumplir con los contratos que tiene pendientes. De esta manera, Libia desea seguir luchando para sacar adelante su oficio y sus negocios, garantizando una mejor  calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Libia is a hard-working and friendly woman.  She is the single mother of one child who she has dedicated a lot of time and effort to bringing up.  When she was very young, she learnt by experience the trade of tailoring and a long time ago she set up her own workshop for producing for third parties.  At the same time, she also has a small general store in which she sells all types of goods.  This provides her with an extra income which allows her to take care of family expenses, especially those related to the ill health of her mother.

The loan is to buy supplies wholesale (cloth, thread, buttons and lace among other things), which she can use to fulfill her dream of producing her own line and meet existing contracts that she has pending.  In this way, Libia intends to keep working hard to develop her business and her trade, which will guarantee a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and lace, among other things)

loans.name: Zviad

texts.en:
Zviad is a 31-year-old young man, who lives in Kutaisi, west Georgia.  He lives with his wife, school-aged son and mother-in-law.  His mother-in-law is a housekeeper but his family's primary source of income is his wife's work serving clients as a manicurist at a salon.  However, a four-member family cannot live only under this insignificant salary.  

Zviad decided to contribute to the welfare of the family and start his own activity.  He sold his second flat in order to buy a mini-bus for serving clients as a driver and to generate some income to increase his family's standard of living.
 
Zviad applied for a loan through MFO Credo, and was approved under the framework of a start-up program.  This program is a joint initiative with Kiva that permits the rural poor to start or re-start businesses.  A loan of $2,000 will help him to pay the mini-bus toll and then start a mini-bus line service.  Zviad hopes to offer his family a higher quality of life and a more stable financial future.

loans.use: to pay the mini-bus toll and start a mini-bus line service

loans.name: María Oberis

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 35 años de edad que ha pasado por muchas dificultades tras la separación con su esposo, entró en una crisis tanto emocional, como económica en la que su padres fueron el único apoyo para ella y su pequeña hija. Con el ánimo de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía del hogar, ella desea iniciar su propio negocio de helados para el cual ya posee local, pues tiene amplio conocimiento y experiencia porque tenía un negocio similar en sociedad con su esposo, pero tras la separación éste se tuvo que cerrar, quedando en la ruina, lo que la obligó a vender los pocos enseres que poseía para saldar las deudas del mismo. Esto la lleva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará utensilios de cocina (copas, cucharas, vasos desechables, entre otros), así podrá dar inicio a su nuevo proyecto productivo del cual espera tener buenos resultados y comenzar a ser reconocido en el sector tanto por la calidad de sus productos, como por el excelente servicio que se prestará.
María tiene como propósito, hacer de su negocio un establecimiento agradable, en el que se pueda compartir en familia o con los amigos y disfrutar de un buen momento; así podrá lograr el éxito que requiere para continuar solventando las necesidades de su hogar y brindar mejor calidad de vida a su hija.
texts.en:
María, 35, has overcome many hard times since she separated from her husband.  She suffered an emotional and financial crisis, and her parents were the only support for her and her young daughter.  

To generate an income and contribute to the household expenses she decided to set up her own ice-cream shop in a property she owns.  She has got a lot of knowledge and experience in this area because she had a similar business with her husband.  However, after they separated, they had to close it, which left her bankrupt, forcing her to sell the few possessions that she had in order to pay off the debts.
  
This has led her to request this loan, which she will use to buy kitchen utensils (glasses, spoons, disposable glasses and other things), which will help her to start her new project.  She hopes to be successful and become well-known in the sector both for the quality of her products and the excellent service she offers.

Her aim is to make her business a nice place, which she can share with her friends and family to celebrate good times.  This way, she can achieve the success that will allow her to keep meeting household needs and offer her daughter a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils (glasses, spoons, disposable glasses and others)

loans.name: Leidiana Patricia

texts.es:
Leidiana es una mujer casada de 40 años de edad y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo.
Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado como operaria en diferentes talleres de confección, donde aprendió todo sobre el manejo del negocio; esto la impulsó a independizarse y montar su propio taller desde hace un año, en el que presta el servicio de confección a terceros y fabricación de prendas de línea propia; trabaja sola todos los días y así genera los ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, elásticos, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener material suficiente para culminar los trabajos que tiene pendientes y para aumentar su producción de línea propia para vender en la temporada decembrina; así logrará recaudar dinero para el sustento familiar.
Leidiana tiene como propósito fortalecer su negocio y en un futuro, sacar su línea propia de blusas para generar mayor impacto en el mercado, mejor rentabilidad y que le permita generar oportunidades de empleo; así mejorará no sólo la calidad de vida de su familia, sino también la de las demás personas que ayuden en su labor.
texts.en:
Leidiana, 40, is married and has two children who she has worked hard to raise.

During her working life she has been a machinist in different tailoring workshops where she learnt all about managing a business.  This spurred her to become independent and set up her own workshop a year ago, where she offers a tailoring service to third parties and makes her own line of clothes.  She works alone every day and generates an income to support her husband with the household expenses.

She will use the loan to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and elastic among other things), which will give her enough material to finish the jobs that she has pending and increase the production of her own line which she can sell in the holiday season.  In this way, she can earn some money to support her family.

Leidiana wants to strengthen her business in the future by selling her own line of blouses, which will give her more of an impact on the market, make her more profit and allow her to create job opportunities.  Then she will improve not only the standard of living of her family, but also that of the people who help her.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and elastic among others).

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
El Sr. Gustavo es dueño de un negocio familiar, un  copetín, que se encuentra en una zona bastante populosa, su local está muy bien ubicado, en los alrededores se  encuentran empresas y negocios, cuyos empleados son clientes del mismo, además de los vecinos de la familia, que regularmente adquieren sus productos.
Tiene antigüedad de más de 10 años, experiencia y clientela formada. El mismo es viudo, y el negocio lo maneja con la ayuda de su suegra e hija.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su copetín, como ser bebidas, golosinas, galletitas y demás.
texts.en:
Gustavo is the owner of a family business; a fast food stall located in a busy area.  It is well placed because it is surrounded by a lot of businesses whose employees, along with his family’s neighbors, regularly buy his products.

It was established more than ten years ago so he has a lot of experience and a customer base.  He is a widower and his mother-in-law and daughter help him run the business.

This loan will help him buy supplies for his stall, such as drinks, candy and cookies among other things.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, cookies and other things.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is a 20-year-old young married woman.  She lives with her husband and 2 kindergarten-aged sons.  Her husband woks as an artisan, taking private orders that generate approximately 400 GEL per month. Lali is unemployed at the moment in spite of having high education.  Currently, she looks after her children, but she has a great desire to be involved in the trading business. 

Lali could not receive a loan from the local financial institutions because of their requirements to have business experience or stable revenue, but does qualify for the start up program offered by Kiva and Credo. The program allows rural poor individuals like Lali the chance to start or re-start a business.  She requested a loan of 1,000 USD to begin trading with home products and clothes.  She plans to go to Turkey and purchase the products at wholesale prices and then resell them among her friends and neighbors. This will allow her the chance to earn income and become financially independent.  This loan will be a great support for the family.  

Lali is thankful to Kiva Lenders for giving her the chance to generate income.

loans.use: To purchase a stock of home products and clothes

loans.name: Celedonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Celedonio está casado con la Sra. Gregoria y tienen varios hijos, todos ya independizados. Se dedica a la carpintería, en la creación y elaboración de muebles en general. Los vende en la capital e interior del país.
Empezó este oficio aproximadamente en el año 1.991, con los conocimientos que fue adquiriendo, con un pequeño capital que fue ahorrando. A medida que corría el tiempo y en vista a que su trabajo fue bien aceptado, tuvo que ir invirtiendo más y más en el negocio. Fue así que acudió a la fundación y accedió a los créditos que le permitieron iniciar su negocio. 
El préstamo que hoy pide lo quiere invertir en la compra de barnices y pinturas para poder usarlos en sus muebles. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Celedonio and his wife, Gregoria, have several children who are all independent.  He is a carpenter who creates and produces furniture in general.  He sells them in the capital and in other parts of the country.

He started this business in about 1991 with the knowledge that he picked up and the little money he was able to save.   As time passed he saw how people liked his products and he had to invest more and more in the business.  That is why he asked the foundation for help and started asking for loans to help his business grow.

The loan he is asking for now will be used to buy varnish and paint to use on his furniture.  He is very grateful for this new opportunity, which will help him a lot.

loans.use: to buy paint and varnish.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.es:
El Sr. Hermes es una persona muy trabajadora, sigue con su trabajo de venta de leche de su propio tambo y también en la venta de leña, comenta que su préstamo anterior de kiva lo utilizó en la compra de una vaca lechera que le ayudó bastante a poder seguir con su trabajo.
Es un hombre que lucha y quiere salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus hijos que dependen de el. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para la compra de novillos, y así tener mayor cantidad de animales. Agradece por la nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo, y que le será nuevamente de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Hermes is a very hard-working person. He continues with his job of selling the milk from his dairy farm as well as selling firewood. He says that he used his previous Kiva loan to purchase a milk cow which helped him to continue with his work.

He is a man who wants to get ahead and fights in order to help his children who depend on him. Today he is requesting a new loan in order to purchase bulls, and thereby have a greater quantity of animals. He is grateful for the new opportunity he is receiving and for the great help it will be.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Adolfina

texts.es:
La Sra. Adolfina es dueña una pequeña despensa, venta de bebidas y empanadas desde hace 9 años, es una persona muy amable y trabajadora, se he hecho ya de una buena clientela en su barrio, ya que siempre tiene todo lo que los clientes buscan.
Es viuda, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad e independizados, y con el fruto de su esfuerzo los ha educado, uno vive con ella y lo ayuda con sus estudios. Comenta que fue muy sacrificado sacar sola a sus hijos adelante, pero que con su sacrificio logró hacer de ellos personas de bien.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de bebidas y otros insumos como verduras y frutas de esa manera poder surtir su negocio ya que se aproximan las fiestas.
texts.en:
Adolfina has been the owner of a small store, which sells drinks and empanadas, for nine years. She is a very friendly and hard-working person. She has already built up a good clientele in her neighbourhood, since she always has everything the customers are looking for.

She is a widow and has three grown-up and independent children. With effort she has educated them. One of them lives with her and she helps him with his studies. She says that it was very demanding to take care of her children by herself, but that with her sacrifice she managed to make good people out of them.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase drinks and other supplies, such as vegetables and fruit, so she can stock her business since the festive season is approaching.

loans.use: to purchase drinks and other products, such as fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael, a sus 40 años de edad, es una víctima más de desplazamiento forzado, debido a la violencia que se presentó en su pueblo natal; con su familia se trasladó para otra ciudad, temiendo por sus vidas y con el ánimo de buscar mejores oportunidades para salir adelante. Luego de radicarse, comenzó a comercializar productos lácteos de manera independiente, pues compraba queso costeño al por mayor en Montería y además tenía un proveedor de helados y yogurt que le enviaban los productos desde otra ciudad; así comenzó a vender puerta a puerta y en algunas tiendas de barrio del municipio donde reside; los ingresos que percibe son destinados para solventar las necesidades básicas de la familia, conformada por su esposa y dos hijos.
El apoyo del crédito es solicitado con el ánimo de fortalecer su actividad, pues requiere comprar surtido al por mayor (queso costeño, helados y yogurt), esto le permitirá consolidarse en el mercado y mejorar las ventas, para generar mejores ingresos que le permitan ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y velar porque sus hijos tengan una educación de mayor calidad para que sean personas prósperas y exitosas.
texts.en:
Ismael, at 40 years of age, is a victim of more than forced displacement due to the violence in his native village. He moved to another city with his family, fearing for their lives and with the intention of looking for better opportunities in order to get ahead in life. After he put down roots, he began to sell dairy products independently. He was purchasing cheese from the coast wholesale in Montería and he had an ice-cream and yoghurt supplier who was sending him products from another city. He began to sell door to door and in some neighbourhood stores in the municipality where he lives. His earnings go towards providing the basic needs of his family, which is made up of his wife and his two children.

The support of the loan is requested with the intention of strengthening his business, as he needs to purchase stock wholesale (cheese, ice-cream, and yoghurt). This will enable him to consolidate himself in the market and improve his sales in order to generate greater revenue, which will allow him to offer a better quality of life to his family and a better-quality education to his children so that they become prosperous and successful people.

loans.use: to purchase stock wholesale (cheese, ice-cream, and yoghurt)

loans.name: Dhaneswar

texts.en: Dhaneswar is a 32-year-old, differently able man living with his parents, brother, wife and daughter in Odisha, a state on the eastern coast of India. His brother is studying in college and his daughter goes to the local school. To support his family, he owns a grocery shop that he has been running for the  last eight years. He sells rice, edible oil, biscuits, spices, and some puja samagris, such as flowers, lentils, fruits, and sweets that are used for God worship at the local temples and family homes in his village. From the shop, he earns 5,000 INR per month.. His father runs a betel shop nearby. Due to his disability, it is hard for Dhaneswar to get around, so his wife and his brother help him to transport grocery items from the market. He is a responsible and hardworking man and dreams of opening a big grocery shop at the nearby market and provide his daughter with a good education. He has applied for a loan of 20,000 to purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks and some perishable items made from milk, like yogurt, and curd.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks, and dairy products for his shop

loans.name: Nikhila

texts.en: Nikhila is a 38-year-old, differently able man living with his parents, wife and two sons in Odisha, a state on the eastern coast of India. His elder son is studying in the local school. To support his family, he owns a Betel shop that he has been running for the last four years. He sells betel leaf, betel related spices, biscuits, some cosmetics and general household items. He earns 4,000 INR per month from his shop.. His wife sells milk and she helps in Nikhila's business. Due to his disability, it is hard for Nikhila to get around, so his wife helps him to transport grocery items from the market. He is a responsible and hardworking man and dreams of constructing a small house for his family and providing his sons with a good education. He has applied for a loan of 15,000 INR to purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks and cosmetic items for his betel shop to expand the current business. He is very thankful to Kiva for providing this opportunity.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks, and cosmetics to expand his shop

loans.name: Nonna

texts.en:
Nonna is a nice 30-year-old lady who lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. She graduated from Kapan State Architectural University and for three years, she worked at the school as a teacher of Armenian Language and Literature. Since 2005, she has been working at the local TV channel as a journalist. Nonna lives alone, since her parents are still in the village of Artsvanik where she was born.

Nonna is asking for a loan of 500.000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer, since she needs it for her work. As she says, she must always be aware of all the news in any corner of the world.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Eldar

texts.en: Eldar is a 39-year-old married man who lives in Batumi district. He has a school-aged son and a wife, who is a housekeeper. The only source of income for the family is Eldar's salary. He works as an artisan in construction. He generates approximately 450 GEL monthly. His salary, however, is not enough to meet the basic needs of his family. Eldar decided to start another private activity parallel to his current work. He has already purchased a car and now he is requesting a loan to pay the toll for his car and then start a taxi business. He received the credit in the framework of the joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. This Start up Program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that don't have access to credit products. The loan is very important for him to be able to provide a taxi service and gain income for his family. Eldar relies on the goodwill of the lenders and highly appreciates their support.

loans.use: To pay the toll for his car and start a taxi business

loans.name: Lernik

texts.en:
Lernik is 52 years old and lives in Kadjaran city in the Syunik region. He has studied at the Yerevan State Pedagogical University with the faculty of Biochemistry. For several years, he worked at the school as a teacher of chemistry. Now in the village Dzagedzor, he is a director of the school. Lernik is divorced and he has two sons. Both of them live and work in Yerevan. His elder son is already married and his younger son is going to get married.
 
Lernik is asking for a loan of 700.000 Armenian drams to help his son financially to organize his wedding party.

loans.use: to pay for his son's wedding expenses

loans.name: Martun

texts.en:
Martun is 52 years old. In the village of Achanan in the Syunik region, he does farming and agricultural activities.  He is married and has four children (two sons and two daughters). In 1988, he has established a milk and meat-producing cooperative. Then, for several years, he worked as a forester. Now he is fully and seriously engaged in farming and agriculture. He has a plot of land of his own and he rents land on which he cultivates wheat, vegetables and fruits. On his farm, he has 2 cows, a piglet, 20 chickens and 8 rabbits. He also has agricultural equipment and machinery that he uses to cultivate his land. In farming and in the sale of farm products (milk, meat, eggs, vegetables and fruits), his wife used to help him a lot, but now she has serious health problems and she needs surgery urgently.

Martun is asking for a loan of 600.000 Armenian drams to pay for his wife’s surgery.

loans.use: to pay for his wife’s surgery

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en: Edgar is 28 years old and lives in the nice city of Dilijan. He has no higher education and since his childhood, first with his father, and now with his wife, has been engaged in farming. Edgar is married and he has two children.  On his plot of land, Edgar built a barn, where he breeds five cows, two calves and chickens. He manages to sell a lot of eggs, milk, macun (Armenian national dairy product), cheese made by his mother and some meat. Edgar is asking for a loan of 800.000 Armenian drams to buy a lot of hay for his farm cattle, since he wants to provide them with warmth and food for the winter.

loans.use: to buy hay for his cattle

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado la Union está en el 15 ciclo, es un grupo muy emprendedor y que fueron creciendo de apoco, todas ellas son mujeres que trabajan desde muy tempranas horas, todo ello para poder luchar por un futuro mejor para sus familias.
Maxima es parte de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas de forma ambulante, y día a día empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas. Su sueño es poder tener su propia tienda de ropa y no tener que trabajar más de forma ambulante. Agradece también por las capacitaciones y la ayuda que están recibiendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para la venta, ya que se acerca la época en que más ventas tiene y quiere poder tener una buena variedad para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called “La Union” is in its 15th cycle. It is a very entrepreneurial group and it is slowly growing. All members are women who start working in the very early hours of the morning in order to strive for a better future for their families.

Maxima is a member of this group. She sells clothing door-to-door and starts work very early every day. It is her dream to have her own clothes shop and no longer to have to work selling from door-to-door. She is thankful for the training and the support the group is receiving.

She is asking for this loan to invest in in the purchase of various items for sale, since the time when she makes more sales is approaching and she wants to be able to offer her customers a wide variety of goods.

loans.use: to buy various items for sale.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es de la ciudad de Concepción, una persona sacrificada, proviene de una familia de escasos recursos, pero el está luchando por poder salir adelante.
Está estudiando la carrera para ser doctor, y así con su trabajo también poder ayudar a las demás personas. Su meta es poder ser el sostén de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus materiales de estudios, como ser libros y copias. Esta agradecido por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, que le ayudará muchísimo en su vida de estudiante.
texts.en:
Juan lives in the city of Concepción. He is a very selfless person and comes from a family with little resources, but he is striving to get ahead.

He is studying to become a doctor, and thus he will also be able to help other people through his work. It is his goal to be a pillar of support to his family.

He is asking for this loan to invest it in study materials, for example books and copies. He is very thankful for this opportunity, which will help him a lot in his life as a student.

loans.use: to pay for study materials, for example books and copies.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena lleva una vida sacrificada ya que se esfuerza para poder culminar sus estudios y de ese modo lograr sus metas la cual es formarse como una profesional capaz para la profesión que eligió.
Está estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas que le permitirá ayudar a las personas que necesiten de sus servicios. Ella es una persona muy estudiosa, y comenta que su pilar es su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Lorena is living a life with many hardships but she is striving to complete her studies and thus to reach her goal of becoming a professional in the career she chose.

She is studying systems analysis and this will allow her to help other people who need her services. She is a very studious person and says that she is a pillar of support to her family.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay her university fees, which will be a great help for her.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Esmelda

texts.es: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 40 años de edad, casada con tres hijos, en edad escolar. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos hace un año estableció su pequeño negocio en el corredor de su vivienda de tambo de madera. Organizó un grupo solidario para gestionar un préstamo en PANA PANA. Actualmente solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería: Escoba, chivería, granos básicos, papel higiénico, sopas instantáneas, toallas sanitarias. Su sueño es apoyar a su familia, debido a que su esposo es taxista, sin embargo en los últimos meses el taxi ha presentado problemas mecánicos, por lo que no le ha permitido prestar el servicio de transporte y brindarles recursos económicos a su familia. También anhela construir su vivienda de cemento.
texts.en:
She is from Puerto Cabezas, is 40 years old and married with three children who are of school age. In order to have her own source of income, she set up a small business in a wooden booth on the porch of her home three years ago. She organized a solidarity group to take out a loan with PANA PANA.

At present, she is asking for a loan to buy merchandise: a broom, dairy products, bulk grains, toilet paper, instant soups, and sanitary napkins. It is her dream to support her family. Her husband is a taxi driver, but for the last few months the taxi has had mechanical problems and therefore he could not provide transportation services and by this generate financial resources for his family.

Also, she would like to build a concrete home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: a groom, dairy products, bulk grains, toilet paper, instant soups, and sanitary napkins.

loans.name: Mujeres Buscando Un Futuro Group

texts.es: “MUJERES BUSCANDO UN FUTURO”  es una alcancía conformada por  9 socias. Edith es una de sus integrantes, ella tiene 40 años es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos menores de edad que dependen de los  ingresos de ella y su pareja. Edith es vendedora de productos de belleza, empezó en este negocio hace 15 años y se siente feliz por todo lo que ha logrado ahora tiene muchos clientes y sus ingresos le permiten ayudar a su familia. Sus principales clientes son mujeres. En esta oportunidad quiere invertir su préstamo en la compra de productos de belleza, la temporada navideña es muy buena para las ventas y quiere aprovechar al máximo. Edith y su grupo comunal están agradecidos por el préstamo otorgado, en la foto es la tercera de la izquierda viste polo color azul.
texts.en:
“Mujeres Buscando Un Futuro” is a communal bank consisting of 9 members. Edith is one of its them. She is 40 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and has 4 children under age who depend on the income of Edith and her partner.

Edith sells beauty products. She started this business 15 years ago and is happy about all she has achieved. She has many customers and her earnings allow her to support her family. Her customers are mainly women. This time, she wants to invest her loan in the purchase of beauty products. The Christmas season is a very good time for sales and she wants to take full advantage.

Edith and her communal bank are are grateful for the loan granted. In the picture, she is the third from the left and is wearing a blue polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Ricardo Felix

texts.es: Ricardo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá compra bisutería de plata ya que él se dedica la venta de bisutería y joyas de plata desde hace 5 años con lo cual tiene ingresos para poder sacar adelante a su familia, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local propio para su negocio.
texts.en: Ricardo is very grateful to lenders from Kiva since, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy silver jewelry. He has worked selling silver jewelry and costume jewelry for 5 years, and has been able to use the income earned to support his family. So he will keep pressing ahead in life to be able to realize his big dream which is to have a separate premises for his business.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry

loans.name: Ekaterine

texts.en:
Ekaterine is 20 years old and from the village of Tsesi. She is single and lives with her mother, brother and retired grandmother. Ekaterine has recently graduated from the local school, but she is unable to get a high education due to her family’s poverty. She stays home and takes care of her family. The only breadwinner in the household is Ekaterine’s mother who works as a sick nurse for a small salary.

In order to generate additional income, Ekaterine is requesting a loan of 450 USD. She will buy stocks of merchandise at wholesale prices to start a clothing sales business in her community. Ekaterine will offer her clients a wide assortment of winter clothing, linens and various household items and give customers the option of paying later for their purchases. The loan will enable Ekaterine to earn a profit and save money to satisfy her everyday needs. She has a great desire to get ahead and awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothing and household items for resale.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Rory está en su ciclo 8 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo dentro del grupo. Todas ellas participan activamente en las actividades propuestas por el grupo, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que tienen dentro del  grupo. 
Norma es una persona que se destaca por su esfuerzo y por su trabajo, ya que se dedica a ser modista y también se dedica a la venta de mercería de todo tipo de productos. Empezó su trabajo con mucho sacrificio, pero hoy ya tiene muy buena clientela gracias a su amabilidad con las demás personas, comenta también que por medio de su labor puede ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que obtiene. Hoy pide de este préstamo ya que quiere invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos para la confección que hace, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por su familia y sus seres queridos.
texts.en: The group called Kuna Rory is in its 8th cycle of the programme of the committee of women, where all members work and help themselves to get by in life through the effort and unrelenting work of the group. All of the members are actively involved in the proposed activities of the group, mutually helping themselves reach the common goals that they set out. Norma is a person known for her work ethic, since she is both dressmaker and at the same time works selling all kinds of haberdashery products. She began her work with a great deal of sacrifice, but nowadays she has a very good clientele, thanks to her friendliness with others. She notes also that through her work she has been able to help her family with the income she earns. Today this loan is being requested in order to buy fabric and yarn for dressmaking. With this she will be able to keep working hard for her family and loved ones.

loans.use: to buy fabric and yarn for dressmaking.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
Mujeres en Accion está en su ciclo número  8  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una de ellas promete dar su mejor esfuerzo para poder ayudarse y salir adelante, mejorar la situación de sus familias y darles lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Catalina se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad a sus vecinos y otros clientes ocasionales. Es una persona que desde el inicio mostró muchas ganas de superarse y ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, su sueño es poder tener un local amplio donde pueda hacer sus ventas y así también poder dar a otros trabajo.
Ella solicita este préstamo para la compra de Aceite, harina, azúcar, cernes, panificados, entre otros, lo que le ayudará a tener un mejor stock de productos para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Mujeres en Accion" is in its eighth loan cycle in the women's group program.  Each member is committed to doing her best to get ahead and improve her family's situation, giving them everything she was unable to have.

Catalina sells staple goods to neighbors and occasional customers.  She is someone who, from the beginning, has been very determined to get ahead and help her family througth her work.  Her dream is to have a large shop to sell her goods and to employ more people.

She is requesting a loan to buy oil, flour, sugar, meats, baked goods, etc. to have more products on hand for her clients.

loans.use: To buy oil, flour, sugar, meats, baked goods, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Asiya's Group

texts.en:
Asiya is a 36-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan and is the mother of one child. Her husband owns a small restaurant in the market which is the only source of income for the family. He sells a variety of delicious foods in his restaurant.

Presently he needs to purchase a variety of food items to cook delicious food to sell. However, due to a lack of finances he finds it difficult. Therefore his wife Asiya, a member of a two persons lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase a variety of food items to cook food to sell. With the profit amount her husband wants to grow his business in the future. Asiya is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of food items to cook food to sell.

loans.name: Medardo Elias

texts.es: Medardo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar la construcción de un baño en su vivienda, de esta manear podrá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño” darle una profesión a sus hijos y poder terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en: Medardo is grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their great support he will be able to buy materials to build a bathroom. This will give him a better quality of life and help him to keep fighting to make his dream reality, which is to find his children a profession and to finish building his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Leidy Carolina

texts.es:
Ella escogió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería porque sentía el deber de ayudar a las personas mediante lo mas importante que es la salud. Al ingresar al programa se dio cuenta que la enfermería era mas que el apoyo con conocimiento y ayuda humanitaria, espiritual y sin ninguna clase de interés a parte del humanitario, Esto empezó hace mucho tiempo cuando ella tuvo que ver agonizar y morir a su bis abuela prácticamente la persona que  la crió, debido a un mal procedimiento, desde ese momento siendo muy pequeña decidió ser enfermera pues una medicina era mas de escribir y menos de estar con un paciente en su entorno.
Debido a inconvenientes económicos no pudo iniciar en una universidad, pero asistió a varias ferias de pos grado conoció campo alto y decidió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, pues es una rama muy importante de la enfermería. Tiene como propósito, terminar sus practicas con la ayuda que hoy le presenta kiva para poder ejercer el auxiliar de enfermería y de allí con sus ingresos y la ayuda de su familia poder especializarse ya sea en UCI o iniciar la carrera de la jefatura.
Ella sabe que debe esforzarse mucho pero siempre tiene presente que por ayudar a la gente que necesita de ella el esfuerzo va a ser muy bien recompensado en su momento.
texts.en:
Leidy Carolina decided to study to be a nursing auxiliary because she felt the need to help people in an area as important as health.  When she joined the program she became aware that nursing was more than lending support through knowledge.  It was something spiritual and no more than humanitarian.  Her awareness began some time ago when she had to watch as her great grandmother agonized and died following a procedure.  She was the person who had practically raised Leidy Carolina.  From that moment on, at a very early age, she decided she wanted to be a nurse because being a doctor was more about writing and less about being close to patients.
