The family doesn’t have a safe latrine, so Koem Eang is asking for a loan to build one. A household latrine will enable her to promote good health and improve the family's living conditions. 

Thanks to the water loan program offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited at a special rate, Koem Eang has been encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine to promote good health and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es: Ella escogió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, primero porque le gusta ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan y a si darse conocer, pero también lo ve como una salida y como una meta, ya que por medio de este técnico puede estar a unos pocos pasos de ser profesional. Se debe empezar por algo y eso es aprender poco a poco a superarse. Ella necesita acceder a kiva porque ella solo cuenta con el apoyo económico de su mama ya que su papa no responde por ella. A su mama le queda muy dificl pagar la cuota normal ya que supera su economía, de esto depende que ella pueda seguir estudiando, y mas aun ya empieza a hacer sus practicas en un hospital. Todo el mundo tiene problemas económicos, pero algunas personas no tienen como pagar y a si mismo como crecer como persona. Por medio de este pequeño paso, ella quiere obtener su técnico y a si mismo, mas adelante, poder hacer una especialización en jefe de enfermería, superarse como persona y tener la satisfacción de que cumple una de sus metas propuestas, pero para eso necesitas esmero, dedicación y dinero para llevarlo a cabo, pero si ella accede a kiva va a poder lograr una escala en su gran meta propuesta. Ademas de esto, es satisfactorio saber que mas adelante, cuando su carrera de frutos ella sera una gran profesional, ubicada en un buen hospital y saliendo adelante día a día y mirando atrás todos aquellos sacrificios que tuvo que hacer, pero mirando y recordando que tuvo ayudas como lo es kiva, una ayuda económica que da motivación y superación.
texts.en:
She chose to study to be a nursing assistant because she likes to help people who need it.  She also sees it as a journey and a goal, since this technical job allows her to be a few steps from being a professional.  She needs to start with something, and she is learning slowly to get ahead.  She needs to come to Kiva because she only has financial support from her mother, since her father does not take responsibility for her.  It is difficult for her mother to pay the fees since they exceed her financial situation, but she can't continue studying if she can't pay her fees and she is starting to do her practical work in a hospital.  Everyone has financial problems, but some people don't have a way to pay, and she is growing as a person.  

This small step will help her obtain her technical degree, and later, she wants to do a specialization as a nurse manager.  She can succeed and have the satisfaction of meeting one of her goals, but in order to do that, you need care, dedication, and money.  If she comes to Kiva, she can achieve a large part of her proposed goal.  In addition, it is satisfying to know that later, when her career prospers, she will be a great professional, located in a good hospital, and moving forward day after day.  She will look back on all the sacrifices that she had to make, and she will see and remember that she had financial help from Kiva that gave her motivation and support.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth lives and works in New Kru Town, Liberia, which is one of the poorer areas in living conditions. She is 36 years old, married, and has two children ages 7 and 13. She is a high school graduate, and her husband works as a auditor. For the past four years now, Elizabeth has been a seller of cosmetics in the local market. She started this business with a little amount which she got from her husband. She enjoys  her customers' buying and the money she generates from her business every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics for her business. She plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Miatta

texts.en: Miatta lives in Long Town with her husband and 5 children whose ages range from 7 to 20. Only three of her children are in school. She has been running a shop where she sells rice and soup. She is able to send her children to school and save some money everyday from her business. She started this business by selling to her friends. She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, pepper, fish, meat, oil, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, fish, meat, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Binta

texts.fr:
Madame Binta est veuve et mère de 8 enfants dont 2 sont décédés. Elle fait du commerce depuis plus de 10 ans, elle achetait sa marchandise en Mauritanie. Elle vend des tissus et divers produits alimentaires, du savon de gommage….
Binta peut remercier le bon car elle a ses enfants qui travaillent et qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de la maison.
Le crédit peut impacter sur la situation du client en améliorant les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Si elle a les moyens, elle envisage de construire sa maison.
texts.en: Binta is a widowed mother of eight children, two of which are deceased. She has been trading for over 10 years, buying her merchandise from Mauritania. She sells fabrics and various food products, as well as cosmetics. Binta will be able to pay back the loan, as her children earn money and are able to pay for the household expenses. This loan will make a positive impact on the client's situation by improving the family's dietary conditions. If she has the means to do so, she plans to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy various food products, fabrics and cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Meb

texts.en:
Meb, aged 51, is a resident from a rural village of Santuk district, Kampong Thom province. She has five adult children. Her husband and children help her in daily farming work growing rice and water melons, which she sells at the market. She is able to earn KHR 12,000 per day, which normally goes for food and other costs of commodities.

To help her further develop her farming business, Meb is asking for a loan to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance at the rice fields. Also, this machine can be used to attach to a trailer for loading items. Meb plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance at the rice fields.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: El señor Teodoro es casado vive con su esposa y tiene una hija dependiente a la que mantiene y ayuda en su educación, es un persona responsable, trabaja como agricultor en su pequeña parcela, realizando mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de cítricos, ademas también trabaja como albañil cuatro días de la semana durante todo el año realizando construcciones para la población, se esfuerza cada día para mantener a su familia. Actualemente vive en su casa propia, pero la construcción no está terminada por completo, por tal motivo solicita un crédito para que pueda refaccionar su vivienda y así logre vivir más cómodo junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Teodoro is married and lives with his wife. He has one dependent daughter whom he supports and helps with her education. Teodoro is a responsible person. He works farming his plot of land, where he maintains his citrus fields. He also works in construction four days per week all year long. He works on construction projects for the town. Teodoro works very hard every day to support his family.

Teodoro lives in his own house, but the construction is not finished, which is why he is requesting this loan to work on his home, so that he and his family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to work on finishing the construction of his home.

loans.name: Viola

texts.en:
Viola is 47 years old and lives in Logan Town, one of the early communities in Liberia that is well-known. She is married and has two children, ages 15 and 28. Her children are presently in school and live at home. She is a 10th-grade dropout. 

For a while now, she has been running a shop where she sells spaghetti, boiled eggs, doughnuts, etc. She started this business with money from her husband. She managed to establish her business, and learned this way of selling from her friends. She is very happy with her business because she makes a lot of profits and it keeps her busy. 

She is requesting a loan to buy flour by the bag, eggs by the carton, spaghetti, etc., for her business. Her plan is to build a house and improve her children's living conditions even more.

loans.use: to buy flour by the bag, eggs by the carton, spaghetti, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Tengizi

texts.en:
Tengizi is a 33-year-old married man who lives in Zugdidi. He has a wife, mother and two little children. His mother gets monthly assistance of 150 GEL (Georgia lari) from the local government. The only employed person in the family is Tengizi, who is a loader to a store. However, his generated income is insignificant compared with his family's needs. 

Tengizi decided to somehow increase the living conditions of the family and wants to open a general store near his house. He requested $1,200 USD to purchase stock of food products and have money for working capital. He sought credit among local financial institutions, but his attempts were unsuccessful because of his poor living conditions. The start-up program that is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo enables rural poor and inexperienced people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. Tengizi's application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan for opening the store and increasing the productivity.

loans.use: To open a general store and have money for working capital

loans.name: Golda

texts.en:
Golda is 44 years old and lives in Caldwell. She is married to a contractor. She has two children, 22 and 26 years old, who are working and living on their own.  She is a high school graduate.

For the past 10 years, she has been selling used clothes from a table in the local market. She established the business with small loans from friends and says that she encounters few problems in her business.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. In the future, she plans to complete her education.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo is 29 years old and single with a 7-year-old child who lives at home and attends school. She is a 5th-grade dropout.

For the past seven years, she has been selling pepper, bitter ball (an eggplant like vegetable), etc., in the local market. She established the business with a small amount of money from her friends and says that she encounters few problems in her business other than finding good supplies at reasonable costs.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, etc., to expand the range of sales. In the future, she wants to support her child and buy some land.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, etc., to expand the range of sales.

loans.name: Jani

texts.en:
Jani has been involved with his arboriculture (the orchard business) for the past three years, since his return from the immigration where he learned the skills for such an activity. The majority of the orchard trees are peaches; however, he is not limited and has other types as well, just in a smaller number. 

Jani is requesting a loan for the very first time to add some more peach seedlings, and the amount of 100,000 Albanian Lek will help him achieve this goal. His clients at the moment include locals; however, he wants to produce more and sell in larger quantities to wholesale buyers.

Jani is married and has two children, age 10 and 7, and all of them reside in a very rural village in south central Albania.

loans.use: to add some more peach seedlings to his orchard activity

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia, age 47, is a married woman and the mother of eight children. She has been providing laundry services with her son, who is also shown in the photo.  She makes enough through her business to bear her household expenditures. 

Over time she has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation and has attained a regular list of customers. To meet the orders of her customers, she needs to purchase a new dryer machine along with packs of washing powder. For this reason, she sought a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase a new dryer machine along with packs of washing powder.

loans.name: Tanveer

texts.en: Tanveer is a 27-year-old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida, a 59-year-old married lady, has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at  reasonable prices, and has retained many customers over the years who regularly shop at her store. She earns enough to provide for her family. 

In order to fully stock her store, Khalida has requested a loan of Rs 40,000 to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. Khalida wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a married woman. She has been successfully running a general store at her house for the last four years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough money to provide for her family. She is a mother of four children and is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing, and health. 

Shazia wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages.

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en:
Hiba is a 29-year-old mother of three children who has been running her convenience store for a year. She is a hard worker who is putting much effort into supporting her husband and beloved family.

Hiba is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a bedroom for her children.

She is well known in her region with the special prices and quality of products she provides to her customers.

She will continue to work hard to develop her business. In the future she will open a special fruits and vegetables section to fulfill her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy a bedroom for her children.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 19 años, 16 años y 15 años de edad. María se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras. La venta la realiza en el mercado central de su localidad y tienen 5 años de experiencia en el negocio. Desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda y construir un corredor por lo que se vio en la necesidad de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios (lámina galvanizada, madera, ladrillo, cemento y arena)para reparar el techo y para construir el corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en: María, 43, is a single mother and lives in a house of her own with her three children, aged 19, 16, and 15. She sells fruits and vegetables at her town's central market and has been doing so for the last five years. She wants to repair the roof of her house and build a corridor, which is why she had to ask for a loan in order to buy the necessary materials (galvanised steel sheets, wood, bricks, concrete, and sand) to repair the roof and build the corridor.

loans.use: to buy the necessary materials to repair her roof and build a corridor.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
El  joven Misael  es  una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive con su esposa y sus  hijos en la zona sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la   compra y venta  de semilla  de marañón.
Misael  el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de  semilla de marañón.  Con el préstamo   espera  que la clientela de su negocio aumente al ofrecerles  una mejor  atención y cubrir todas las necesidades de los mismos  y con esto mejorar un poco su situación  económicos  y la de su  familia. 
Misael en unos años espera que su negocio siga  creciendo y  consolidándose  para que se convierta en la más grande y  reconocido de la zona y  seguir  apoyando a su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Diciembre
texts.en:
Young Misael is a responsible, honest, and hard-working person. He lives with his wife and their children in the southern part of Honduras. He trades cashew nuts for a living. He needs the loan to buy nuts to sell. He hopes to see his customers grow in number by providing good customer service and meeting customer demand. His goal is to improve his financial situation somewhat, as well as that of his family. He wants to see his business grow and improve every year so as to become the biggest and most renowned in the area, in order to keep supporting his family. 

Choluteca, Honduras –  December

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Awa Mbadou

texts.fr:
Âgée de 23 ans, mademoiselle Awa Mbadou s’active dans le commerce depuis maintenant 3 ans. Elle loge à environ 15minutes de marche du guichet à chez elle. Elle est une cliente récemment inscrite et n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit. Afin de pouvoir préparer les fêtes de Noël et de fin d’année, elle sollicite un crédit pour acheter des sacs, des chaussures et des habits pour homme et femme. Awa Mbadou commence sa journée à 11h et repli vers 16h.Elle vit chez ses parents et donne une participation pour la nourriture. C’est vraiment grâce au compte qu’Awa Mbadou arrive à mettre un peu d’argent de coté.
Et puisqu’elle est très ambitieuse, elle rêve de devenir une grande commerçante qui ira jusqu’à amener des containers de marchandises.
texts.en: 23-year-old Awa Mbadou has been doing business for three years now. She lives about a 15-minute walk from her stall. She is a recently registered client and has never taken out a loan before. In order to prepare for the Christmas holidays and the new year, she is requesting a loan in order to buy bags, shoes and men and women's clothes. Awa Mbadou starts her day at 11 am and finishes at 4 pm. She lives with her parents and contributes to the family's food budget. This is how Awa Mbadou is able to save a small amount of money. As she is very ambitious, she dreams of becoming a great businesswoman who will even handle the transportation of the merchandise containers.

loans.use: to buy clothes, bags and shoes for resale

loans.name: Galaktion

texts.en:
Galaktion is 62 years old, from the village of Ingiri. He is married and lives with his wife, two grown children and school-age grandchild. The only one who earns money in the household is Galaktion’s wife, who works as a hair stylist at the local beauty salon and gets small daily wage. 

In order to generate additional monthly funds and ensure his family members with better living conditions, Galaktion is going to start a small store in his own commercial space. With the received Kiva loan, he will buy merchandise, such as tableware, souvenirs and various of home accessories. He will start working as a salesperson and get good profit. His store has great location and Galaktion hopes, his business will be successful.

He awaits your support.

loans.use: to start a home products store.

loans.name: Deomid

texts.en:
Deomid, 36, lives with his wife and retired mother in the Tsalka district. The source of income for the family is a small house rental and the retirement pension of Deomid’s mother.

In order to generate stable monthly income, Deomid decided to start up a grocery store near his house, but he found he didn’t have enough money to do so. With a loan of $2,500 USD, Deomid will purchase stock of basic groceries to start a store. He owns commercial space and all the needed inventories, and Deomid will save on rental costs. He and his wife will work as salespersons and serve the clients in a friendly way. Deomid is a very determined man and hopes his project will be lucrative. He awaits your generosity.

loans.use: to purchase stock of basic groceries to start up a grocery store

loans.name: Mama

texts.en: Mama is 47 years old and lives in Caldwell. She is married and has 3 children from 11 to 18 years old, who live with her at home and attend school. For the past 10 years she has been selling bread, cubes, rice, drinks, and cold water in the local market. Sometimes her customers use credit and refuse to pay. She started this business by baking bread. She is requesting a loan to purchase drinks and water for her business. She hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase drinks and water for her business.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es:
Dora de 40 años de edad, terminó sus estudios de bachillerato, a base de esfuerzo y dedicación, está casada; su esposo emigró hacia los Estados Unidos buscando el sueño americano, para poder sacar adelante a su familia, las cosas no le han salido tan mal y ha conseguido trabajo en un taller automotriz, tienen dos hijos que viven junto con Dora, ambos están estudiando; la mayor inicia sus estudios universitarios en el inicio del año 2014, pretende  ser profesional para así  recompensar todo el esfuerzo de sus padres, que se esfuerzan día a día para que tengan lo necesario 

Para salir adelante, Dora se levanta todos los días bien temprano, y  junto con su hija encienden el molino que tienen en el patio de su casa  y esperan que lleguen los clientes con el maíz, y empiezan a trabajar arduamente en esta labor a lo largo de toda la mañana, de esta manera logran hacer un poco de dinero para cubrir sus necesidades básicas, a la vez tiene una venta de gas propano que vende a todos los vecinos que lo necesiten. Se ha dedicado a los dos negocios desde hace 15 años,  siempre buscando el bienestar familiar. 

Ella ha solicitado el préstamo, porque quiere arreglar el techo donde se encuentra el molino, porque se encuentra desprotegido y el viento puede ocasionarles un problema. Esto ayudará, a que tanto ella como los clientes se encuentres más seguros e incluso con confianza para estar en ese lugar en los días de invierno.
Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos graduarse de la universidad y que sean ciudadanos ejemplares que contribuyan con el desarrollo del país y también con su familia. También le gustaría en un futuro,  tener una tienda para así cubrir con la demanda de productos del hogar que necesitan sus vecinos.
texts.en: Dora is 40 years old and finished high school thanks to her efforts and commitment. She is married, and her husband emigrated to the United States in search of the American dream, to help his family. He was able to get work as a mechanic and is doing all right. Dora and her husband have two children, who live with their mother and are both in education. The daughter, who is the older of the two, starts university in 2014. Her dream is to have a career in order to make her parents proud and thank them for all their support. Dora wakes up early every day and, together with her daughter, turns on the grinder located in their courtyard. They then wait for customers to arrive with their sweetcorn. They work all morning very hard in order to cover basic necessities. They also sell propane to neighbours who need gas. Dora has been tending to both businesses for 15 years, always with the well-being of her family in mind. She asks for a loan in order to repair the roof of the courtyard, because the grinder is inadequately protected from the elements, and the wind could cause problems. A good roof will mean safety for her and her customers, especially in the winter. Dora's dream is to see her children become university graduates and model citizens who contribute to the country's development and help their family. She would also like, in the future, to set up a shop to meet neighbourhood demand for household products.

loans.use: to repair the roof of the courtyard, where the grinder is.

loans.name: Nazeeran

texts.en:
Nazeeran is a 36-year-old married woman and the mother of seven. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing services of tailoring in her community. She has been doing it for many years. She very well knows the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) to buy stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is a 45-year-old, married woman and the mother of five children. For many years, she has been running business, manufacturing footballs. She makes balls in different sizes and sells them in her community and in the local market. She has become famous in her town for providing good-quality footballs and she earns enough money to bear the expenses of her family members. 

For the improvement of her business, Bushra availed herself of her ninth loan, in the amount of PKR 45,000 (Pakistan rupees). The amount will be used to purchase rubber bladders and leather covers in a large quantity to cater to more customers without delay. 

She is hopeful of getting an increase in her sales which, ultimately, will help in generating more cash. She dreams of expanding her business and she desires to use part of profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase rubber bladders and leather covers to make footballs.

loans.name: Ambreen

texts.en: Ambreen, age 45, is a married woman. She has been weaving sweaters, caps and shawls for many years. She works hard on her weaver every day so she may earn a living for her family and provide food, health, and education. Ambreen is requesting a loan of Rs. 40,000, which she will use to purchase bundles of wool and threads in different colors along with packs of needles. With the loan, she hopes to increase her sales. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wool and threads in different colors along with packs of needles.

loans.name: Shafqat

texts.en: Shafqat is a 48-year-old, married woman and the mother of six children. She has been running a business selling cloth for many years. She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. Shafqat requested a loan of PKR 50,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy stocks of different cloths for the winter season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of providing a better standard of living for her children through all of her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of different cloths for the winter season.

loans.name: Asmat

texts.en: Asmat is a 35-year-old married woman and the mother of two. She is a hardworking mother, who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing this for many years. She is an expert in the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue the operation of her business, she requested a loan of Rs. 50,000 to buy spools of threads in different colors along with the packs of zippers, buttons and laces to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads in different colors along with the packs of zippers, buttons and laces.

loans.name: Aziz  Fatima

texts.en: Aziz Fatima is a 51-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling animals for many years with the help of her husband. She buys animals, such as baby goats, heifers and calves at low prices. After bringing them up for a year or two, she sells them near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslims countries). She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation. Currently she requested a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase two more heifers. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase two more heifers.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en: Shahida, age 51, runs a business selling animals with the support of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. They buy animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raise them and then sell them in the market at higher prices. They make enough through this business to contribute to the family income. Shahida needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase another calf. The couple is very experienced and have good contacts in the market. With this loan, they will definitely expand their business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase another calf

loans.name: Freedom's Group

texts.en:
Freedom's Group comprises four members, all entrepreneurs who are seeking better opportunities to move on in life. They live in the city of Accra, a beautiful place where trading is very popular and well established. They sell dry fish, secondhand clothing, foodstuffs and salt. This is their first loan with Kiva and their sixth loan cycle with ID-Ghana. 

One of the members, Esther, second from the left in the photo, has been in the group for the past three years. She has established a good friendship with all her neighbors and friends. She likes the fact that all the members of the group are united and much like a family. 

Esther is 32 years old and single; she has two dependent children, who stay with her. She lives in the family house and her children attend school. For the past four years, Esther, has been selling dry fish throughout the week. She plans to use this new loan to buy more dry fish so that she can sell enough to take care of her children. Her goal is to stay healthy so she can keep working to take care of her children.

loans.use: to buy more dry fish

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 43 years old and lives in Caldwell. She is married and her husband is a teacher. They have three children, only one lives at home and attends school. 

For the past 7 years she has been selling drinks and cold water in the local market. Sometimes she buys at a very high price and she realizes a very low profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more drinks and cold water for her business. In the future she plans to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more drinks and cold water for her business.

loans.name: Asima

texts.en: Asima, age 20, runs an animal sales business. She buys baby goats at low prices, raises them and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more baby goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more baby goats.

loans.name: Aasia

texts.en:
Aasia is a 36-year-old, married woman. The man shown in the photo is Aasia’s husband, who is a driver by profession, providing transportation services, using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it functional. 

For this reason, Aasia has applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 for her husband. She wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Aasia is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Kaniz

texts.en:
Kaniz is a 40-year-old woman. For many years, she has been running a business, selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and sells them near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries). She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

Currently, she requests a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more goats. She is in her fourth loan cycle, with good repayment history. 

Kaniz is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is a 45-year-old, married woman and the mother of six children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, and clothing. 

For many years, she, along with her husband, has been doing the work of agriculture. They crop different vegetables and sell them in the local market. She has gradually improved her business, with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

However, due to the lack of availability of funds, Zahida is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more seeds, along with packs of insecticides and pesticides. In this way, she will able to grow more vegetables and inflate her sales. 

Zahida is in her fourth loan cycle, with good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase more seeds, along with packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia, age 30, is a married woman and the mother of five children. She started her own shop where she sells dressmaking supplies including threads, cloth and zippers, etc., as her husband’s income is not enough to meet their family's requirements.  She has been running this business for the past two years and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Currently she applied for a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase spools of threads, cloths, ribbons and buttons in various colors. This loan will help her to improve her sales and profits. She wishes to spend part of the profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase spools of threads, cloths, ribbons and buttons in various colors.

loans.name: Lahai Simah's Group

texts.en:
In the picture above are teachers of a secondary school located in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. School teachers usually come to Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) to apply for loans. With the help of these loans, they are empowered to meet certain financial needs that are unattainable with their small salaries. Some of the most common loan uses are to pay school/college fees, either for themselves to pursue further studies or for their child's school/college fees, to invest in businesses, to buy furniture or a plot of land for future house construction, to buy house building materials, etc. At the end of each month, the teachers can easily repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. Their school's bursar is directly responsible for making the deductions and repayments on their behalf.

Lahai is the featured leader of this group of teachers. The forty-nine-year-old is a native of Kamboma, eastern Sierra Leone. Lahai is married and the father of two school-going children. He has been a school teacher for a number of years. Lahai has requested this loan in order to buy building materials for the construction of a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy building materials for the construction of a house for his family

loans.name: Julia's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from the eastern city of Kenema. They have come to SMT to apply for a loan of 18,300,000.00 SLL for the entire group in order to meet their most immediate and most pressing financial needs. At the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan using their salaries. It is their school's bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the payments on their behalf

Juliua is the feature leader of this group of teachers. Born in Pendendu, the fifty year old is married to a non-governmental-organization (NGO) worker and the couple has four children who attend secondary school. Julia has been a school teacher for thirty-one years. She has requested this loan in order to buy building materials like iron corrugated sheets for the construction of a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials like iron corrugated sheets for the construction of a house for her family.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Pora está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona rural, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra.  Gilda es una de las integrantes, ella es vendedora ambulante de sus lencerías y joyas con el cual le hace crecer a sus hijos.  Es una mujer muy sacrificada, ya que su trabajo no es fácil, pero aun así se esfuerza, ya que no quiere que sus hijos tengan que pasar por necesidades como las que ella tuvo que pasar.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de lencería y joyas para la venta. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Pora is in its sixth loan cycle in the women entrepreneurs program. The group is from city of Concepción, in an area away from the city centre which is still is growing. It’s a rural area which is why the members of this group want to fight to continue its growth and to give the area where they live a better environment so that it continues to grow.

Gilda, a member, is a street vendor who sells linens and jewellery. This activity allows her to raise her children.  She is a very hard working woman as her work isn’t easy, but she makes great effort as she doesn’t want her children to go without necessities as she did.

She is requesting this loan to purchase linens and jewellery for sale. This way she can continue growing her business and give her family what they need to have a life without hardships.

loans.use: to purchase linens and jewellery for sale.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Divino Niño Jesús forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que les permite conocer, a través de la encuesta de los 50 indicadores, la situación en la que cada una se encuentra en un sentido general.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Leonida, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir que se encuentra en un nivel medio, pero ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la venta de producto de limpieza que hace, está luchando por poder dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para salir adelante y no tener que pasar por privaciones.
La Sra. Leonida pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos de limpieza, que podrá vender para ayudar a su familia e ir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Divino Niño Jesús (Divine Baby Jesus) forms part of the poverty elimination program that allows them to know, through the survey of 50 indicators, the situation in which each one finds themselves, in a general sense.

One of the members is Leonida who was shown to be on level 2 of the poverty level on her last survey. In other words, she is found in the middle level but through her efforts, her work and the sale of cleaning products she continues. She is fighting to provide her family with all that they need to come out ahead and to not experience hardship.

Leonida is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of cleaning products which she can sell to help her family and to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products for sale.

loans.name: Gavharbi

texts.ru: Гавхарби 28-летняя замужняя женщина с двумя сыновьями. Она проживает со своей семьей в районе Хамадони. Гавхарби собирается начать швейное дело. Она имеет талант шитья. Платья, которые она шьет для себя всегда получаются красиво. Теперь она решила использовать свой талант и зарабатывать этим путем. Гавхарби для реализации цели просит кредит. Она планирует купить модернизированную швейную машинку. По словам Гавхарби услуга швеи в их районе очень востребованная, так как многие женщины и девушки предпочитают шить платья на свой размер. Она верит в успеха и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Gavharbi is a 28-year-old married woman with two sons. She resides with her family in the Hamadoni area. Gavharbi intends to start a sewing business. She has a talent with sewing. Dresses that she sews for herself are always beautiful. Now she decided to use her talent and to earn a living in this way. To realize her goal, Gavharbi is requesting a loan. She plans to buy a modernized sewing machine. According to Gavharbi, sewing services in their region are in very high demand, since many women and girls prefer to sew dresses in their own size. She believe in the success and hopes for support.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Mayram

texts.ru: Майрам вдова. Она родилась в 1962 году. Майрам с детства была очень трудолюбивой. Она родилась и выросла на юге Таджикистана. Майрам представляет собой примерную таджикскую женщину, которая посвятила всю свою жизнь своей семье. Она живет бедно, так как у нее не было источника дохода. Ее сын и невестка имеют маленькую зарплату. Майрам хочет организовать свой бизнес. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Майрам хочет организовать бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур как зерновые культуры на арендованной земле. Майрам запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mayram is a widow. She was born in 1962. Since childhood, Mayram has been very hardworking. She was born and grew up in the south of Tajikistan. Mayram is an exemplary Tajik woman, who has devoted all her life to her family. She lives poorly, since she does not have a source of income. Her son and daughter-in-law have a small salary. Mayram wants to organize her own business. She studied in the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. Mayram wants to start a business growing crops like grains on leased land. Mayram is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for organizing a new business

loans.name: Miryam

texts.es:
Ella es miryam, estudia estética en campo alto para una proyección, puesto que en un futuro a corto plazo ella quiere colocar en su casa un centro de estética y quiere tener conocimientos claros y profesionales, pero le faltan 8 años para poder pensionarse y tiene un problema de salud con su rodilla que le están tratando y si el tratamiento funciona la posibilidad de que saque antes su pensión, puesto que con este problema es imposible caminar recorridos largos, y por esta razón para asegurar un futuro económico profesional y personal.
Estuvo estudiando estética, la razón de esto también es ayudar a los hijos,  pues los tiene en estudios y todavía les falta, esta profesión le ha gustado siempre, la idea es seguir actualizándose, la necesidad de esta ayuda con este préstamo es que sus hijos estudian y ella les paga  el valor del semestre, el sueldo que ella gana no es mucho y no le alcanza para todos los gastos que tiene, lo que gasta y los hijos requieren, con la ayuda de kiva ella podría terminar sus estudios.

Gracias
texts.en:
This is Miryam. She studies esthetics in CampoAlto. In the near future she wants to put an esthetic centre in her house and she wants to have clear and professional knowledge. But she has 8 years left to retire and she has problems with her knee which is being treated. If the treatment works, there’s a possibility of getting her pension earlier. With her knee problem it’s impossible to walk far distances and for this reason she wants to secure her professional and personal financial future.

She has been studying esthetics; the reason is to also help her children as they are studying. She has always liked this profession. The idea is to continue doing it. The need for this help, with this loan, is so that her children study and she pays for the semester. The money that she earns is not much and doesn’t cover all of her expenses, what she uses and what her children need; with Kiva’s help she could finish her studies.

Thank you.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Amanda Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Amanda es una micro empresaria emprendedora de 53 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Trojes en el oriente de Honduras, es una señora muy trabajadora y se dedicada al comercio desde hace 15 años.
Amanda  está solicitando el préstamo para compra de azúcar, arroz, manteca, jabón, etc. esta solicitando el crédito para surtir su negocio para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes ya que en esta zona en donde el vive es muy adecuada para el comercio, su pulpería y su comedor están ubicados en un trayecto muy comercial sus clientes le prefieren por su valiosa atención.
Amanda espera que esta inversión le ayude a hacer crecer su negocio y a la vez le permita obtener los ingresos suficientes para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia, está muy contento por el  apoyo que le ha brindado Prisma, su sueño es que su negocio prospere mucho más. 


Trojes, Honduras - Noviembre del 2013.
texts.en:
Amanda is a small entrepreneur of 53. She lives in a village in Trojes, in the eastern part of Honduras. A very hard-working woman, she has had a shop for 15 years. She asks for a loan in order to buy merchandise to sell, namely sugar, rice, butter, soap, and other items. The loan will enable her to buy the products that are the most in demand among her customers. The area where she lives is very good for business, and both her grocery shop and her small restaurant are located in a very busy commercial area. She has many customers thanks to her excellent service. Amanda hopes this investment will help her make her business grow and generate enough income to meet her family's basic needs. She is very happy for the field partner's support and dreams of seing her shop become more and more prosperous.

Trojes, Honduras - November 2013

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell at her shop.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa de 41 años de edad,  es una persona muy trabajadora y lo ha demostrado ganándose el respeto de todas las personas que la conocen en el cantón. Actualmente, vive con sus 9 hijos y su esposo muy dignamente en una casa de bahareque. Todos aportan su fuerza de trabajo, ya que los hijos le ayudan a vender sus productos en todo el cantón.

Teresa se ha dedicado toda la vida, a vender bocadillos típicos, todos los domingos, como: tamales, yuca, papas fritas, pasteles entre otros. Hoy Teresa juntó  todos sus ahorros y quiere comenzar con la venta de productos como golosinas, bebidas jabones, etc. para así tener mejores ingresos y darle a sus hijos una mejor alimentación. 
Con el préstamo se estará ayudando al cliente, para que pueda surtir la tienda, ya que esta época navideña es muy buena para la venta de productos varios. 
Su sueño es tener un negocio muy fuerte y también quiere mejorar su condición de vida a través de la mejora de su vivienda suya.
texts.en:
Teresa is 41 years old. She is a very hard-working person who has gained the respect of all people who know her in the canton where she lives. She currently lives with her 9 children and her husband in a very dignified manner in a bahareque house [a house with wattle and daub construction]. All of them contribute their labor, since the children help her sell her products throughout the canton. 

Teresa has dedicated all of her life to selling traditional foods every Sunday, such as tamales, yuca, fried potatoes, and pastries, among others. Now Teresa has gathered all of her savings and would like to start selling products such as snacks, soft drinks, soaps, etc., in order to have a better income and give her children better nutrition. 
 
This client will be helped by the loan because she will be able to stock her shop, since this end-of-year season is very good for selling assorted products. 

Her dream is to have a very strong business, and she would also like to improve her living conditions by improving her house.

loans.use: to stock her shop.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is a 47-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. Her husband assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

Najma is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business. She has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. Najma is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Sorie Ibrahim's Group

texts.en:
The teachers shown in the photo work at a secondary school  in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. School teachers usually come to Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) to apply for loans. These loans empower them to meet certain financial needs that they could not meet with their salaries alone. 

Some of the teachers use these loans to pay school/college fees, either for themselves to pursue further studies or to pay for their children's school/college fees.  Some borrowers invest such loans in businesses while others buy pieces of furniture or a plot of land for future home construction. Other uses include buying home building materials. At the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan using their monthly salaries. It is their school's bursar who is directly responsible for making the deductions to repay the loan on their behalf.

Sorie is the featured leader of this group of school teachers. Born in Segbwema, in eastern Sierra Leone, the thirty-six-year-old is single with two children who attend primary school. Sorie has been a school teacher for ten years. He is pursuing further studies in college. He is going to use his share of this loan to pay for his college fees.

loans.use: to pay for his college fees.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 21-year-old married father of one child, who has worked in transporting drinking water to houses and shops for five months. 

He used to work in fixing car radiators but he preferred to switch to a daily-requested item which will provide him with a daily income, although he still fixes car radiators for his loyal customers. Abbass is now employed in a company where he transports water to offices and homes. 

Abbass is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order to start his own drinking water selling business, which will improve his living and increase his income.

Abbass is dreaming of establishing and developing his own business which will help him in improving his family's socioeconomic situation.

loans.use: To start his own drinking water selling business

loans.name: Khayrullo

texts.ru: Хайрулло порядочный человек. Ему 25 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его жена портниха. Хайрулло вместе со своей семьей живет счастливо. Он всегда старается для блага получения своей семьи. Он более 3 года занимается собственным бизнесом. Хайрулло производит конфеты. Он продает свою продукцию на местном рынке, где имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Хайрулло хочет развевать свой бизнес. Он планирует купить новое оборудование для производства конфет. Хайрулло запрашивает займ с такой целью. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США. Хайрулло ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Khayrullo is a respectable person. He is 25 years old. He is married and is raising three children. His wife is a dressmaker. Khayrullo and his family live happily together. He always strives for the wellbeing of his family.

For more than three years, he has been involved in his own business. Khayrullo produces candy. He sells his products at the local market, where he has his own loyal customers.

Khayrullo wants to develop his business. He plans to purchase new equipment for producing candy. Khayrullo is requesting a loan for this goal. He is requesting a loan of US$3,000.

loans.use: to buy equipment for producing candy

loans.name: Gulruhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор жизнерадостная женщина. Она ответственный родитель 3 детей. Гулрухсор имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Она более 13 лет работает в средней школе своего района учителем. Гулрухсор очень любит свою работу и гордится своей профессией. Она воспитал много учеников в период своей работы. Она имеет маленькую зарплату. Гулрухсор уже давно планирует отремонтировать свой дом. Она не имеет достаточно денег для покупки строительных материалов. Гулрухсор запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Gulruhsor is a cheerful woman. She is a responsible parent of three children. Gulruhsor has a higher pedagogical education. For more than 13 years, she has been working in a secondary school in her region as a teacher. Gulruhsor loves her work very much and is proud of her profession. She has educated many students in her career. She has a small salary.

For a long time, Gulruhsor has been planning to repair her home. She does not have enough money to buy construction materials. Gulruhsor is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase building materials like cement, wood, and the like.

loans.use: to buy cement, wood, and the like, for repairing her house

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло жизнерадостная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 несовершеннолетних детей. Шахло более 13 лет занимается бизнесом. Шахло продает женские одежды и обуви. Она торгует на местном рынке. Шахло имеет большой опыт по введению бизнеса. Она знает все тонкости своего бизнеса. Ее бизнес является кормильцем ее семьи. Она хочет обновить свой товар на новый сезон, но не имеет денег. Шахло запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки товара. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Shahlo is a cheerful woman. She is married and is raising two minor children. For more than 13 years, Shahlo has been engaged in business. Shahlo sells women's clothing and shoes. She trades at the local market. Shahlo has a lot of experience in running a business. She knows all the niceties of her business. Her business is the provider for her family.

She wants to update her inventory for the new season, but does not have money. Shahlo is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to purchase goods.

loans.use: to buy clothes for the new season

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is 37 years old. He lives with his wife and his five children in Gaza. Four of his children are in primary school.

Nidal has a shop for selling chicken and he earns a monthly income of USD 701. He started his business in 2011. He buys the chickens from a poultry farm near his shop. His business still needs a lot of improvement, so he plans on hiring one employee to help him, but he needs to make changes in his business, beforehand. 

So, he applied for this loan to buy a water tank and new chicken-plucking machine, which will help him to improve his financial condition, will lead to supporting the needs of his family, and will help him reinvest in his business.

Nidal's dream is to educate his children and to give them the best in life. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business, through this loan.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and new chicken-plucking machine.

loans.name: Yuly

texts.es:
Ella es yuly, esta estudiando auxiliar de enfermería y  pasa a tercer semestre, esta estudiando, ya que es el primer paso para seguir con su carrera profesional, quiere estudiar medicina, pero para ello debe empezar por estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, con este conocimiento ella sabe que ayudara mucho a la familia, ya que el papa y la mama tiene enfermedades que incluyen ayuda medica, a demás  de que toda la vida le ha gustado la enfermería, ayudar a las personas y no solo a las personas que puedan pagar esa ayuda, si no ayudar a las personas que mas lo necesitan, siente que por eso vino a este mundo, para que los demás estén bien no solo físicamente si no también emocionalmente.
Estudia a qui porque fue la opción mas económica que encontró, porque para ella también es importante la economía de la casa, también esta haciendo todo lo posible para poder obtener un contrato de aprendizaje  a si ayudara en el estudio y no pedirle tanto a los papas, cualquier ayuda es importante para ella, ya que quiere terminar el semestre y siendo la mejor. Ella le agradecería mucho a las personas que le ayudaran a terminar este estudio, le gustaría especializarse en pediatría ya que le encantan los niños, ellos son los que mas necesitan ayuda y para ello debe esforzarse mucho, le gustaría la colaboración para no solo ayudarse ella misma si no la economía de sus papas.
texts.en:
This is Yuly. She is studying to be a nursing assistant and is entering the third semester.  This is the first step in her professional career.  She wants to study medicine but she must begin by studying to be a nursing assistant first.  She knows that with this knowledge she will be helping her family a lot as her father and her mother have illnesses that require medical attention.  Besides which, she has been interested in nursing all her life.  She wants to be able to help people - not only the ones who can pay for care, but also to help those who need it most.  She feels that this is what she was meant to do - to help others to be physically and emotionally healthy. 

She is studying at this institution because it was the most economical option she was able to find, as her family's finances are important to her. She is also doing whatever she can to secure an internship which will help with her studies and make her less dependent on her parents. Any help she can get is important to her because she wants to finish the semester and be the best student. She would be most grateful to the people who help her finish this program.  She would like to specialize in pediatrics because she loves children and they are the ones who need the most help. She will work hard to accomplish this goal.  She is asking for this loan not only for herself but also to help her parents' finances.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David, age 34, is from the capital city of Georgia. He is single and lives with his mother, brother and sister-in-law. 
David’s mother works as a baker at the local bakery and gets small monthly salary. In order to generate additional income, David plans to purchase a van and start a food distribution business. Specifically, he will buy rolls, pies, and other food products from the bakery at wholesale prices and then distribute these products to local groceries. He needs financial support for implementing his plan. The loan amount will be added to David’s savings and he will be able to purchase a used van. After the van is purchased, David will run his own business and make a profit to contribute to his family's well being. He hopes for your support and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a van for his food distribution business.

loans.name: Allieu's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from the eastern city of Kenema. They have come to SMT to apply for a loan of 6,000,000 SLL for the entire group in order to meet their most immediate and pressing financial needs. At the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan, using their salaries. It is their school's bursar who is directly responsible for making the deductions and repaying the loan on their behalf.

Alieu is the featured leader of this group of teachers. The thirty-seven-year-old man is married to a trader and the couple has two children attending primary and secondary school. The native of Mendekelema has been a school teacher for nine years. He has requested this loan in order to invest it in a business. He will use it to buy palm-oil (the country's most popular cooking oil) to sell. In this way, Alieu will make extra money to supplement his monthly salary.

loans.use: to buy palm-oil to sell

loans.name: Rosa Nerida

texts.es: Rosa de 45 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 11 y 16 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de engorde desde hace 12 años. Rosa desea mejorar las condiciones de un curto dormitorio de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y para pagar la mano de obra. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar dar inicio a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa is 45 years old. She lives in her own house along with her life companion and two children aged 11 and 16. Rosa has been raising and selling chickens for 12 years.

Rosa wants to improve the condition of a bedroom in her house so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She will buy wood, laminated sheeting, cement, sand and pay for labor. She hopes to be able to count on this loan and be able to start the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy wood, laminated sheeting, cement, sand and to pay for labor to repair a bedroom.

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд представляет собой умного и начитанного молодого человека. Махмуд родился в 1978 году. Махмуд женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Махмуд уже более 3 лет работает в телевидение и радио Таджикистана. Он умный и креативный человек.  Махмуд ежемесячно получает зарплату и использует свою полученную зарплату на обеспечение семьи. Махмуд хочет отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Он кредитуется повторно и имеет хорошее кредитное досье.
texts.en:
Mahmud is a clever and well-read young man. Mahmud was born in 1978. Mahmud is married and is raising three children. For three years, Mahmud has been working in television and radio in Tajikistan. He is an intelligent and creative person. Mahmud monthly receives a salary and uses his earned income to support his family.

Mahmud wants to repair his home, but does not have money. He is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to purchase building materials. He is a repeat borrower and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing a house

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 27-year-old married man, who has thirteen years of experience in the construction business. He is specialized in decoration work that has to do with gypsum board.

Abbass is working hard on developing his business and increasing his income. He is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to pay for necessary business needs that will improve his business quality and develop his living.

Today he has two employees who help him in doing his requested projects and he is working hard on establishing his wide multi task construction company which is his dream come true.

loans.use: to develop his construction business

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 23-year-old single man, who has had an entertainment center since July 2012. He is the sole breadwinner for four members of his family.

He is applying for a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to develop his business through buying a wide screen TV, receiver and surround sound system that will develop his business and spread a joyful spirit in his center.

Husein is working hard to keep on developing his entertainment center, and he is willing to increase the TVs and PSP to attract more customers.

His main aim is to keep supporting his family members, especially after his previous loan helped him buy his mother's medication.

loans.use: To develop his business through buying a wide screen TV, receiver and surround sound system

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1972 году. Зулфия занимается шитьем женской национальной одежды. Зулфия предоставляет свои услуги дома. Благодаря хорошему сервису она имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Зулфия этим бизнесом занимается уже более 7 лет. Зулфия является основной кормилицей 3 детей, так как зарплата ее мужа маленькая. Ее муж работает в киностудии. Зулфия хочет купить мебель для своего домохозяйства, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки мебели. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zulfiya is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1972. Zulfiya is engaged in sewing women's national clothing. Zulfiya offers her services from home. Thanks to her good service, she has her won loyal customers. Zulfiya has been engaged in this business for more than seven years. Zulfiya is the main breadwinner for three children, since her husband's salary is small. Her husband works in a film studio.

Zulfiya wants to buy furniture for her household, but she does not have money. She is requesting a loan of 2,500 somoni to purchase furniture.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her household

loans.name: Sheraly

texts.ru: Шерали молодой и энергичный молодой человек. Он родился в 1991 году. Шерали не женат и живет с родителями. Он 4 года назад начала свой бизнес предоставлением услуги такси. Шерали предоставляет услуги такси по городу. После того, как он начал свой бизнес предоставлением услуги такси, уровень проживания в семье улучшилось. Шерали хочет купить новую машину и таким образом привлечь больше клиентов. Шерали запрашивает займ на сумму 7000 сомони для покупки автомашины. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sheraly is an energetic young man. He was born in 1991. Sheraly is not married and lives with his parents. Four years ago, he started his own business offering taxi services. Sheraly offers taxi services around the city. After he began his taxi service business, the standard of living of his family improved.

Sheraly wants to buy a new car and in this way to attract more customers. Sheraly is requesting a loan of 7,000 somoni to purchase an automobile.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Feeling

texts.en:
Feeling is a 27-year-old single woman living in Caldwell. She completed an 11th grade education.  She has a 7 year old child who lives with her. 

A year ago, Feeling started a business to sell soft drinks.  She enjoys bing self employed and requests a loan to purchase more soft drinks for her business. 

She plans to build a house for her child in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Elene

texts.en:
Elene is 50 years old and from the village of Vachnadziani. She is divorced and lives with her retired mother and daughter who is a school-leaver. The family lives under the poverty line, without a source of income and receive small-scale social assistance from the local government. 

Like the majority of middle-aged Georgian women, Elene stays at home and takes care of her family. She is an excellent mother and housewife and has tried to give her daughter all the best. 

Elene is sad that she is not able to generate income for the family. That is why she has decided to start her own business and go to Turkey to purchase clothing and linens for resale. She will sell the items from her house among her community members. The increased profit will be reinvested in the same business, and Elene will be able to continue the business. Elene believes in your kindness.

loans.use: to start trading in clothing and linens

loans.name: Zaid

texts.en:
Zaid is a 29-year-old married man from Taiz. He lives with his wife and three children in a very simple house in the city. He drives a water tanker and works hard to offer good services to his clients.  Zaid`s tanker is not working and he would like to buy spare parts to be able to earn money to meet his family`s expenses. 

He requests a  loan from AMB to help him to buy spare parts for his business truck. By taking this loan, he will be able to provide water for his clients around  the area. He hopes to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his water tanker truck.

loans.name: Maima

texts.en:
Maima is 43 years old and lives in Caldwell. She is married and her husband is a teacher; they has 5 children. 

For the past 10 years, she has been selling lots of vegetable seeds but sometimes she does not make much profit because she buys the seeds at a higher price. s

She is requesting a loan to purchase seeds to resell. In the ,she hope to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase seeds to resell

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is 39 years old and lives in Caldwell. She is married and her husband is a security man. They have 2 children, aged 2 and 13, who are attending school and live at home. 

Marie has been selling cold water and soft drinks in her community from a small shop for the past 4 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cold water and soft drinks for her business. She plans to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more cold water and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Yaseen

texts.en:
Yaseen is 23 years old. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is a friendly, hardworking, and honorable person. All his life he has worked hard and earned money to assist his family. He is a kind man who works as an employee in the public sector, earning a low monthly income. 

He has been spending his savings income on household expenses and the amount he has is not enough to buy what he needs to complete the home improvements for his house. 

He is requesting a loan from AMB to buy a fridge for his house. This is of great importance to his family as they will be able to live in better conditions. 

He is grateful to the people who help with credit and who always think of poor people and give them opportunities to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy fridge for his house.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria a 30-year-old married woman who lives in the Caldwell. She has 4 children aged from 3 to 20. They attend school and live at home.

She runs a table where she sells soft drinks in her community market, she makes a good profit and has many customers.

Victoria is requesting a loan to buy more soft drinks to resell. She hopes to increase her business and open a shop.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks to resell.

loans.name: Ebenezer's Group

texts.en:
These four members are part of a group called 'Ebenezer' who all live in the same neighborhood and work together whenever the need arises. 

Mary O. is their representative and can be seen in the photo standing second from left. Mary O. is a married mother with four children, and has more than nine years experience in selling jewels and underwear. She is responsible for her family which consists of her children and her husband. Mary O. will use her loan share of GHS 1,700 to buy more jewels and sell to her customers. She starts her working day at 8am and finishes at 5pm. 

In the future, she would like to use further loans from this field partner to grow her business and increase her earnings. In this way, she will be able to improve the living conditions of her immediate family. 

This group would need a total amount of GHS 6,200 to buy more jewels, underwear, slippers and clothing.

loans.use: To buy more jewels to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Helena is 43 years old and lives in Caldwell with her husband and six children, who are in school and are aged from 8 months to 19 years old. 

Over the past ten years, Helena has been selling sugar, rice, oil, etc in the local market, spending 9 hours on her business each day, from Monday to Saturday.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more sugar, rice, oil, etc. for her business. She hopes to build a new home for her children in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, rice, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: God Is King Group

texts.en:
These members are part of the group called, God is King Group and it is composed of three females who are friends, living in the same community. This is the eleventh time this group has requested financial aid from ID Ghana to boost their businesses. 

Linda is 33 years old. She is married to Victor, a 35-year-old spare parts dealer.They have two children. Linda has had education to the secondary school level and she is the leader of her group. Together with her husband, she ensures that the household expenses are covered. 

To meet the needs of her family, she has been selling wax print for about three years. Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her income, Linda, together with the other members of the group, is requesting an eleventh loan. The previous loans were indeed repaid without any default. The entire group needs GHS 3,700 to buy more goods to satisfy their respective customers.

loans.use: To buy wax print to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María de 29 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo, papá, mamá y tres hermanos. María es muy trabajadora ya que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para mantener a su hijo y ayudar a su familia. María trabaja como empleada doméstica y en sus tiempo libres hace comales de forma artesanal los cuales pone a la venta. Así, se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina y vara de castilla.
texts.en:
María is 29 years old. She is a single mother and lives in her own home with her son her mother and father and three siblings. María is very hard-working and does everything possible to take care of her child and help her family.

María works as a domestic employee and in her spare time she makes home-made comales (local traditional food) to sell. This is how she makes her living and makes money for the household.

She wants to repair the roof of her house as it has deteriorated. So she has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of wood, laminated sheeting and vara de castilla (local cane/bamboo)..

loans.use: to buy wood, laminated sheeting, and vara de castilla (a local bamboo/cane) to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es: Rosa de 54 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia conformada por su esposo, mamá y sus tres hijos de 21 años, 18 años y 28 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la venta de carne de pollo en el mercado central de su localidad. Desea construir un pequeño cuarto en su terreno para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar ladrillo, arena, cemento, lámina, etc. Confía que con lo que gana en su negocio podrá pagar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Rosa is 54 years old. She lives in very modest conditions along with her family. It is composed of her husband, her mother and her three children aged 18, 21 and 28. Rosa sells chicken meat at the local central market. She wants to build a small room on her land. So she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy brick, sand, cement, laminated sheeting etc. She is confident that she can pay the installments of her loan with the income from her business.

loans.use: to buy brick, sand, cement and laminated sheeting to build a room.

loans.name: Toshbibi

texts.ru: Тошбиби 43 года. Она живет с мужем и детьми в районе Дж.Руми. Тошбиби способная и умелая. Она знает профессию швеи и хочет открыть в этой сфере собственное дело. Чтобы начать швейное дело Тошбиби не хватает немного средств. Данную сумму она просит в кредит. Тошбиби собирается купить новую швейную машинку и начать брать заказы у знакомых и родственников. Она будет заниматься данным делом у себя дома.
texts.en:
Toshbibi is 43 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the J.Rumy region. Toshbibi is capable and skilled. She knows the sewing profession and wants to open her own business in this sphere.

In order to start her sewing business, Toshbibi lacks a bit of money. This amount she is requesting as a loan. Toshbibi intends to buy a new sewing machine and to start taking orders from acquaintances and relatives. She will engage in this work from her home.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Saidaly

texts.ru: Саидали уже более 5 лет занимается бизнесом. Он занимается купле продажей тканей на местном рынке. Он имеет свою торговую точку на местном рынке. Саидали каждый сезон обновляет ассортимент своего товара. Он хочет обновить ассортимент своего товара, но не имеет денег. Саидали планирует от полученного дохода улучшить условию проживания для своей семьи. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Саидали запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для тканей. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
