This will allow her to increase the portfolio of products she offers and meet the tastes and needs of her customers. She hopes to improve her sales and income.

Yesenia’s goal is to establish a good reputation for her business, so in the future she will be able to open another location. She hopes this will make her business more profitable and will improve her family’s living conditions and welfare.

loans.use: to buy stock at wholesale prices, such as bedroom sets, living room furniture, dining room furniture and night tables.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio es un hombre emprendedor y dinámico, a sus 28 años de edad, trabaja como empleado en una empresa pero, con el ánimo de complementar los ingresos familiares tomó la iniciativa de montar su propio negocio; una charcutería y licorera en la que ofrecerá mecato, dulces, cervezas, gaseosas y licor al por mayor y al detal; la idea surgió de la crisis económica por la que está pasando su familia, ya que su esposa se encuentra desempleada y con el salario que él gana no alcanza a solventar los gastos básicos del hogar. Para su negocio ya tomó un local en arriendo que se presta para la atención de este tipo de negocio, pues tiene reja de seguridad, ya que el horario de trabajo comenzará en la tarde y hasta la madrugada; así podrá aprovechar el apoyo que le brindará su esposa para administrarlo. Esto lo lleva  a solicitar el crédito con el fin de comprar activos fijos (enfriador, estanterías, minicomponente, entre otros) y surtido al por mayor (cervezas, mecato, licores nacionales, dulces nacionales e importados, entre otros), así pondrá en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar buenos resultados para cumplir el sueño de independizarse totalmente y dedicarse de lleno a su negocio; acreditarlo poco a poco y lograr reconocimiento en el sector; así tendrá la posibilidad de disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida y pasar más tiempo en compañía de su familia.
texts.en:
Mauricio is an enterprising and dynamic young man. At his 28 years of age, he is employed working for a company but, in hopes of supplementing his family's income, he has decided to start his own business, a store where he will sell snacks, sweets, beer, sodas, and wholesale and retail liquor. His idea stems from the financial crisis his family is going through, since his wife is unemployed and the salary he earns is not enough to cover their basic household expenses.

He has already leased a commercial space for his business. The space will be good for the type of business he has in mind because it has a security door with bars and his schedule will be from the afternoons until early mornings. He will also be able to make the most of his wife's help in running the business.

For this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to purchase fixed assets (cooler, shelves, sound system, and other items) and wholesale stock (beer, snacks, domestic liquor, domestic and imported sweets, and other items). This will allow him to start up his business venture, which he expects will generate good results so that he can achieve his dream of becomeing completely independent and working solely on his business. He wants to build on it little by little so that it becomes well-known in the area. This will give him the chance to enjoy a better quality of life and spend more time in the company of his family.

loans.use: to buy a cooler, shelves, a sound system, wholesale stock, and other items.

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer activa y carismática de 48 años de edad, madre de un hijo al que ha sacado adelante con mucha paciencia y esfuerzo, y convive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental. Se gana la vida atendiendo su propia tienda de abarrotes que lleva un año de funcionamiento, allí ofrece gaseosas, café, mecato, lácteos, galletería y otros productos de la canasta familiar. La idea surgió de la necesidad de generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
Como todo ser humano, Luz también tiene aspiraciones y sueños, el principal es poder acreditar y posicionar su negocio en el sector, para que éste sea rentable y tenga permanencia en el tiempo, garantizándole una estabilidad económica favorable que le permita brindar mejor calidad de vida a su grupo familiar, pero para lograrlo, solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que comenzará a fortalecer el inventario con pastas, granos, galletería, mecatos, carnes frías, gaseosas, entre otros; así estará en la capacidad de satisfacer la demanda actual y los gustos de sus clientes; logrando un aumento notable en las ventas y en los ingresos que percibe por el desarrollo de su actividad económica.
texts.en:
Luz, 48, is an energetic and charismatic woman. She has raised a son with patience and hard work and lives in a common-law marriage. She earns a living with her grocery store, which she has had for a year now. She sells beverages, coffee, snacks, dairy products, bakery products and other staple products. She started this business when she realized the need to generate an income to help her husband with the home expenses.

As any other human being, Luz also has aspirations and dreams. Her biggest dream is to be able to become well-known locally and have a profitable and sustainable business which can guarantee her financial stability. This way, she will be able to improve her family’s quality of life. She needs however help for this, so she is requesting a loan to stock her store with pasta, grains, bakery products, snacks, cold cuts, beverages, etc. This will help her to fulfill her customers’ demands and increase her sales.

loans.use: to stock her store with pasta, grains, bakery products, snacks, cold cuts and beverages, among other things.

loans.name: Herbin Alfredo

texts.es:
Herbin se ha caraterizado por ser un hombre activo y trabajador, su amabilidad y actitud positiva le han permitido lograr los objetivos que se propone. A sus 30 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio, una salsamentaría que inició con el ánimo de generar mejores ingresos para su familia; el oficio lo aprendió cuando se desempeñaba como empleado en diferentes negocios similares. El establecimiento cuenta con la ventaja de estar muy bien ubicado en una calle  transitada por gran cantidad de personas a todas las horas del día, cerca al parque principal del municipio donde reside; trabaja solo todos los días excepto los miércoles día tradicional de descanso de los comerciantes del municipio.
El crédito que solicita es para invertir en el negocio, con el dinero comprará surtido al por mayor (café, cervezas, gaseosas, mecato, dulces, galletería, entre otros), esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas, pues tendrá más variedad de artículos para ofrecer y satisfacer los gustos de su clientela; dando como resultado un incremento notable en sus ingresos.
Herbin manifiesta que su propósito para un futuro a mediano plazo es ahorrar el dinero suficiente para comprar un local propio en el que pueda seguir desarrollando su actividad generadora de recursos, pues así se ahorraría el dinero del arriendo y podría brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa.
texts.en:
Herbin has always been an active and hardworking man. His kindness and positive attitude have allowed him to meet the goals he sets for himself. At his thirty years of age, he works running his own business, a cafe he opened in order to generate better income for his family. He learned the trade from working at similar establishments. The business he owns has the advantage of being located on a street that has lots of customer traffic at all hours of the day, near the main park in the town where he lives. He works alone every day except on Wednesdays, which is the tradictional day off for local retailers.

The loan he is requesting is to invest in his business. He will use the money to buy wholesale stock (coffee, beer, sodas, snacks, cookies, and other itmes). This will help him increase sales because he will have a wider variety of items to offer and meet his customers needs. This will result in a considerable increase in his income.

Herbin says his medium-term goal for the future is to save up enough money to buy his own commercial space where he can continue to run his business, because that way he could save on rent and would be able to offer his wife a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coffee, beer, sodas, snacks, sweets, cookies, and other items.

loans.name: Edgar De Jesús

texts.es:
Edgar, con 51 años de edad, luego de quedarse sin empleo por la terminación del contrato en la empresa donde trabajaba y, viéndose con necesidades económicas, decidió montar su propio negocio, una pequeña chaza ambulante donde vende mecato, minutos a celular, dulces, alimentos fritos, cigarrillos y otros productos, esta idea surgió con el ánimo de generar ingresos por cuenta propia, ya que se le dificultaba conseguir oportunidades de empleo por su edad, trabaja solo todos los días de 7 am a 7 pm, así logra generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar económicamente a su hijo y sustentar sus gastos personales.
El crédito lo desea invertir en la compra de mercancía (mecato, galletería, dulces, cigarrillos, chicles, entre otros), esto le permitirá aumentar la variedad de productos para satisfacer los diversos gustos de sus compradores y mejorar las ventas; así podrá seguir luchando para llegar a cumplir su mayor anhelo que es montar su negocio en un local comercial, para evitar los riesgos a los que se ve expuesto como trabajador de la calle; esto le daría la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos y dar a su hijo un mejor bienestar, para que goce de buena salud y prosperidad.
texts.en:
Edgar, who is 51 years old, decided to start his own business when he became unemployed after his contract with the company he used to work for ran out. Finding himself in financial need, he set up a small street stand where he sells snacks, cell phone cards, sweets, fried foods, cigarettes, and other products. His idea stemmed from his hopes of generating income on his own, because it was hard for him to find a job at his age. He works by himself every day from 7:00 am to 7:00 pm, and this allows him to generate enough resources to financially support his son and cover his personal expenses.

He wants to invest this loan in purchasing merchandise (snacks, cookies, sweets, cigarettes, chewing gum, and other items). This will allow him to increase the variety of products he has to meet his customers' different preferences and improve sales. This way he will be able to keep fighting for his greatest dream, which is to set up his business in a proper commercial space in order to avoid the risks he is exposed to by working on the street. This would give him a chance to improve his income and give his son more wellbeing, so that he can have good health and prosperity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (snacks, cookies, sweets, cigarettes, chewing gum, and other items).

loans.name: Josman Wesner

texts.es:
Josman es un hombre activo y emprendedor que descubrió su talento en el campo de la barbería, por lo cual decidió iniciar su propio negocio con la ayuda económica de algunos familiares; trabaja solo todos los días con el apoyo de un empleado directo, su barbería es reconocida en el sector por el buen servicio y la agilidad con la que atienden su clientela, poco a poco ha logrado mejorar su establecimiento y además ha perfeccionado su técnica; así es como se gana la vida día tras día.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para que pueda realizar mejoras locativas (pintar el local) y restaurar las sillas de barbería y los muebles de la sala de espera que ya muestran señales de deterioro; esto le permitirá dar una mejor imagen a su negocio y atraerá nuevos clientes, además estará en la capacidad de fidelizar a los que ya posee; mejorando así los ingresos que su actividad le genera.
Josman tiene como propósito, fortalecer su negocio para mantenerse en el mercado y lograr una estabilidad económica que le permita solventar sus gastos personales y familiares y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Josman is an active and enterprising man who discovered his talent as a barber and decided to start a business with financial help from some relatives. He works every day with the help of one direct employee. His barber shop is well known in the area for the good services he provides and for how quickly they serve their customers. Little by little he has managed to improve his establishment and also perfected his technique, and that is how he makes his daily living.

The loan he is requesting is to help him improve his business space. He will paint the walls and repair the barber chairs and the furniture in the waiting room, which is starting to show wear. This will allow him to give his business a better image and attract new customers. He will also be in a position to ensure the loyalty of his current customers, and improve the income his business generates for him.

Josman's goals are to strengthen his business so that it can stay in the market, and to achieve the financial stability that will allow him to cover his personal expenses as well as his family's, and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to repaint the walls of his shop and repair the chairs and furniture.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: La señora Victoria tiene 55 años de edad, vive en la provincia Carrasco, tiene 3 hijos y hasta ahora no sabe el paradero de su esposo desde que la abandono. Vivía en el departamento de Potosí pero tuvo que cambiar de residencia porque allá no tuvo ingresos suficientes  para mantener a sus hijos, después de mucho tiempo logro progresar junto a ellos, ahora tiene dos lotes agrícola y un lote urbano en Chimore donde trabaja como agricultora  y además tiene una tienda de barrio, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de productos e insumos para su tienda de abarrotes, de esa manera podrá tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Victoria is 55 years old and lives in Carrasco.  She has three children and lives in the Carrasco province.  She has three children and doesn’t know about her husband since he left her.  She lived in the Potosi department, but she had to move because she didn’t have enough money to support her children.  After some time she was able to make progress with them.  Now she has a two plots of land and an urban plot in Chimore where she works as a farmer.  She also has a neighborhood store.  She is asking for this loan to buy products and supplies for her store.  In this way she can increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies and stock her store.

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es:
José es un hombre carismático y amable de 55 años de edad, casado y padre ejemplar de dos hijos, a los que ha sacado adelante con gran sacrificio y paciencia.
Anteriormente tenía una legumbrería ubicada en un local arrendado, pero por cuestiones externas, le solicitaron entregar el local y tuvo que dejar por poco tiempo su labor; luego decidió continuar su actividad de comerciante independiente, vendiendo frutas de manera ambulante; trabaja solo todos los días de 8 am a 6 pm y así ha logrado generar los ingresos para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
Actualmente se encuentra solicitando el crédito con el ánimo de comprar surtido al por mayor (frutas en cosecha), esto le permitirá darle continuidad a su actividad y mejorar la variedad de productos para satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, mejorando las ventas e ingresos.
José, como todo ser humano, también tiene sueños que desea hacer realidad, uno de ellos es, montar su negocio nuevamente en un local, para que le permita generar mayor nivel de rentabilidad e ingresos y no estar expuesto a tantos peligros a los que se enfrenta trabajando de manera ambulante. Así podrá dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
José is charismatic and kind. He is 55 years old, married, and a model father of two children, for whom he has provided with great sacrifice and patience.

Previously he had a fruit and vegetable store in a rented location, but for reasons unrelated to his business, he was asked to give up the location and he had to stop his business for a little while. He decided to continue his business by selling fruit from place to place. He works by himself every day from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., earning income to meet his family’s daily needs.

José is requesting this loan to buy stock at wholesale prices, such as fruits that are in season. This will allow him to continue his business and improve the variety of products he sells to meet his customers’ tastes. He hopes to improve his sales and income.

José, like all human beings, has dreams that he would like to make reality. One of these is to restart his business in a new location, which would allow him to achieve a higher level of profitability and income, as well as to avoid the dangers that he confronts when selling from place to place. He hopes to improve his family’s quality of life and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy stock at wholesale prices, such as fruits that are in season.

loans.name: Aicardo De Jesús

texts.es:
Aicardo es un campesino trabajador y humilde, con 60 años de edad, sigue trabajando para solventar los gastos básicos de su familia, conformada por su esposa y sus 5 hijos. Durante 30 años se ha dedicado a la cría y comercialización de cerdos y ganado de levante, actividad que aprendió por herencia familiar y que le ha permitido generar recursos para salir adelante.
Actualmente solicita su noveno ciclo de crédito con el que desea comprar concentrado para alimentar a sus animales y lograr tener una mejor producción que le permita generar mayor nivel de rentabilidad a la hora de vender.
Aicardo manifiesta que su avanzada edad no es impedimento para seguir realizando la labor que lo apasiona y que le ha dado de comer durante toda su vida, por ello sigue luchando incansablemente para lograr incrementar su ganado porcino y de levante y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y ofrecer a sus hijos menores la oportunidad de tener una educación de excelente calidad para que sean unos profesionales íntegros y exitosos.
texts.en:
Aicardo is a humble and hardworking peasant. At the age of sixty, he keeps working in order to cover his family's basic expenses. He has a wife and five children. He has been working raising and selling pigs and cattle for thirty years. He learned this business from his family, and this allowed him to generate enough resources to make a living.

He is currently requesting his ninth loan cycle, which he wishes to use to buy concentrated feed for his animals, so that his production increases and allows him to generate more profit when it comes time to sell.

Aicardo says his old age is not an obstacle for him to keep doing the work he loves and that has provided for him his whole life. That is why he keeps working tirelessly to increase his number of pigs and cattle, so that he can improve his family's quality of life and offer his younger children the opportunity of getting an excellent quality education and becoming upstanding and successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for his animals.

loans.name: Gladys Elena

texts.es:
Gladys es madre soltera de 5 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo y dedicación.
A sus 47 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar en el oficio de la confección a terceros; su pasión por esta labor comenzó desde pequeña al lado de su abuela quien le enseñó las técnicas; cuando creció comenzó a trabajar en diferentes talleres ubicados al sur de la ciudad, allí se capacitó en alta costura y se especializó en corte, confección, diseño y escalado. Ya con toda su experiencia y sus conocimientos, hace un año decidió independizarse y montó su propio taller en un espacio que adecuó en su vivienda; allí presta el servicio a terceros y cuando tiene tiempo y capital de trabajo, saca algunas prendas de línea propia.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, elásticos, encajes, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener disponibilidad de material para sacar producción de leggins y blusas estampadas que se están utilizando mucho por estos tiempos, lo que le permitirá generar más ventas e ingresos para seguir capitalizando su negocio y velar por el bienestar familiar.
Gladys tiene como propósito a mediano plazo, ampliar y fortalecer su negocio a tal punto que pueda generar empleo y que sean sus hijos quienes tomen las riendas de esta microempresa, pues ya los mayores tienen nociones en el tema de la confección y se sienten atraídos por la actividad; esto le ayudará a garantizar una estabilidad económica para mejorar la casa donde reside que se encuentra deteriorada; dando paso para disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys is a single mother of 5 children, whom she has raised with great effort and dedication.

At 47 years old, she works making clothing for third parties. Her passion for this work began when she was very young, with her grandmother, who taught her the techniques. When she grew up she began working in different workshops that were located south of the city, where she was trained in haute couture, and specialized in cutting, dressmaking, design, and scale. 

A year ago, already having all her experience and knowledge, she decided to become independent, and she opened her own workshop in a space that she outfitted within her home.  There, she provides service to third parties, and when she has time and working capital, she makes garments from her own line of clothing.

The loan she is seeking is for the purchase of wholesale supplies (fabrics, thread, elastic, lace, and such), which will allow her to have the materials available for producing leggings and patterned blouses, that are very much in use currently.  This way, she can generate more sales and income to continue financing her business and look after the well-being of her family.
 
Gladys has a medium term goal, which is to expand and strengthen her business to the point that it can generate employment, and that it will be her children who would take the reins of this micro-business, since the older ones have some knowledge of dressmaking and feel attracted by the occupation. 

This will help her to guarantee the financial stability to improve the house where she lives, which is deteriorated, making it possible to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase supplies wholesale (fabrics, thread, elastic, lace, and such).

loans.name: Jaime Luis

texts.es:
Jaime es un joven campesino, dedicado a la cría y comercialización de cerdos, además posee diferentes cultivos que le han generado ingresos adicionales y, de manera alterna trabaja como empleado en una tienda de abarrotes, así se gana la vida, para solventar los gastos básicos suyos y de su esposa.
Las labores del campo las aprendió de su padre, quien toda la vida se dedicó a trabajar la tierra y a criar animales. Hoy en día, a sus 25 años de edad, es reconocido por la calidad de los productos que ofrece en el mercado del municipio.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de más lechones y concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le permitirá aumentar su producción y mejorar las ventas e ingresos que percibe por su labor.
Jaime tiene como propósito darle continuidad a su actividad generadora de recursos, pues planea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y garantizar una estabilidad económica que le permita tomar la decisión para tener hijos en un futuro a mediano plazo.
texts.en:
Jaime is a young farmer. He raises and sells pigs for a living. Additionally he has different crops which have generated him additional income. He also works as an employee in a grocery store and earns a living to meet his basic expenses and those of his wife.
He learned farm work from his father who all his life worked the land and raised animals. Today, at 25 years old, he is known for the quality of the products that he offers in the town market.
The requested loan will be invested in the purchase of more piglets and concentrate to feed to the animals. This will allow him to increase his production and improve his sales and income that he receives for his labor.
Jamie has a goal to give continuity to his income generating job, as plans to improve his living conditions to guarantee an economic stability that will allow him to take the decision to have children in the medium term.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and concentrate to feed the animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs wholesale

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada a su familia, madre de dos hijos de 10 y 2 años de edad y cabeza de hogar desde que se separó de su esposo quedando con toda la carga económica de su familia.
Lleva 3 años dedicada a vender productos por catálogo y mercancía por encargo como lociones y ropa; trabaja todos los días ofreciendo productos, entregando pedidos y cobrando la cartera de sus clientes, cuenta con la ventaja de manejar su propio tiempo y además logra generar ingresos sin descuidar sus hijos.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de promociones de mercancía como perfumería, ropa interior, accesorios, cosméticos y otros productos, lo que le dará la posibilidad de vender más productos, pues tendrá disponible un inventario más variado para satisfacer los gustos y requerimientos de clientela, aumentando el nivel de ingresos para solventar los gastos básicos familiares.
Diana tiene como propósito fortalecer su negocio y aumentar su clientela para que esta actividad generadora de ingresos sea mucho más rentable y le permita brindar a sus hijos una mejor educación y condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Diana is an enterprising woman and dedicated to her family. She is the mother of two children, 10 and 2, and head of the household since she separated with her husband, which left her with all the economic burden of the family.

For three years she has sold products through a catalog and custom merchandise like lotions and clothes. She works everyday offering her products, delivering orders and charging customers' accounts, which has the advantage of managing her own time and also generating income without neglecting her children. 

The requested loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise promotions like perfume, underwear, accessories, cosmetics, and other products. It will give her the possibility of selling more products and she will have a much more varied inventory in order to satisfy the tastes and requirements of her clientele. This will increase her level of income in order to meet basic family expenses.

Diana's aim is to strengthen her business and increase her customer base so that this income generating job can be much more profitable and allow her to provide her children a better education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of merchandise like perfume, underwear, accessories, cosmetics and other products.

loans.name: Ligia

texts.es:
Ligia es una mujer pujante y carismática, a sus 65 años de edad, trabaja para solventar las necesidades básicas del hogar, en el que convive con su esposo.
Durante toda su vida fue ama de casa, pues era su esposo quien llevaba la carga económica del hogar, pero debido a que quedó desempleado por su avanzada edad, un cuñado le hizo un obsequio de 3 millones de pesos, con los que inició su propio negocio, una miscelánea en la que vende diversos productos como accesorios, artículos de papelería, cosméticos, entre otros, trabaja con su esposo todos los días de 7 am a 8 pm; adicionalmente ha realizado cursos de artesanías y aprovecha el espacio de su negocio para vender algunas que ella misma elabora; así es como logra generar ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades familiares.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar una fotocopiadora e insumos al por mayor (resmas de papel y tóner de tintas), esto le permitirá complementar los servicios que presta en su negocio y además recibirá un ingreso adicional que sirve para seguir capitalizando el establecimiento.
Ligia manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir luchando para cumplir sus objetivos, por ello siempre está en constante búsqueda de alternativas que le permitan salir adelante y cumplir el sueño de ampliar su negocio y en un futuro cercano adquirir un local propio para continuar su actividad, mejorando la rentabilidad y generando mejores ingresos para tener la oportunidad de disfrutar una vejez más tranquila, sin preocupaciones monetarias y al lado de su ser amado que la ha acompañado por tantos años de matrimonio.
texts.en:
Ligia is a vigorous and charismatic woman. At the age of 65, she works to pay for the basic needs of her household, which she shares with her husband.

She was a housewife for her entire life, since it was her husband who bore the economic responsibility for the household, but due to the fact that he was left unemployed because of his advanced age, a brother-in-law made her a gift of 3 million pesos, with which she began her own business, a corner store in which she sells various products such as accessories, stationery items, and cosmetics, among other items. She works with her husband every day from 7 am to 8 pm. In addition, she has completed courses in handicrafts, and she takes advantage of the space in her business to sell some of the things that she herself has made. This is how she manages to generate income to satisfy the family needs.

The loan that she is applying for is to buy a photocopier and supplies (reams of paper and toner) wholesale. This will allow her to complement the services that she offers in her business, and furthermore, she will receive an additional income that will serve to continue capitalizing the establishment.

Ligia declares that her age doesn't stop her from continuing to strive to meet her goals. For this reason she is constantly searching for alternatives that will allow her to advance and accomplish her dream of expanding her business and in the near future acquiring her own location to continue it, improving its profitability and generating better income in order to have the opportunity to enjoy a more peaceful old age, without monetary worries and at the side of her loved one, who has accompanied her through so many years of matrimony.

loans.use: to buy a photocopies and supplies (reams of paper and toner) at wholesale

loans.name: Sope Seydi Djamil Group

texts.fr: SOPEY SEYDI DJAMIL est composé de 12 personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier et se réunissent à chaque fois de besoin. Elles ont les mêmes ambitions et font pratiquement la même activité. Leur présidente s’appelle Ndèye, c’est elle qui a levé la main sur la photo. Son activité primaire est le commerce, elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter des produits alimentaires comme le riz, l’huile et le sucre  et ensuite les revendre à ses clients potentiels. Elle est mariée et mère de famille de 5 enfants. Elle a une activité de 3ans dans son activité. A part ses besoins, elle n’a aucunes charges. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la finir à 14h car dit elle c’est une femme de ménage et elle doit préparer à manger pour ses enfants. A l’avenir elle voudrait ouvrir d’autres points de vente et augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: The Sopey Seydi Djamil group is composed of 12 members living inthe same neighborhood and meeting as needed. They have the same goals and run very similar business. Their leader is called Ndeye; she is the one raising her hand in the photo. She works as a vendor. She is requesting this loan in order to buy food products such as rice, vegetable oil and sugar for resale. She is married and the mother of five. She has three years of experience with this business. She has no additional dependents She starts her work day at 9 AM and ends at 2 PM since she is the one running the household and she needs to prepare food for her children. In the future, she would like to open additional sales points and increase her revenues.

loans.use: Acheter des produits alimentaires et les revendre

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está trabajando y luchando por salir adelante, todas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde cada una está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una.
Marina, se dedica a la cría y la venta de gallinas y huevos,  también se debe destacar el trabajo que ella hace por poder crecer y salir adelante para ayudar a su familia.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de Alimentos para sus gallinas ponedoras, vitaminas y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group is working and fighting to get ahead. All the women are part of the poverty elimination program. Each one is doing a survey on the elimination of poverty in order to know their situations.
Marina raises and sells chickens and eggs. She does what she does so that she can grow and get ahead to help her family.
Marina is requesting this loan for the purchase of vitamins and feed for her laying hens, and other items. This will help her to obtain greater production and sales, and to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed, vitamins, and other items.

loans.name: Trigal 2 Group

texts.es:
Trigal dos es este grupo formado en Ciudad del Este. Todas ellas son amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, que se unieron con el propósito de crecer y mejorar cada una con lo que hace. Todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que les ayudará a conocer en qué situación está cada una y conforme a eso poder trabajar y mejorar, para poder superar su pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Santa, quien es una persona muy humilde, ella hizo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que mostró que estaba con ingresos muy bajos, pero ella continua trabajando y luchado por mejorar ese resultado. Ella se dedica a la venta de remedios naturales, ya sea para mate o tereré (bebidas tradicionales paraguayas), y comenta que si bien su trabajo es muy humilde, está orgullosa de lo que hace, pues le permite ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertir en su emprendimiento, que es para comprar remedios para la venta, y así poco a poco ir mejorando.
texts.en:
Trigal 2 is the group shown, based in Ciudad del Este. All the women are friends and neighbours in this city, and they came together with the goal of growing and improving in what they do. All are taking part in a poverty elimination survey which will help them to understand each individual's situation, and work and improve based on the results, in order to break out of poverty. 

Santa is one of the group members, and is a very humble person. She did the poverty elimination survey, and it showed that she has a very low income. Nevertheless, she continues to work and fight to improve her situation. She earns a living by selling natural medicines, including mate and tereré (a traditional Paraguayan drink). She says that even though her work is modest, she is proud of what she does, as it allows her to help her family.

Santa is requesting this loan to invest in her business by buying medicines to sell, and thus continue improving gradually.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines to sell.

loans.name: Génesis Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado Génesis está integrado por 18 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, todas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y de esa forma luchando por mejorar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir, con ingresos medios, pero trabajando y esforzándose día a día por poder mejorar y salir adelante. Ella es costurera, ama de llaves y también niñera, lo que demuestra que es una persona muy luchadora y por sobre todo trabajadora que quiere salir adelante.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, botones y demás, para poder seguir con sus costuras y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group, called Génesis, is made up of 18 women. All of them are friends and neighbors from the city of Villa Elisa. They are all part of the poverty elimination program, and have done the poverty elimination survey, and in this way they are fighting to improve their lives. 

One of the members is Maria, who in her last survey demonstrated a poverty ranking of "level two" (see below), which means she has a mid-level income, but is working and striving day-to-day to be able to improve her conditions and get ahead.

She is a seamstress, a housekeeper, and a nanny, which shows that she is a fighter and above all a hard worker who wants to get ahead. She is requesting this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of fabrics, thread, buttons and more, in order to continue doing her sewing and filling her clients´ orders.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, thread, buttons and more

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Sagrada Familia” está en su 1º ciclo  del programa de comité de Mujeres, donde todas están con mucho entusiasmo de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y poder superar su situación de pobreza, es por eso que también forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza.
Nilda es parte de este grupo, y ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que está luchando por sus seres queridos, que son quienes la inspiran a seguir luchando. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas variadas, y comenta que ya se ha hecho de muy buena clientela gracias a la buena calidad de sus prendas.
Nilda pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para este verano, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Sagrada Familia" is in its first loan cycle with the Program of Women's Committees.  All of the members have a lot of enthusiasm for improving their living conditions and getting out of poverty.  This is why they are taking part in the Poverty Elimination Program.

Nilda is part of this group.  She is a very hardworking woman who is fighting hard for her loved ones, who are her inspiration to continue to strive for progress.  She has a business selling a variety of garments.  She says that she has developed a very good customer base, thanks to the good quality of her garments.

Nilda is requesting a loan to invest in a variety of clothing for this summer so that she can continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell

loans.name: Tierra Fertil  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Tierra Fértil está formado por 8 mujeres quienes viven en por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeada mucha vegetación y verdes campos, tiene un clima frió, una arquitectura variada. Su gente es amable y gentil, a pesar de todas las dificultades del diario vivir siempre están con una sonrisa.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Blanca, tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 4 años de edad que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Blanca desde hace 2 años se dedica a la atención de una tienda que es de su propiedad labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo, en su local tiene servicio de  internet, bazar y papelería. 
Su nuevo crédito es para comprar víveres y útiles escolares para su negocio. Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The loan group Tierra Fértil (Fertile Land) consists of eight women who live on the outskirts of the Valle parish in Cuenca, a place that is surrounded by much vegetation and green fields. It has a cold climate and a varied architecture. Its people are friendly and gracious; in spite of all the difficulties of daily living, they always have a smile.

One of the members of this group is Señora Blanca. She is 30 years old. She is the single mother of a 4-year-old girl, who goes to a little city school. She does not have her own house, and so she rents.

For two years Doña Blanca has tended her own store. She works every day of the week without a fixed schedule. In her shop, she has internet service, a variety store, and a stationery store.

Her new loan will be used to buy groceries and school supplies for her business. Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy groceries and school supplies for her business

loans.name: Pa Bong 1 Group

texts.en:
This is Hoa, who is 24 years old.  She is married with one child, who attends school.  Hoa runs an agriculture business raising pigs and cultivating rice. She said her main challenge is the lack of capital. 

Hoa has requested a loan of VND 5,000,000 to buy a lawn mower, fertilizer and corn seeds. The extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve her income so that she can cover her child's tuition fee and rebuild her old house. In the future Hoa plans to buy more buffaloes to further expand her business. She hopes to generate higher profits and sustain her family's daily needs. 

Hoa is the team leader of Pa Bong 1 Group which consists of 13 Thai ethnic minority women. In the picture, Hoa stands at the first from the right.  Note that the man standing third from the left of the picture is the guarantor of one of the borrower (Ms. Nhung).

loans.use: to buy a lawn mower, fertilizer and corn seeds

loans.name: Enor Jamueth

texts.es:
Enor, a sus 37 años de edad se dedica a la cría y comercialización de cerdos y, de manera alterna trabaja como empleado en una tienda de abarrotes, así se gana la vida, para solventar los gastos básicos suyos y de su esposa.
Las labores del campo las aprendió de sus familiares, pues ha sido una tradición que pasa de generación en generación.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de más lechones y concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le permitirá aumentar su producción y mejorar las ventas e ingresos que percibe por su labor.
Enor tiene como propósito darle continuidad a su actividad generadora de recursos, ampliando su capacidad instalada para poder tener más producción y generar una mayor rentabilidad, que le permita independizarse completamente y ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Enor is 37 years old and raises and sells pigs for a living. He also works as an employee at a grocery store as an alternative way to meet his basic needs and those of his wife.
He learned farm work from his family, as it has been a tradition that passes from generation to generation.
The requested credit will be invested in the purchase of piglets and concentrate to feed the animals. This will allow him to increase his production and improve his sales and income that he earns from his labor.
Enor's goal is to give himself continuity in his income generating activity, increasing his capacity to be able to have more production and generate greater profit. This is will allow him to be completely independent and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more piglets and concentrate to feed the animals.

loans.name: María Rocío

texts.es:
María es ama de casa, amorosa y dedicada a su esposo y a sus dos hijos menores de edad. Su esposo tiene una tienda de abarrotes en la que ella le colabora en algunas ocasiones, sin embargo, los ingresos que perciben no son suficientes para solventar los gastos del hogar; por ello se motivó para iniciar su propio negocio en un local arrendado y así generar más ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
Esto la lleva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (mecato, granos, lácteos, galletería, café, gaseosas, entre otros), así podrá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera tener buenos resultados  lograr un reconocimiento y aceptación en el sector donde estará ubicado.
El propósito de María es fortalecer y acreditar cada día su negocio para que sea rentable y le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable que le permita dar una mejor educación a sus hijos y aumentar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a loving housewife, devoted to her husband and their two children young in age. Her husband has a grocery store in which she helps on some occasions. However, the income they receive is not sufficient to cover the household expenses. This motivated her to start her own business in a leased store and generate income to help her husband with the financial burden of the household.
This leads her to seek the support of a loan to buy stock wholesale (pastries, grain, dairy products, coffee, sodas, etc.) so that she will be able to start her productive project which she hopes to have good results to achieve the recognition and acceptance into the area where she will be located.
María's goal is to strengthen and accredit her business each day so that it will be profitable and guarantee her favorable economic stability that will allow her to give a better education to her children and increase the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy stock wholesale (pastries, grain, dairy products, chips, coffee, sodas, etc.)

loans.name: Álvaro De Jesús

texts.es:
Álvaro, a sus 63 años de edad, es un microempresario con más de 40 años de experiencia en el sector panadero, trabajó en diferentes negocios desempeñándose como panadero y repostero, adquiriendo mayor conocimiento y experiencia en el manejo de este tipo de negocios, esto lo impulsó a independizarse y, desde hace 14 años montó su primera sucursal en el municipio donde reside, pero unos meses después tuvo un derrame debido a que se mojó estando acalorado, esto le dejó secuelas y dificultades para movilizarse; Sin embargo esto no lo detuvo y siguió trabajando para sacar adelante a sus 5 hijos. Durante muchos años su negocio ha cogido fuerza y ha sido reconocido en el sector, dando muy buenos resultados en ventas por la calidad y el buen sabor de los productos que ofrece, esto lo impulsó a montar su segunda sucursal en otro barrio del municipio, desde hace aproximadamente un mes y hasta el momento ha tenido muy buena aceptación por los habitantes del sector.
Actualmente solicita el crédito con el ánimo de comprar una batidora industrial, una báscula e insumos al por mayor (harina, azúcar, polvo de hornear, margarina, huevos, entre otros), esto le permitirá seguir fortaleciendo la nueva sucursal para que sea reconocida y rentable.
Álvaro tiene como meta, posicionar bien su segundo punto de venta y así seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una cadena de panaderías reconocidas en la región, que le garanticen una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Álvaro, age 63, is a small businessman with over 40 years of experience in the field of baking.  He worked at different businesses as a baker and pastry maker.  He gained greater knowledge and experience in managing this type of business.  This drove him to become independent.  Fourteen years ago he set up his first branch in the municipality where he lives.  However, a few months later he had a stroke because he got wet while overheated.  This left him with secondary effects and difficulty getting around.  Nevertheless, this did not stop him, and he kept working in order to get his five children ahead.  

Throughout many years, his business has become stronger, and it has become well-known in the area.  It gives very good results in sales because of the quality and good taste of the products that he offers.  This drove him to set up a second branch in another neighborhood in the municipality.  Starting approximately a month ago, the business has been well accepted by the inhabitants of the area.

He is currently requesting the loan in order to buy an industrial mixer, a scale, and wholesale supplies (flour, sugar, baking powder, margarine, and eggs, among others).  This will allow him to continue strengthening the new branch so that it will become well-known and profitable.

Álvaro’s goal is well-positioning his second point of sales.  This way he will continue struggling to fulfill his dream of having a chain of well-known bakeries in the region.  This will guarantee him of financial security in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use:
to buy an industrial mixer, a scale, and wholesale supplies (flour, sugar, baking powder, margarine, and eggs, 
among others).

loans.name: Astrid Yamile

texts.es:
Astrid es una mujer emprendedora y dinámica, que se ha criado en el campo, donde su padre le enseñó a cuidar la tierra y los animales; a sus 26 años de edad, se encuentra estudiando una técnica ambiental semipresencial, con la cual ha ampliado sus conocimientos sobre agricultura y el cuidado del medio ambiente; esto la motiva para iniciar su propio negocio; un pequeño vivero que estará ubicado en la finca donde reside, allí cuenta con la ventaja de poseer algunas plantas ya sembradas y además la finca queda al borde de la carretera, lo que facilitará la visibilidad para los viajeros que transiten por allí; además ya tiene algunos clientes que le están encargando plantas ornamentales; para lograr su objetivo, Astrid solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar insumos agrícolas al por mayor (semillas, abonos, tierra, musgo, entre otros) y materiales para construir el invernadero (madera y plásticos), esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar buenos resultados para aportar a la economía familiar.
Astrid es consciente que para lograr la meta propuesta, debe trabajar arduamente, con esmero, disciplina y mucha dedicación, así podrá acreditar poco a poco su vivero para que, en un futuro a mediano plazo pueda generar oportunidades de empleo y ayudar a que otras personas mejoren su calidad de vida, así como ella mejorará la suya con su oficio.
texts.en:
Astrid is enterprising and dynamic. She grew up in the country, where her father taught her how to cultivate the earth and look after animals. She is 26 years old, and is studying an environmental technical degree that includes both on-campus classes and classes by distance. Her studies have increased her knowledge of agriculture and of care for the environment. This has motivated her to start her own business, which is a small nursery that will be located on the property where she lives. She has the advantage of already having planted some plants on this property, as well as the fact that the property borders the road, which will increase the visibility of her business for people who pass by. In addition, she already has some customers who have ordered ornamental plants from her.

To achieve her objective, Astrid is requesting this loan to buy agricultural inputs at wholesale prices, such as seeds, fertilizer, soil and moss, as well as to buy materials with which to build a greenhouse, such as wood and plastic. This will allow her to start her business, with which she hopes to achieve good results so she can contribute to her family’s finances.

Astrid understands that to achieve her goal, she must work very hard, with a lot of care, discipline and dedication. She hopes to gradually establish a good reputation for her nursery, so that in the medium-term future she can create employment opportunities and help other people improve their quality of life, as well as her own.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs at wholesale prices, such as seeds, fertilizer, soil and moss, as well as to buy materials with which to build a greenhouse, such as wood and plastic.

loans.name: Álvaro Isidro

texts.es:
Álvaro es un campesino trabajador y humilde, con 38 años de edad, sigue luchando para solventar los gastos básicos de su familia. Durante varios años se ha dedicado a la cría y comercialización de cerdos, actividad que aprendió por herencia familiar y que le ha permitido generar recursos para salir adelante.
Actualmente solicita el apoyo de un crédito con el que desea comprar más lechones para cría y concentrado para alimentar a sus animales, esto le permitirá aumentar su nivel de producción y podrá vender mayor cantidad de carne. El cliente manifiesta que desea seguir realizando la labor que lo apasiona y que le ha dado de comer durante toda su vida, por ello sigue luchando incansablemente para lograr incrementar su ganado porcino cada día más y convertirse en un gran distribuidor de carnes; así estará en la capacidad de tener una estabilidad económica favorable para disfrutar de un mayor bienestar y condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Álvaro is a hard-working and humble farmer. At the age of 38, he continues to strive to pay the basic expenses of his family. For a number of years he has raised and sold pigs, a business that he learned as a family legacy and that has allowed him to generate resources in order to advance.

Now he is applying for the assistance of a loan, with which he wants to buy more little pigs to raise and concentrate to feed to his animals. This will allow him to increase his level of production, and he will be able to sell a greater quantity of meat. The borrower states that he wants to continue doing the work that he loves and that has sustained him through his whole life. For this reason, he continues striving untiringly every day to succeed in increasing his stock of pigs and becoming a big meat distributor. Thus he will be able to have a favorable economic stability to enjoy better well-being and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more pigs to raise and concentrate to feed his animals

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es:
Amilcar de 56 años de edad, se dedica a la compra y venta de vehículos usados, ya tiene 15 años de experiencia en ese mercado, él es casado su esposa, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y se preocupa por mantener su casa limpia y que a sus hijos no les falte nada. Ellos dos son padres de 4 hijos, dos de ellos se encuentran en  Estados Unidos y son los que le apoyan económicamente y su hija la menor se encuentra estudiando en una universidad,  su hijo penúltimo se dedica  al comercio de vehículos junto a su papá.

Amilcar expresa que aprendió de su padre, que se dedicaba a la misma actividad. Ademas, de esa fuente de ingreso él se dedica a la venta de joyas de acero, negocio en el cual lleva 3 años de experiencia, y es en este negocio en el cual esta involucra su esposa y su hija.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para cancelar una deuda pendiente en un banco.

 Amilcar pretende en un futuro mejorar el negocio de compra y venta de vehículos, tiene planes de montar su propio auto-lote y de esta manera tendrá mejores ganancias y podrá asegurar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Amilcar, 56, makes a living by buying and selling used vehicles. He has 15 years of experience in this market. He is married and his wife is in charge of domestic tasks; she makes sure that the house is clean and that her children have everything they need. They have four children, two of whom are in the United States and support them financially. Their youngest daughter is studying in college. Their second youngest daughter works by selling vehicles with her father.

Amilcar learned from his father, who did the same work as Amilcar does now. In addition to this work, he sells steel jewelry, a business in which he has three years experience. His wife and daughter are also involved in this business.

He is requesting this loan from Fundación Campo to pay off an debt pending with a bank. In the future, Amilcar hopes to improve his business buying and selling used cars. He has plans to open his own car lot to increase his profits and ensure a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to make his home more comfortable with personal expenses that will improve his family's quality of life.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys vive con su familia en la ciudad de Itá, su familia tiene 5 integrantes. Ella comenta que trabaja en forma dependiente, y que su sueño es poder terminar su carrera para ser una persona independiente, que trabaje en su profesión.
Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería comercial, con lo que quiere destacarse y poder salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de clases, como ser copias y materiales de estudio. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Gladys lives with her family of 5 in the city of Itá.  She states that she works as an employee, but her dream is to be able to finish her education so she can have her own business in her profession.  She is studying business administration, which she wants to stand out in and be able to get ahead.  

She is asking for this loan so she can use it to cover the costs of her courses such as: making copies and study materials.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: pay for school costs such as: copies and materials.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene es de la ciudad de Villarrica, ella al igual que muchos jóvenes está sacrificándose por salir adelante y poder superarse.
Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, con lo que quiere ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es la salud. Ella comenta que su familia es quien la inspira a seguir luchando para crecer.
Ella pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y así seguir luchando por su sueño.
texts.en:
Marlene is from the city of Villarrica.  Like many young people, she is making sacrifices in order to get ahead and overcome.  She is studying nursing, which she wants to use to help other people with their health which is very important.  She says that her family inspirers her to continue striving to grow.

She is asking for this loan to use it to pay her fees so she can continue studying and striving towards her dream.

loans.use: pay for university fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria empezó su carrera hace un año, con el propósito de ser una profesional útil a la sociedad por medio de su carrera.
Ella está estudiando para ser ingeniera ambiental, ya que quiere poder ayudar al medio ambiente que es algo tan importante para la vida del planeta.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas de universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y luchando por salir adelante y cumplir con la meta que se propuso.
texts.en:
Maria began her degree a year ago with the aim of being a professional, who through her degree is useful to society. 

She is studying to be an environmental engineer because she wants to be able to help the environment, which is so important to the life of the planet.

She is applying for this loan to invest in her university tuition fees, and in this way she'll be able to keep studying and fighting to get ahead and fulfil the goal she has set.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia proviene de una familia humilde, luchadora y sacrificada. Su meta es llegar a recibirse con el título de licenciada en criminalística para así poder especializarse más en la carrera que está estudiando y así poder ayudar a sus padres.
Pide de este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, ya que le será de mucha ayuda para poder cumplir con su meta. Agradece ya que con esta ayuda podrá ir mejorando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sonia comes from a modest, selfless family with a fighting spirit. 

Her goal is to successfully become qualified in criminology so that she is able to further specialise in her area of study and therefore be able to help her parents. 

She is applying for this loan to pay her university tuition fees, which will help her a lot in achieving her goal. She is grateful that with this help she'll be able to continue improving as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Mata De Palma En Desarrollo 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Carmen is the coordinator of the group Mata de Palma en Desarrollo 2 & 3 ("Mata de Palma in development," called this because this is the name of the community). The group is is located in Hato Mayor city, in the eastern part of the country. Hato Mayor is a fairly mountainous region where the principal industry is agriculture. 

Carmen is a mother of four children, and they live together with her and their father. She said that her most difficult challenge was to create her business. In the past it was very difficult for her because she didn't have or know how to save capital to start, but after she found Esperanza and took out her loans, she was able (like other members in this group) to open her business. 

Carmen is excited about her 17th loan with Esperanza. After almost nine years in her business, she has expanded her little butcher shop into a bigger one, with more quantity of meats to supply more clients. With this loan she will buy beef and pork to sell in her business. She will use the profits to invest in her butcher shop, and she will continuing saving part of it to make one of her dreams come true: to start building her house. She dreams of having a nice house and a successful business with employees. 

Carmen and her group thank all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy meat (beef, chicken, pork)

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia comenta que su papá es un comerciante, y que por medio de su trabajo la ha ayudado en sus estudios.
Claudia está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería informática, y quiere ser una profesional que pueda ayudar a las personas y ser útil a la sociedad. Su sueño es poder desarrollarse, no solo como profesional, sino también  como persona.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y también para cubrir sus gastos de transporte. Ella está contenta por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Claudia comments that her father is a merchant and by means of his work, he has helped her with her studies.

Claudia is studying information engineering and she wishes to be a professional who can help people and be useful to society. Her dream is to develop herself, not just as a professional but, also, as a person.

She requests this loan to invest in payment of her university fees and, also, to cover the costs of transportation. Claudia is happy for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay her university fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Nueva Ilusión Group

texts.es: El grupo “Nueva Ilusión” se encuentra en una comunidad muy tranquila, sus habitantes aún tienen sus costumbres y tradiciones muy arraigadas. La fiesta más celebrada es el 14 de agosto, día que celebran a la Virgen de San Juan. El grupo está conformado por cuatro mujeres muy trabajadoras y responsables, platican que el nombre del grupo lo eligió su Oficial de Crédito, pero a todas les agradó ya que significa mucho, pues la oportunidad de un crédito es como tener una nueva ilusión en sus negocios y en sus familias. Juana o Doña Juanita, como le llaman de cariño, tiene 50 años de edad, estudio la primaria, está casada con el señor Leobardo desde hace 28 años y juntos formaron una familia con 5 hijos de los cuales dos de ellos aun se encuentran estudiando. Doña Juanita tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, se dedica a la cría y engorda de borregos y también elabora bordados. Comenzó con la actividad de los borregos y los bordados, pero en tiempos de lluvia notó que sus animalitos enflacaban mucho y era difícil ponerlos en venta. Hace dos años decidió iniciar con su pequeña tienda de abarrotes porque cuando ella necesitaba comprar algún producto tenía que caminar  varios kilómetros para poder llegar a la tienda, por eso mismo decidió iniciar a vender algunos productos los más esenciales como leche, pan, huevo, alimentos enlatados, refrescos etc. “Mi suegra tenía una pequeña tiendita pero termino cerrándola y de allí aprendí un poco”. Esta vez está solicitando crédito para comprar mas borreguitos chicos, tela cuadrille, estambre de varios colores, hilos agujas, etc. Por el momento no invertirá en su tiendita de abarrotes pues sus hijos mayores son quienes la apoyan para comprar más productos. En cuanto a la creación de bordados, Juanita cuenta con 20 años de experiencia: “Desde muy pequeña me llamo la atención la artesanía y aprendí solo viendo”. sin embargo, ella tiene la vista ya muy cansada y ahora debe utilizar lentes para elaborar sus servilletas. Platica también que a sus tres actividades les tiene mucho cariño, en la tiendita solo hay clientela en la tarde y en la mañana, durante el día la mantiene abierta pero aprovecha para bordar y todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano para darles de comer. En general, Doña Juanita no tiene ningún problema con sus negocios y el único sueño que tiene es lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos que aún están estudiando. Las integrantes del grupo están muy agradecidas con KIVA y VisionFund por el crédito otorgado porque podrán invertir en sus negocios. Francisca invertirá en abarrotes, Maximina y Yaneth invertirán en bordados.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ilusión” group is from a very tranquil community and its people maintain their well-rooted customs and traditions.  The most celebrated festival is on August 14, the day that the Virgin (Mary) of San Juan is celebrated.  The group is made up of four hardworking and responsible ladies who say that the group’s name was selected by the loan official, but they all liked it because it means many things, and the chance having another loan is a new dream for their businesses and families.  Juana, or Juanita as her friend’s call her, is 50 years old.  She has an elementary school education, has been married to Leobardo for 28 years, and together they formed a family that includes five children. Two of whom attend school.

Juanita has a small grocery store, raises sheep, and also embroiders.  She started out raising sheep and embroidering, but during the rainy season she noticed that the animals would get too thin and it was difficult to sell them.  Two years ago she decided to open a small grocery store because whenever she needed to buy a product, she had to walk for several kilometers to get to a store, so she decide to begin selling the most essential products such as milk, bread, eggs, canned goods, soft drinks, etc.  “My mother-in-law had a small store but ended up closing it, but I learned some things there.”

This time she is asking for a loan to buy more lambs, fabric, checkered cloth, yarn in various colors, thread, needles, etc.  She will not invest into her grocery store at the moment because her oldest children will help her to buy products.  Juanita has 20 years’ experience making weaves.  “I have liked the arts since I was very little and I learned just by watching.”  However, her vision is tired and now she needs gasses to make her napkins.  She also says that she loves her three activities.  She only gets customers in her store in the evenings, but keeps it open during the day and uses the time to weave and gets up very early every morning to make breakfast.

Generally Juanita doesn’t have any problems with her income and her only dream is to improve her quality of life for her children who are in school.  The members of the group are very grateful to Kiva and Vision Fund for the loan because they will be able to invest in their businesses.  Francisca will invest in groceries, Maximina and Yaneth will invest in embroidery.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

location.town: La Virgen del Centro, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Las Ranitas (Flat) Group

texts.es:
Angelica es una mujer emprendedora que por más de 8 años ha trabajado en la cría de cerdos y venta de cosméticos. Ella platica que decidió iniciar a trabajar en su propio negocio porque quería ayudar a su esposo a pagar los gastos de su hogar así que inicio comprando unos cerdos para ir criándolos y ganarse un poco de dinero, desde entonces se dedica esta actividad. Angelica dice que tiene que dedicar su tiempo a alimentar y mantener limpios los chiqueros pero vale la pena ya que cuando los vende le deja una buena ganancia, ella además en su tiempo libre sale a vender cosméticos por catálogo para obtener un ingreso extra. Un crédito de Kiva y de VisionFund le ayudará a comprar alimentos y cosméticos. Ella espera que con esta inversión su negocio prospere y pueda ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son: Teresa venta de productos naturistas, Alejandrina venta de comida, Verónica venta de miel y cosméticos y Agustina venta de antojitos.
texts.en:
Angelica is an enterprising woman that has worked for over 8 years breeding pigs and selling cosmetics. She says she decided to start working in her own business because she wanted to help her husband with the household expenditures, so she started earning some money by acquiring and breeding pigs. Since then she has been dedicated to this activity. 

Angelica says she has to spend her time feeding the pigs and keeping the pens clean, but all of this is completely worth it when she gets to obtain a good amount of money for her sales. In her free time she also sales cosmetics from a catalog line to have an extra income. A loan from Kiva and VisionFund will help her to buy pig feed and cosmetics. She hopes that with this investment her business will be prosper and she will be able to give her family a better quality of life. 

Other members of the group are: Teresa, who sells natural products; Alejandrina, who sells food; Verónica, who sells honey and cosmetics; and Agustina, who sells traditional corn-based Mexican dishes.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and cosmetics.

loans.name: Miryan

texts.es:
Miryan está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, ya que su meta anhelada siempre fue poder ayudar a las demás personas. Ella se define a sí misma como una persona que quiere salir adelante, y es por eso que se está esforzando al máximo.
Miryan está dando su mayor esfuerzo para poder cumplir con su meta. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, lo que le permitirá seguir con sus estudios, y de esa forma poder cumplir su anhelo de ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Miryan is studying a degree in Law, as her long-time goal has always been to be able to help others. 

She defines herself as a person who wants to get ahead, and it's because of this that she is putting everything into it. Miryan is giving her all to achieve her goal. 

She is applying for this loan to invest in paying university tuition fees, which will mean she can carry on studying, and in this way fulfil her desire of being a great professional.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Damian

texts.es:
Damian es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Informática, también trabaja en una empresa privada como auditor de campo, vive y estudia por la Ciudad de Santaní. Es muy dedicado al estudio, una persona que desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus metas. Su meta es de tener su título Universitario, poder trabajar de forma independiente y también poder enseñar en las Universidades para poder ayudar a las personas que al igual que el quieren aprender.
Damian pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir esos gastos en que incurrirán.
texts.en:
Damian is studying for a computer engineering degree, and he also works in a private company as a field auditor. He lives and studies in the city of Santaní.

He's very dedicated to his studies, a person who wants to get ahead through his efforts to reach his goals. His goal is to have a university qualification, to be able to work independently and also to be able to teach in universities to help other people who want to study like him.

Damian is applying for this loan to pay his tuition fees, because in this way he'll be able to cover the costs he'll incur.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila started her business because it afforded her the opportunity to make better money than working for another company. Word quickly spread about her quality service and availability and suddenly Sheila was handling more clients than ever before.  She brought on three family members and four other employees to help her handle the contracts. 

Sheila is ready to take her business to the next step again. She has the opportunity to further expand the business, but she needs the money to purchase additional cleaning equipment so that she can fill more contracts. Help this Brazilian-American achieve her loan goal and build her family business!

loans.use: to purchase additional cleaning supplies

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en: Peru's Arturo is an artisan who specializes in making leather handbags. He would like to invest in the purchase of leather to increase production. Arturo has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story: "I have specialized in tooled leather since 1995. My parents are in the clothing industry, where I learned many of the techniques I apply to leather. I am the father of two children, and I get many design ideas from my wife, Veronica. I prefer desk accessories, handbags, briefcases and luggage. We use hand tools, and I've formed a community of artisans who collaborate with me. Our designs are lovingly crafted by hand, and we feel a personal attachment to what we do." "I'd like to thank you all for collaborating with this microcredit. By being able to purchase leather in larger quantities I'll be able to increase my stock, especially with the new designs I have in mind." Use the link below to view Arturo's leather bags on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/3957

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of leather to increase production.

loans.name: Raymond

texts.en:
After suffering a serious injury that required immediate assistance, Raymond realized that the traditional first aid kit is lacking technology that allows people to easily and efficiently analyze an injury, alert the appropriate facilities, and handle the injury to the best of their abilities until the paramedics arrive. 

Raymond then established CuraKit, where he will develop a product he calls “Mobile external Diagnositic integrand Kit” (MeDiK). He envisions that MeDiK will be a mobile electronic device that can be used as a first aid response. It essentially combines several first-responder resources into one device. The compact device will be used to record and provide information at the scene of an emergency. It will be able to take blood samples, provide oxygen, locate nearby emergency personnel, and will contain medical supplies like gauze.

“I wish to use my quantitative strengths to design products that meet the needs of the sporting industry and families.”

It goes without saying that Raymond, who moved from Ghana to the United States ten years ago, is really smart! His Masters in Molecular Biology and his experience as a medical lab analyst and technologist make him equipped to handle the complexities of how such an important device can better aid people in case of an injury.

With your contribution towards his loan goal, Raymond will be able to go into the research and product development phase, which entails product conceptualization, electronics research, and the purchase of materials necessary to create a mock-up for the electronic system needed for the device to operate. 

Help this innovative entrepreneur begin building this product that has the potential to save lives.

loans.use: to create a mock-up for the electronic system needed for his product to operate.

loans.name: Kimberly

texts.en:
Kimberly has been a beautician for more than ten years, and it was during this decade of being the go-to stylist for women who wanted to look their best, that Kimberly discovered what it was that made her feel fulfilled and gave her purpose. “I love inspiring women and helping them feel and look their best.”

In an effort to bring her talent for hairstyling and her knowledge of the hair industry to a larger audience, Kimberly established Divine Textures, an online hair extension store. On the site, Kimberly will offer her clients the highest quality, unprocessed hair extensions.

Unfortunately, a lack of funds has halted the launch of Kimberly’s two-month-old business, and that’s why she needs your help. With a contribution to her loan goal, you will not only help Kimberly develop her website but also help her pay for online marketing and advertising efforts like Search Engine Optimization and Pay-Per-Click campaigns.

Launching the website is only the first step towards a big future Kimberly envisions for Divine Textures. She hopes to eventually open a Divine Textures storefront and would like to one day found a non-profit organization that provides cancer patients with wigs.

Help this motivated and generous entrepreneur by donating to her loan goal today.

loans.use: to develop a website for her business and pay for online advertising.

loans.name: Ray

texts.en:
Ray is the community handyman for the Fort Worth, Texas area. With more than 30 years of experience in home restoration, he is available to serve any client. Ray is experienced in installing floors and repairing or remodeling homes, with an emphasis on remodeling kitchens, and has worked in more than seven cities, including his hometown of Crowley, Texas.

Currently, Ray provides jobs for three people in his community. But when his business expenses exceeded what he had, Ray ventured to Accion Texas Inc. for a business loan. Once he was approved, he updated some of his tools, paid for maintenance on his work truck, and was able to go back to work and pay his employees. 

Ray prides himself on being affordable while offering great service, but also says without the loan, he would have possibly had to lay off some of his three employees. Saved by his Accion loan, Ray is able to continue offering his skills and talent to commercial and residential clients.

loans.use: to repair his work truck, update his tools and pay his employees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan has been a working artist for 30 years in the San Antonio area and recently started his company ChucoBrand.com. His artwork has been sold all around the world and even sits in the permanent collections of The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York and the San Antonio Museum of Art. Juan gained notoriety in 1993 when his artwork was featured in a major motion picture, “Blood in Blood Out,” about family members struggling to find their way out of the violent gang lifestyle in 1980s Los Angeles.

Juan has created an iconic clothing line that will prominently feature his artwork. The loan will be used to buy inventory and clothing to build his business. Juan’s business is based in San Antonio, but he plans to market his clothing line and artwork through his website, social media such as Facebook, as well as trade shows and expositions. 

Juan wants to build his business using his reputation as a successful artist, and market it to the Chicano community. For more information you can visit www.facebook.com/chucobrand.

loans.use: to buy inventory and clothing to build his business.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
María Margarita es una clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

María Margarita tiene 63 años, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio desde hace 40 años.
