María Margarita comenta que ha tenido diferentes trabajos, inició vendiendo antojitos mexicanos, después tuvo una tienda de abarrotes,  luego vendió pescados y actualmente se dedica a rentar mesas, sillas y lonas para eventos. Ella esta solicitando el préstamo para realizar mejoras en su vivienda, quiere arreglar los acabados, para estar más cómoda y que su casa se vea más bonita. María Margarita es una persona responsable y organizada, siempre ha pagado sus créditos puntualmente y ha sabido ahorrar e ir formando un patrimonio. Ella dice que sus principales logros han sido sacar a sus hijos adelante y construir su casa.
texts.en:
María Margarita is a client of Kubo Financiero, and this is her story.

María Margarita, age 63, is a widow and has three children.  She has been in commerce for 40 years. María Margarita says that she has had different jobs.  She started selling Mexican snacks.  After that, she had a grocery store.  Then, she sold fish.  She now rents out tables, chairs, and tarps for events.

She is requesting the loan to make improvements to her home.  She wants to work on the finishes in order to be more comfortable and so that her house will look prettier.

María Margarita is a responsible and organized person.  She has always repaid her loans punctually.  She has known how to save and to build a legacy.  She says that her main achievements have been getting her children ahead and building her house.

loans.use: to make repairs and improvements to her house.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Mujeres Luchadoras está formado por 7 mujeres quienes hacen honor a su nombre ya que se esfuerzan, sacrifican y luchan día a día para brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos y sus familias, son personas que mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedica a laborar en la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio. Viven por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de hermosos paisajes, una arquitectura colonial que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Delfa, se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y compañera del grupo de crédito Mujeres Luchadoras, le gusta su grupo ya que todas son personas amables y siempre se apoyan en sus momentos buenos y malos.
La Señora Delfa tiene 42 años de edad, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 21, 16 y 11 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, sus dos últimos hijos estudian en el colegio, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Delfa desde muy joven se ha dedicado al comercio, vende una gran variedad de ropa, este negocio le ha permitido ayudar en su hogar y ahora es el único sustento para todos los gastos de su hogar. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de ropa y así ampliar más su negocio. Su meta es tener un almacén para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The lending group Mujeres Luchadoras is comprised of 7 women who honor their name as they strive, sacrifice and struggle everyday to provide their children and families with a better future.  They are people who maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.  They work in agriculture, animal husbandry and business.  They live near the city of Cuenca, a city with beautiful landscapes and colonial architecture for which it was given the name of "Cultural Heritage of Humanity" in December of 1999.  

One of the members of this group is Delfa, who is in her third loan with her friends and partners in the Mujeres Luchadoras lending group.  She likes her group because they are all kind people who continually support each other through good and bad.  Delfa is 42 years, is widowed, and in her marriage, conceived 3 children ages 21, 16 and 11.  Her first son is married and lives on his own.  Her last two children are in school.  She does not own her home, so she lives in a leased home. 

From a young age, Delfa has worked in business.  She sells a great variety of clothing, a business that has allowed her to help with her home, and is not the only income for all of the household expenses.  She will use this loan to purchase clothing to expand her business.  Her goal is to have a store to sell her products from.

loans.use: purchase clothing.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 20 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Teresa es una joven visionaria quien con mucho esfuerzo ha empezado a estudiar en la Universidad  y al mismo tiempo trabaja en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Desea terminar sus estudios y así poder ayudar a su familia a mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Actualmente desea ayudar a su familia en las mejoras de la vivienda ya que el techo del corredor se encuentra deteriorado. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y polines para reparar el techo lo antes posible. Tiene plena confianza que con lo que gana en su trabajo logrará pagar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Teresa is 20 years old, single, and lives in her own home with her family. She is a visionary young woman who started her studies at the university with great effort. At the same time, she works for a company that is near her town.

Teresa wants to finish her studies so that she can help her family and improve their living conditions. At the moment, she wants to help improve her family's living condition by repairing the roof above a hallway that has deteriorated. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of galvanized sheets, wood, and boards for repairing the roof as soon as possible.

Teresa is fully confident that the earnings from her job will enable her to repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and boards for repairing the roof of her home.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es: Rosa de 41 años de edad se dedica a la venta de mondongo (carne de vaca) desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil y le ayuda en los gastos de la casa, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mondongo por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa, 41, has made her living selling tripe (beef) for several years. Her business is located in her place of residence, with the earnings she achieves for her sales used to cover household expenses. She lives in her own home with her husband who works as a mason and helps with the expenses of the household. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy wholesale tripe to continue her work because it is her only source of income and so she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale tripe (beef)

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es:
Ana, necesita capital para invertir en la compra de aceite, quesillo, chicharron, tomates, yuca, papas y aderezos, con lo que su inventario será surtido, ya que el año escolar ofrece sus productos por el momento en su casa. 
Con el crédito anterior ella compro la materia prima que necesitaba para su negocio, ella aumento sus clientes y por tanto las ganancias que recibe son mejores, su familia se mantiene saludable y con el mismo número de miembros.
texts.en:
Ana needs a loan to invest it in the purchase of oil, curd, fried pork skin, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes and dressings, so that she will supply her inventory; at the moment she sells her products from her house during the school year.
She used her previous loan to buy basic necessities she needed for her shop; the number of her customer has increased and she consequently earns a better income. Her family still enjoys good health and it is composed of the same number of people.

loans.use: To buy oil, curd, fried pork skin, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes and dressings.

loans.name: Yohanmi

texts.es:
Yohanmi es una Joven Estudiante de Medicina, ella solicita un préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Hola mi nombre es Yohanmi, tengo 23 años de edad. Vivo en el seibo con mi madre la cual no trabaja, solo realiza algunos trabajos de limpieza en casas y con los ingresos que recibe me ha ayudado siempre. Tengo 3 hermanos pero no viven conmigo.
Actualmente estoy estudiando medicina en la UCE y elegí esa carrera porque desde pequeña quería ser doctora, es mi sueño el poder ser una gran profesional y convertirme en una persona que le pueda aportar algo a mi país. Poder ayudar a personas necesitas que no cuenten con recursos necesarios para poder recibir una buena atención medica.
Solicito el préstamo porque mi padre aunque no vive conmigo trabaja y me ayuda pero recibe muy pocos ingresos y debe mantener a sus 4 hijos. Siempre me ha brindado ayuda pero no le alcanza para mantenernos a todos.
Mi meta es ser una gran doctora, poder sacar a mi familia hacia delante y demostrarles que si tienen aspiraciones y deseo de superación pueden lograrlo. Sería para mi muy importante terminar mis estudios ya que soy la única esperanza de mi madre y poder darle una mejor calidad de vida ya que realmente se lo merece.
texts.en:
Yohanmi is a young medical student. She is requesting a loan to pay her education expenses. This is her story:

“Hello, my name is Yohanmi, and I am 23 years old. I live in El Seibo [a province in the east of the Dominican Republic] with my mother. She does not work full-time, but she does some cleaning work in houses. She has always helped me with the income she receives. I have three brothers, but they do not live with me.

I am studying medicine in the UCE [a university in the Dominican Republic]. I chose this career because I have wanted to be a doctor since I was very young. It is my dream to become a great professional and someone who can do something for my country. I would like to be able to help people in need that do not have the resources required to receive good medical care.

I am requesting this loan because, although my father does not live with me, he helps me with the little income he has, but he has to support four children. He has always helped me, but he does not have enough to support all of us.

My goal is to be a great doctor, and to be able to support my family and to show them that if they have aspirations and a desire to improve themselves, they can do it. It is very important for me to finish my studies, because I am the only hope for my mother, and I would like to be able to improve her quality of life, because she so truly deserves it.”

loans.use: to pay education expenses for medical school.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 60 años de edad posee un pequeño negocio de venta de granos básicos, aceite, café, detergentes, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en las afueras de su casa en un lugar muy transitado, por eso posee mucha clientela, vive en casa propia  con su compañera de vida, su suegra, su hijo y un nieto, Don Alfredo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para poder surtir su negocio, y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alfredo is 60 years old, and he runs a small general store where he sells basic grains, oil, coffee, detergents and other products. His shop is located close to his house in a very well-attended place, and for this reason he has many customers. He lives in his own house with his life partner, his mother-in-law, his son and a nephew. Alfredo is requesting a loan to buy more products to supply his shop, in order to earn a better income to grant his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy  basic grains, oil, coffee, detergents and other products to supply his shop.

loans.name: Jairo De Jesús

texts.es:
Jairo es un campesino de 45 años de edad, humilde y trabajador; vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo. Tiene más de 20 años de experiencia laboral como aserrador, oficio que conoció por medio de un amigo con el que trabajó por varios años. Actualmente trabaja de manera independiente, prestando el servicio a finqueros que solicitan su servicio para talar árboles en sus propiedades, así ha logrado generar recursos para llevar el sustento a su familia.
El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de una motosierra de segunda mano, que le están ofreciendo en muy buen estado, esto le permitirá ampliar su capacidad para la prestación de su servicio de manera oportuna y ágil.
Jairo manifiesta que, a pesar de todos los riesgos a los que se expone al realizar su labor, siente un gran amor por su labor, pues se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos y le ha permitido salir adelante con mucho empuje y esmero y ha podido brindar educación a sus hijos; es por ello que sueña con poseer capital de trabajo para comprar bosques  poder comercializar la madera que tala, así generará mayor rentabilidad y podrá dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is a 45-year-old farmer who is humble and hardworking.  He lives with his wife and his 3 children, whom he has raised by working hard.  

He has more than 20 years of working experience as a sawyer, a profession that he learned from a friend with whom he worked for a number of years. Currently he works independently, providing service to farmers who request it in order to chop down trees on their land, and in this way he has been able to generate the resources to provide for his family.  

The loan that he is seeking will be invested in the purchase of a second-hand chainsaw that is being offered to him in very good condition.  This will enable him to increase his ability to provide his services in a timely and flexible way.

Jairo declares that in spite of all the risks that he is exposed to while doing his work, he feels a great love for it, because it has become his principal source of income, allowing him to move forward with a lot of determination and care, and he has been able to give his children an education. 
 
This is why he dreams of having working capital; to purchase woodlands, so that he can sell the timber he would cut.  This way he will generate higher profits and be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a chainsaw.

loans.name: Ingrid Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es tatiana, es una joven que desea seguir estudiando enfermería, terminar esta carrera técnica con éxito y en unos años ejercerla para llegar a ser profesional, para ayudar a la familia, la cual le ha dado todo el apoyo correspondiente y para ser un orgullo ante la sociedad. 
Ella estudio esta carrera porque siempre lo había anhelado, ya que le encanta ayudar a las personas y también porque esta carrera es muy útil en la vida, ya que le  puede ofrecer un futuro económico cómodo y a si poder cumplir todos los sueños que ella tiene. 
Este convenio kiva, es de gran ayuda para ella, ya que le ofrece un descuento que es de gran satisfacción para ella y la familia, ya que en su hogar las condiciones económicas no son las mejores, pero con este descuento la motivan mas a estudiar por la economía de su casa, para ser profesional y útil en la sociedad.
texts.en:
This is Tatiana, a young woman who wants to continue studying nursing and graduate to this technical career successfully, to practice her work and become a professional to help her family which has given her great support, and to be the pride of her society. 
She studied in this field because she has always longed to be a nurse because she loves to help people and because this career is very useful in life because it can provide a comfortable financial future to fulfill the dreams she has. 
This loan with Kiva is of great help to her, offering her a loan is a great pleasure for her and her family because, in her home, economic conditions are not the best but she is more motivated to study for the economy of her home, to be a professional, and to be helpful to society.

loans.use: to pay for her studies to become a nurse.

loans.name: Rosa Elia

texts.es: Rosa, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, y vive en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Rosa, lleva 8 años de tener su propio negocio donde hacer tortillas de maíz para vender. El negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ella ha invertido tres prestamos anteriores para su negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 7,000 lempiras para comprar maíz para la elaboración de tortillas, con esta inversión se podrá abastecer del insumo que es el maíz. Sus metas son obtener ingresos para el sustento de su familia y poderle dar mejor vida a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en: Rosa, 48, is a single mother of three children. She lives in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Rosa has been in business making tortillas to sell for 8 years. The business is located in her home. She has taken out three previous loans for her business and is currently seeking another loan for 7,000 Lempiras to purchase corn for making tortillas. This investment will supply her main ingredient for her goods, corn. Her goals are to earn an income to support her family and to be able to give a better life to her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase corn for making and selling tortillas.

loans.name: Rosa Elba

texts.es: Rosa de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 10 años y 5 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la venta frutas y verduras desde hace un año. El negocio lo tiene en su hogar de habitacion y cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Desea ampliar su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de verduras(zanahorias, güisquiles, pepinos, cebollas, tomates, papas, etc.) para cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado y así poder incrementar sus ingresos y dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 34 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their two children, ages 10 and 5. Rosa has been earning a living by selling fruit and vegetables for the past year. She runs her business from her house and has many customers who regularly choose to buy from her. She hopes to expand her business, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to purchase more vegetables (carrots, chayotes, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, etc.) to meet the market's demand and thus increase her income and give her children better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy carrots, chayotes, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel, tiene 31 años de edad, es casado, tiene un hijo, y reside en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando granos básicos, lleva 8 años de cultivar café. Esta producción la vende a intermediarios de la zona. Esta solicitando un segundo ciclo de préstamo que es por 25,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y sembrar un vivero de café, con el propósito de  y obtener mejores cosechas e ingresos para su familia. Su plan es cultivar mas café para ampliar su finca y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 31 years old, married, and has one boy. He lives in the municipality of Gracias, in the department of Lempira. He has always worked in agriculture, growing basic grains. He has grown coffee for eight years. He sells his coffee crop to intermediaries in the area.

Manuel is requesting this loan of 25,000 HNL to buy fertilizers and to plant a nursery of coffee plants. This is his second loan cycle. Manuel hopes to obtain better harvests and income for his family. He plans to increase the size of his coffee plantation and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to plant a nursery of coffee plants.

loans.name: Fredys

texts.es:
Fredys de 49 años de edad, estudio hasta 9°, está acompañado, su compañera de vida le ayuda y también administra un negocio de ventas de artículos de hojalatería, sus hijos viven en su casa, depende 5 personas de él,  3 de sus hijos mayores estudian, 2 van al instituto y el otro está en 9° grado. 


Él posee un negocio de venta de artículos de hojalatería que el mismo hace y también un trabajo que hace a quien lo busque, hace candiles, canales, jarrillas cubetas, cumbos para molinos, chimeneas y latas para panaderías  etc. tiene 13 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, el trabajo donde fabrica estos materiales lo tiene en su casa. Para comprar los materiales, tiene que viajar  a la  ciudad que está a 1 hora en bus. Su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan en sus tiempos libres, ya que los mayores estudian. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar materiales, como láminas y herramientas, porque en  esta época del año aumenta su trabajo, sus ingresos incrementan y podrá satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.

Su deseo es que sus hijos estudien y  puedan sacar una carrera universitaria y con el tiempo poner más ventas o negocios en la ciudad,  en el cual poder aumentar la producción y sus ingresos y que la familia tenga un patrimonio y un trabajo en el cual puedan generar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Fredys is 49 years old and has a ninth-grade education. He is married, and his spouse helps him. He runs a business selling products made of sheet metal. His children live in his home; five people depend on him. Three of his older children are in school; two go to high school and the other is in ninth grade.

He has a business selling sheet metal articles that he makes himself and he also does work to order. He makes oil lamps, gutters, coffee pots, buckets, receptacles for mills, chimneys, and tins for bakeries, etc. He has been earning his living this way for 13 years. The shop where he fabricates these products is located in his house. To buy materials, he has to travel to the city, which is an hour away by bus. His wife and his children help him in their free time, since the older children are in school.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy materials like sheet metal and tools because his workload and his income increase at this time of year, allowing him to satisfy his family's needs. 

His desire is for his children go to school and earn a university degree. With time, he would also like to have more sales and business in the city so that he can increase his production and his income in order for his family to have assets and jobs so that they can generate their incomes.

loans.use: to purchase materials like sheet metal and tools because his workload and his income increase at this time of year, allowing him to satisfy his family's needs.

loans.name: Bertha Alicia

texts.es:
Berta, es casada, tiene 27 años de edad, con el afán de apoyar en los gastos de su hogar ella se dedica a vender variedad de mariscos, es un oficio que lo aprendió de su familia ya posee 10 años de experiencia.
Comprara mariscos para vender y satisfacer a sus clientes, espera que su negocio este bien surtido y de esta manera podrá tener los ingresos que necesita para apoyar en los gastos familiares y cancelar sus deudas.
Su sueño es mejorar el negocio así como también reforzar su economía con mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Berta is 27 years old and married. To help with household expenses, she works selling a variety of seafood. She learned this work from her family, and she now has 10 years of experience in it.

She will buy seafood to sell and meet her customers' needs. She would like to keep her business well stocked so that she can earn the income she needs to help with household expenses and to pay off debts. Her dream is to improve her business, her income and her family’s finances.

loans.use: to buy seafood to sell.

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es:
Berta, es una mujer que se dedica a la venta de lácteos, ya tiene 3 años de tener este negocio, se ubica en el mercado municipal de su localidad y es apoyada por sus hijos, emprendió este negocio debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos extras para dar apoyo a sus hijos en los estudios, ella tiene 45 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos.
Invertirá en la compra de quesos y crema, para tener suficiente producto y poder cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes, espera fortalecer el negocio para conseguir aumentar sus ganancias y cancelar la deuda adquirida, así como también dar apoyo a su familia.
Aspira a tener un negocio más grande y continuar cubriendo los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
Berta sells dairy products, an activity she has been engaged in for 3 years already. Her stall is located in the town market of her community and her children help her. She started this activity because she needed an extra income to pay for the education of her children. She is 45 years old and she lives with her two children.
She will invest the loan in the purchase of cheese and cream in order to have enough products to meet her customers’ requests. She hopes to strengthen her activity to succeed in increasing her income and in paying off her contracted debt as well as in supporting her family.
She wants to own a bigger shop and to keep on paying for her family’s expenses.

loans.use: To buy cheese and cream.

loans.name: Eduardo Isai

texts.es:
Eduardo, es un padre dedicado al cuido de su pequeño hijo de dos años, la responsabilidad del cuido del niño es completamente de él, para cubrir los gastos familiares se dedica a vender ropa para ambos sexos lo hace de 6:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m, este horario lo maaneja cuando no esta trabajando, también es empleado en una empacadora de carne es ahi donde fue tomada su foto.
Para aprovechar la época navideña solicita capital para comprar faldas, camisas, blusas y pantalones, ya que los clientes empiezan a tener una mayor demanda, espera aumentar sus ventas y mejorar su economía.
Sueña con ampliar su negocio para tener los recursos económicos que le permitan darle a su hijo un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a father who is dedicated to caring for his little son who is two years old.

He has complete responsibility for his son’s care, and to cover the family expenses he sells clothing for both sexes. He does this from 6:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., which is a schedule that he manages when he is not working; he is also employed in a meat packing plant, and it is there that his photo was taken.

In order to take advantage of the Christmas season, he is seeking capital to purchase skirts, shirts, blouses, and pants, as customer demand is increasing, and he hopes to increase his sales and improve his finances.  

He dreams of expanding his business in order to have the economic resources that will enable him to give his son a better future.

loans.use: to purchase skirts, shirts, blouses, and pants.

loans.name: Meliza Catherinne

texts.en:
Meliza wants to work in the hospitality industry. Meliza is currently attending the Universidad San Fransisco Xavier, working towards her degree in hospitality. She plans on graduating in December 2014, but without a loan from Vittana, she thinks that she may need to take time off to work and save until she can return to school. 

Meliza plans on spending the loan towards purchasing her textbooks. As an added expense, textbooks are often not bought to save money. With them, Meliza hopes to be able to better understand her subjects. 

With a career in hospitality, she expects to earn $17 a day. As the youngest, with one older sibling attending college already, Meliza is unsure how she will be able to finance her education on her own without the assistance of a Vittana loan. Meliza's father works as a salesman, and his salary is the family's primary source of income. 

Meliza currently works as an event coordinator to help her afford her school and living expenses.

loans.use: to pay for textbooks.

loans.name: Giovanny Andres

texts.es:
El es Giovanny Andrés, el motivo principal de esta carta es contar su pequeña pero extensa vida… Es estudiante de Campo alto, cursa en el programa ensamble, programación y mantenimiento de Hardware, le gusta mucho esa carrera y lo motiva a seguir adelante con sus estudios. Ahora, en la actualidad lamentablemente no tiene como sostener a el papá y a si mismo, ya que vive con el papa y lastimosamente no tienen ninguno un trabajo estable, el único trabajo es en un bar solo los viernes y trabaja de 11:30 a 3 de la mañana de los sábados, no tiene un sueldo fijo, además de eso el papá trabaja en las noches en un carro ambulante vendiendo variedad de comestibles empacados, en este momento más que nunca están pasando por una situación difícil, a el papá le quitaron su único medio de trabajar… bueno, siguiendo con su historia el no tiene un solvento económico de ninguna índole y por supuesto no quiere perder la oportunidad que con tanto esfuerzo logro (la de estudiar) para el desde que salio del colegio en el año 2008 fue algo primordial en estar en una universidad, porque sabe y esta convencido que si se estudia se llega muy lejos, y eso es lo que el quiere, ser un Gran Ingeniero de sistemas porque es lo que le apasiona, por este motivo no quiere que su esfuerzo sea en vano y el agradecería si kva le puede ayudar a pagar sus estudios. 

 Muchas gracias por su atención prestada.
texts.en:
This is Giovanny Andrés, and the primary motivation for this letter is to recount his short but full life. He is a student at Campo Alto, studying Hardware Assembly, Programming and Maintenance. He likes his degree program and is motivated to continue his studies. Unfortunately he does not have enough [money] right now to sustain both his father and himself, being that he lives with his father and does not have a stable job. The only work he has is bartending on Friday nights, when he works from 11:30 p.m. until 3 a.m. on Saturdays and does not earn a fixed amount. His father works nights, selling a variety of packaged foods. Now, more than ever, they are in a tough situation because his father lost his job. 

Well, to continue the story, Giovanny Andrés doesn’t have solvent income of any sort and of course he does not want to lose the opportunity to study which he has worked so hard for, ever since finishing high school in 2008. For him, attending university felt like something primordial because he knows and is convinced that if you study you can go far, and what he wants is to be a great systems engineer. This is what he is passionate about and because of this he does not want all of his efforts so far to have been in vain. He would be grateful if Kiva could help him pay for his studies.

Thank you for your attention.

loans.use: to pay for his education.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, es una madre soltera que lucha por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, a sus 48 años de edad ya tiene 12 años dedicándose a la venta de ropa, atiende su negocio todos los días, es u oficio que aprendió de su familia, sus hijos después de salir de sus clases la apoyan en atender a los clientes.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa apara damas y niños, en variedad de colores, estilos y tallas, para que mantener la fidelidad de los clientes, espera aprovechar al máximo al máximo estas épocas de fin de año y tener mejores ganancias.
Su objetivo es fortalecer su negocio, continuar brindando a su familia un mejor estilo de vida y cancelar sus deudas.
texts.en:
Blanca is a single mother who struggles to get her three children ahead.  She is 48 years old, and she has been selling clothes for 12 years.  She tends to her business every day.  It is a trade that she learned from her family.  After their classes, her children help her tend to the customers.

She will use the requested loan to buy a variety of colors, styles, and sizes of new clothes for women and children.  She will do this in order to keep her customers’ loyalty.  She hopes to take maximum advantage of this end of the year season and to have better income.

Her objective is to strengthen her business, to continue providing her family with a better lifestyle, and to pay her debts.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's clothes.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.en:
Becoming a medical technician has always been Paola's dream. To achieve her goal, Paola has enrolled in the Universidad Nuestra Senora de La Paz. She expects to graduate in December 2014, but without a loan is unsure how she will be able to continue affording her education. She shares that her alternative would be to take time off from school to work and save money until she could return. 

Paola shares that it is important to her to graduate on time so she can enter into the job market as soon as possible. Paola plans on using the loan funds to pay her graduation fee. This fee is often more expensive than the semester's tuition and is a frequent impediment for graduating students in La Paz. 

Paola currently works 40 hours a week as a secretary and earns $14 a day, but making time for school and work has been her biggest challenge. With a degree, she expects to earn $20 a day. 

With one younger brother and one younger sister, Paola hopes to be a role model for her younger siblings by being the first in her family to graduate from university.

loans.use: to pay for graduation fees.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.en:
Ivan has always dreamt of working in forestry. To achieve his goal, Ivan has enrolled in the Instituto Tecnológico Caranavi. He expects to graduate in December 2014, but without a loan is unsure how he will be able to continue to afford his education. He shares that his alternative would be to take time off from school to work and save money until he could return. 

Ivan shares that it is important to him to graduate on time so he can enter into the job market as soon as possible. Ivan plans on using this loan to pay for his tuition. With a degree in environmental evaluation, he expects to earn $14 a day. 

Unfortunately, Ivan's parents never had the opportunity to complete their high school education. Without the opportunity for a higher degree, his parents never had the chance to move up. Growing up, their finances were always tight. With seven other siblings, Ivan is unsure how he will be able to finance his education on his own without the assistance of a Vittana loan. To help afford his school and living expenses, Ivan currently works as a mason.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Consuelo es una mujer amable y carismática, a sus 53 años de edad se dedica a atender su propio negocio; un café internet y miscelánea que montó por la necesidad de generar ingresos para solventar los gastos del hogar, ya que toda la carga económica recayó sobre ella, luego de la separación con su esposo.
El establecimiento nació como una pequeña papelería, con poco surtido y día a día fue tomando fuerza y acreditándose hasta convertirse en lo que es hoy en día; allí presta el servicio de sala de internet, papelería, vende variedades y detalles para toda ocasión, adicionalmente vende fritos y gaseosas en horas de la noche para complementar los ingresos para dar el alimento a sus hijos y satisfacer las necesidades del hogar.
Solicita el apoyo del crédito para inyectar capital de trabajo a su negocio, requiere comprar surtido al por mayor (productos de papelería, tarjetería, bolsas de regalo, entre otros), así podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y mejorar las ganancias en esta temporada decembrina.
Consuelo tiene como propósito seguir acreditando su negocio, con más variedad de surtido y así generar una rentabilidad que le permita apoyar a sus hijos con la crianza y la educación de sus nietos; además desea ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Consuelo is a kind and charismatic woman. She is 53 years old and makes a living from her own business: an internet café she set up out of the need to generate income to settle her household expenses since after separating from her husband the entire economic burden has rested on her.

The establishment began as a small stationery store with little stock. Day after day she was putting in effort and establishing a reputation to convert it into what it is today. There she offers the use of the internet and sells stationery and little gifts for every occasion, and she also sells fried food and soft drink at night to complement her earnings so she can feed her children and satisfy the needs of her household.

She is requesting the support of the loan in order to inject working capital into her business. She needs to purchase stock wholesale (stationery, card-making products, gift bags, etc.) so she is able to satisfy the needs of her clients and improve profits in the December season.

Consuelo’s aim is to continue improving the reputation of her business with more variety of stock and thereby generate profitability, which will allow her to support her children with the raising and education of her grandchildren. She also wishes to offer them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase stock wholesale (stationery, card-making supplies, gift bags, etc.)
